GS41aryabhcu:10: param, brahma, āryabhaṭaḥ, trīṇi, gadati, gaṇitam, kālakriyām, golam |

GS41aryabhcu:21: ekaḥ? ekānekayoḥ parasparaviruddhayoḥ yugapat ekatra avasthānam na
GS41aryabhcu:22: sambhavati, yathā atyantaviruddhayoḥ cchāyā ātapayoḥ uṣṇaśītayoḥ vā iti |
GS41aryabhcu:23: atra ucyate ã yathā vṛkṣaḥ ekavasturūpeṇa [tiṣṭhati], asau eva yadā
GS41aryabhcu:25: evam asau api paramātmā nirvikāraḥ nirañjanaḥ ekaḥ eva, asau eva [yadā]

GS41aryabhcu:31: athavā asau ekaḥ eva āsīt, tataḥ svayam ardhena puruṣaḥ abhavat ardhena nārī iti |

GS41aryabhcu:39: na kevalam satyatvena devatātvena ca viśeṣitaḥ |

GS41aryabhcu:41: param ca tat brahma param brahma |
GS41aryabhcu:43: evam asau bhagavān kaḥ, satyā devatā, param brahma ca |
GS41aryabhcu:44: kam, satyām devatām, param brahma ca praṇipatya |
GS41aryabhcu:45: atha katham kaḥ śabdaḥ pulliṅgaḥ, satyā devatā strīliṅgaḥ, param brahma napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ? taiḥ bhinnaliṅgaiḥ ekam vastu abhidhīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:46: nanu ca atra sarvaiḥ eva śabdaiḥ ekaliṅgaiḥ bhavitavyam? na iti āha |

GS41aryabhcu:51: athavā brahmaṇoḥ dvayoḥ apy ācāryeṇa praṇipātaḥ kṛtaḥ, śabdabrahmaṇaḥ parabrahmaṇaḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:52: tayoḥ upavarṇanā iyam kriyate ã praṇipatya iti |

GS41aryabhcu:57: satyām devatām iti etat dvayoḥ brahmaṇoḥ śeṣaḥ, satyā devatā śabdabrahma |
GS41aryabhcu:58: uktam ca ã jñānāntarabhāvi yat ca hi phalam jñātvā kriyā ataḥ ca yat sarvasya avyabhicārikāraṇam iti jñānasthitau niścayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:59: jñeyam ca aparimāṇam alpaviṣayaśrautādiśāstram punar divyam cakṣuḥ atīndriye api viṣaye vyāhanyate na kvacit ||
GS41aryabhcu:63: brahma, yat sarvaiḥ api muktivādibhiḥ prārthyate, mokṣadaḥ paramātmā iti
GS41aryabhcu:65: evam ca dvayoḥ brahmaṇoḥ praṇāmaḥ kṛtaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:67: tad yathā ã dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma param ca yat |
GS41aryabhcu:69: [amṛtabindūpaniṣad, śloí 7; vāyupurāṇam, amśaḥ 6, aí 5, śloí 64] iti |
GS41aryabhcu:71: athavā, praṇipatya kam hiraṇyagarbham, ekānekasvarūpam, sarvaprāṇinām mahat nāma |
GS41aryabhcu:72: tatra viśeṣaḥ ekam, tasya tasya yataḥ adhiṣṭhātṛdevatā hiraṇyagarbhaḥ ekaḥ eva |

GS41aryabhcu:75: cakṣuṣaḥ sūryaḥ, śrotrasyāḥ ākāśaḥ, rasanasyāḥ āpaḥ, ghrāṇasya pṛthivī,

GS41aryabhcu:78: viṣṇuḥ, pāyunaḥ mitraḥ, upasthasya prajāpatiḥ, evam karmendriyādhiṣṭhātryaḥ devatāḥ, manasaḥ candraḥ, buddheḥ savitā,
GS41aryabhcu:80: satyām devatām antaryāminaḥ īśvarasya bhagavataḥ paramātmanaḥ kāraṇaśaktyā adhiṣṭhitāḥ sarve eva padārthāḥ svārthe pravartante |
GS41aryabhcu:81: ataḥ tām paramātmanaḥ kāraṇaśaktim satyām devatām |
GS41aryabhcu:83: param brahma yat tat adhikārī brahma paramātmā tam |
GS41aryabhcu:87: antareṇa api cakāram ca arthaḥ gamyate eva |

GS41aryabhcu:90: bāle ca vṛddhe ca kṣate ca kṣīṇe ca iti gamyate |
GS41aryabhcu:92: arthaḥ, kam ca satyām devatām ca param brahma ca iti |
GS41aryabhcu:96: | nanu atra evam yuktam vaktum ã “āryabhaṭaḥ aham trīṇi gadāmi” iti,

GS41aryabhcu:98: yathā kiṃcit kaścit pṛcchati ã “rājakule kena kim uktam iti āha ã evam ukte rājani evam devadatto bravīti |
GS41aryabhcu:99: yajñadattaḥ api evam eva nigadati” iti |

GS41aryabhcu:119: ubhayathāḥ asmākam adoṣaḥ iti, yena asmadīye siddhānte sūryodayāt prabhṛti yāvat aparaḥ sūryodayaḥ tāvat ahorātram, yaḥ ca sūryācandramasoḥ paraḥ viprakarṣaḥ saḥ ardhamāsaḥ, yaḥ ca tayoḥ paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ sa māsaḥ; evam dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ iti ayam kālaḥ,

GS41aryabhcu:125: gaṇitakālakriyāgolānām dvitīyaikavacane nirdeśaḥ gaṇitam kālakriyām golam iti gaṇitaśabdaḥ napuṃsakaliṅgam, kālakriyā
GS41aryabhcu:127: eteṣām sāmānyopakrameṇa napuṃsakaliṅgena eva ācāryeṇa abhidhānam [kṛtam] “trīṇi gadati” iti
GS41aryabhcu:128: atra ayam gaṇitaśabdaḥ aśeṣagaṇitābhidhāyī, tasmāt aśeṣagaṇitābhidhāyitvāt yathā kṣetragaṇitam bravīti, evam grahagaṇitam api; grahagaṇitasya ca kṣetrādyavyatiriktatvāt kālakriyāgolayoḥ ca gaṇitāvyatiriktatvāt gaṇitam nigadati iti etāvat eva siddhe kālakriyāgolagrahaṇam kurvan ācāryaḥ jñāpayati ã kṣetracchāyāśreḍhīsamakaraṇakuṭṭākārādikam sāmānyagaṇitam kiṃcit vakṣye, viśeṣagaṇite punaḥ kālakriyayā golena tātparyam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:129: anyathā aśeṣagaṇitābhidhāyigaṇitaśabdena eva siddhatvāt kālakriyāgolayoḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam anāvaśyakam syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:130: tathā ca, ācāryeṇa gaṇitapāde gaṇitavastu diṅmātram eva abhihitam, kālakriyāgolayoḥ kālakriyāgola [vastu] viśeṣeṇa |
GS41aryabhcu:131: avaśyam ayam arthaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ ã kiṃcit gaṇitam iti /
GS41aryabhcu:132: anyathā hi mahat gaṇitavastu, aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ miśraka-śreḍhī-kṣetra-khāta-citi-krākacika-rāśi-cchāyābhidhāyinaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:133: miśrakaḥ iti sakalagaṇitavastusaṃmiśrakaḥ saṃsparśakaḥ iti arthaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:135: kṣetram iti anekāśrikṣetraphalāni ānayati iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:136: khātaḥ iti khanyapramāṇam nirdiśati iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:137: citiḥ iti iṣṭakāpramāṇena uparinicitavastupramāṇam āvedayati iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:138: krākacikam iti, krakacaḥ nama dārucchedakam, tasmin krakace bhavaḥ krākacikaḥ, tadvastupramāṇam avagamayati iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:139: rāśiḥ iti dhānyādirūpavastunicitam tadvastupramāṇam janayati iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:140: chāyā iti śaṅkvādicchāyāpramāṇena kālam kathayati iti arthaḥ |

GS41aryabhcu:209: vargasthāne upacīyante tasmāt teṣām ekottaritā saṅkhyā, yāni punar avargākṣarāṇi yādīni ekottaropacayāni avargasthāne tasmāt daśottaritā eva vṛddhiḥ bhavati, avargasthānasya daśakasaṅkhyādhāratvāt evam tarhi yādgrahaṇam kartavyam |

GS41aryabhcu:224: katham tarhi vaktavyaḥ? “gaḥ yaḥ” iti gakāraḥ trisaṅkhyaḥ, avargasthānasthitatvāt eva ayam triṃśatkaḥ bhaviṣyati |

GS41aryabhcu:231: aṣṭādaśasu ca sthāneṣu nava vargasthānāni, tatra navasu vargasthāneṣu nava svarāḥ |

GS41aryabhcu:440: ṅiśibuṇlṛṣkhṛ avibhaktikaḥ, prāk, śani, ḍhuṅvighva, guru, khricyubha,
GS41aryabhcu:441: kuja, bhadlijhnukhṛ, etāni śanyādīni api ca padāni avibhaktikanirdiṣṭāni
GS41aryabhcu:447: yuge ravibhagaṇāḥ yugaravibhagaṇāḥ, yugasya vā ravibhagaṇāḥ yugaravibhagaṇāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:449: atha atra dvandvanirdeśaḥ kasmāt na bhavati? ã yugam ca ravibhagaṇāḥ ca yugaravibhagaṇāḥ, yugam khyughṛ ravibhagaṇāḥ khyughṛ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:450: evam ca sati dvandvanirdeśe yat tat kālakriyāpāde vakṣyate, tat eva na vaktavyam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:452: saptamāsamāse ṣaṣṭhīsamāse vā kriyamāṇe trairāśikam siddham |
GS41aryabhcu:453: yadi divasasaṅkhye varṣasaṅkhye vā yuge yathānirdiṣṭāḥ grahabhagaṇāḥ labhyante tadā asmin nirdiṣṭe kiyantaḥ iti tatkālamadhyamagrahabhagaṇādayaḥ labhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:454: ṣaṣṭhīsamāse ca yad yasya divasasaṅkhyasya varṣasaṅkhyasya yugasya yathānirdiṣṭāḥ grahabhagaṇāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:455: labhyante, asya iṣṭasya kiyantaḥ iti madhyamagrahabhagaṇādisiddhiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:457: asau ca atra yugabhagaṇaśabdaḥ sarvatra adhikārārthe prayujyate |
GS41aryabhcu:458: adhikāre ca yathā yugaravibhagaṇāḥ evam yuge śaśibhagaṇāḥ ityādi |
GS41aryabhcu:459: anyathā kasmin kāle kasya vā kālasya ete grahabhagaṇāḥ iti etat ne nirdiṣṭam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:460: tasmāt ṣaṣṭhīsaptamīsamāsābhyām anyatareṇa vyākhyeyam, arkeṇa eva grahāṇām
GS41aryabhcu:463: kālaḥ grahāt ca sadasadvargaḥ syāt vyāvahārikam || iti |
GS41aryabhcu:468: iti] pāṭhāntare api dvandvanirdeśāt ṣaṣṭhīsaptamyarthaḥ durlabhaḥ bhavet
GS41aryabhcu:471: raviyugabhagaṇāḥ ca raviyugabhagaṇāḥ ca raviyugabhagaṇāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:472: ekena raviyugabhagaṇaśabdena raviyugabhagaṇāḥ ca raviyugabhagaṇapramāṇasaṃsiddhiḥ dvitīyena ṣaṣṭhīsaptamīsamāsābhyāṃ trairāśikasiddhiḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:473: yadi evam yugaravibhagaṇaśabdena api ayam arthaḥ śakyate jñātum, na kiñcit pāṭhāntare prayojanam
GS41aryabhcu:475: ukāravargasthāne ayam khakāraḥ yakāraḥ ca, tena ukāravargasthāne dvātriṃśat |
GS41aryabhcu:476: ghṛ ṛkāravargasthāne ghakāraḥ, tena tasmin sthāne catvāri |
GS41aryabhcu:487: tathā eva yugakubhagaṇāḥ tathā eva svasthāne api
GS41aryabhcu:489: bhacakrapratibaddhāni nakṣatrāṇi tasya bhacakrasya pravahākṣepavaśāt aparām diśam āsādayanti
GS41aryabhcu:491: bhramantīm iva paśyanti iti anayā yuktyā bhuvaḥ bhagaṇanirdeśaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:493: ye ete grahāḥ vivasvadādayaḥ prāṅmukhāḥ bhramanti |
GS41aryabhcu:494: yadi api bhapañjarapravahākṣepāt apagacchanti diśam, tathā api ete svagatyā prāṅmukham eva gacchanti |
GS41aryabhcu:495: alpatvāt gateḥ kālāntareṇa prācīm diśam āsādayantaḥ lakṣyante, kulālacakrasthakīṭavat |
GS41aryabhcu:497: syuḥ, tadā aśvinyām dṛṣṭaḥ [grahaḥ] bharaṇyām na upalakṣyeta |
GS41aryabhcu:498: yadi ete aparābhimukhāḥ syuḥ, tadā aśvinyām dṛṣṭāḥ revatyām upalakṣyeran |
GS41aryabhcu:499: tasmāt ete prāṅmukhāḥ eva bhramanti iti ataḥ “prāk” iti |
GS41aryabhcu:500: kim punar bhūbhagaṇopadeśe prayojanam iti āha ã “ravibhūyogāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:504: yadi api ayam eva kudivasapratipatteḥ upāyaḥ syāt tathā api upadeśagauravāt na yujyate |
GS41aryabhcu:506: upadeśagurutā? ucyate ã “ku ṅiśibuṇlṛṣkhṛ” iti kubhagaṇopadeśaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:511: tasmāt na ekam prayojanam upadeśasya etāvataḥ kāraṇam bhavitum arhati |
GS41aryabhcu:512: anyat api prayojanāntaram asti iti āha |
GS41aryabhcu:513: tat yathā ã kaliyātabhūbhagaṇaiḥ sarve eva grahāḥ mīnameṣasandhyudayakālāvadhayaḥ ānīyante
GS41aryabhcu:515: taiḥ trairāśikam ã yadi yugaprasiddhabhūbhagaṇaiḥ iṣṭagrahabhagaṇāḥ mīnameṣasandhiprārabdhāḥ prāpyante, tadā kaliyātabhūbhagaṇaiḥ kiyantaḥ iti iṣṭagrahabhagaṇādayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:517: katham? ravibhagaṇāḥ yātāhargaṇe kṣiptvā taddivasasūryarāśyādīn ca adhaḥ vinyasya iṣṭagrahabhagaṇaiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:518: krameṇa saṃguṇayya svacchedaiḥ ṣaṣṭyādibhiḥ bhaktvā upari upari āropya tathā eva bhūbhagaṇaiḥ vibhajeta, labdham iṣṭagrahamaṇḍalāni |
GS41aryabhcu:519: śeṣam dvādaśādiguṇitam kṛtvā tad avaśiṣṭam [adhaḥ adhaḥ] prakṣipya tathā eva ca apahṛte rāśyādayaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:520: athavā, ravimaṇḍalāhargaṇayogam dvādaśabhiḥ saṃguṇayya raviyātarāśayaḥ prakṣipyante, triṃśatā bhāgānityādi [arghāt triṃśatā saṃguṇayya raviyātabhāgān prakṣipet iti ādi] karma kṛtvā khakhaṣaḍghanacchedarāśim
GS41aryabhcu:521: nidhāya trairāśikam ã yadi yugabhūbhagaṇaiḥ abhīṣṭagrahabhagaṇāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:522: labhyante, tadā khakhaṣaḍghanabhāgahārabhūbhagaṇaiḥ kiyantaḥ? tena khakhaṣaḍghanaguṇitayugabhūbhagaṇaiḥ bhāge hṛte bhagaṇādilabdhiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:536: bhṛguḥ ca budhaḥ ca bhṛgubudhau, tayoḥ saurāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:541: sūryasya ye bhagaṇāḥ te eva śukrabudhayoḥ api
GS41aryabhcu:547: grahoccayugabhagaṇapratipādanāya āha ã candrocca rjuṣkhidha budha suguśithṛna bhṛgu jaṣabikhuchṛ śeṣārkāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:548: candrocca, rjuṣkhidha, budha, suguśithṛna, bhṛgu, jaṣabikhuchṛ, eteṣām avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ, śeṣārkāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:554: bhṛgu tathā eva bhṛgūccayugabhagaṇāḥ jaṣabikhuchṛ vasvaṣṭāgniyamāśviśūnyādrayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:556: atra ayam bhṛguśabdaḥ, āhosvit bhṛgujaśabdaḥ? bhṛguḥ nāma bhagavān
GS41aryabhcu:557: maharṣiḥ tasya putraḥ śukraḥ tasya ye bhagaṇāḥ nirdiśyante; tena bhṛgujaḥ iti, athavā bhārgavaḥ iti nirdeśyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:558: yadi ayam bhṛgujaśabdaḥ, tadā ṣabikhuchṛ iti ete bhagaṇāḥ prāpnuvanti, jaṣabikhuchṛ iti ete ca iṣyante |
GS41aryabhcu:559: katham tarhi atra bhṛguśabdaḥ eva vijñeyaḥ, yat uta bhṛgujaśabdaḥ?
GS41aryabhcu:562: atra śāstre bhṛgujaśabdena na kvacit śukraḥ ācāryeṇa nirdiṣṭaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:563: tena tarhi bhṛguśabdena bhṛgugurubudhaśani iti ādi yadi api ucyate, bhārgavaśabdena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ, na bhṛguśabdena, bhṛgoḥ apatyam bhārgavaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:565: bhṛgoḥ apatyam bhṛguḥ iti api bhavati, “yathā babhruḥ, maṇḍuḥ, lamakaḥ”
GS41aryabhcu:567: babhroḥ apatyam bābhravyaḥ iti ādi vaktavye babhruḥ iti ucyate, evam māṇḍavyaḥ maṇḍuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:570: nirdiṣṭebhyaḥ ye anye te śeṣāḥ, te ca śanigurubhaumāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:576: yataḥ sūryādayaḥ vigrahavantaḥ paribhramantaḥ rāśiṣu upalakṣyante, tena teṣām bhagaṇāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:578: ete punar śaśyuccādayaḥ na eva lakṣyante; teṣām katham bhagaṇāḥ bhavanti, alakṣyamāṇatvāt iti? atra ucyate ã atra candrādīnām eva
GS41aryabhcu:582: tasyāḥ sādhanopāyāḥ madhyamaḥ, śīghraḥ, mandaḥ, paridhayaḥ, jyā iti ādayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:583: sā ca sphuṭā grahagatiḥ etaiḥ upāyaiḥ sādhayitum śakyate, na anyathā |
GS41aryabhcu:588: uktam ca ã upādāyāḥ api ye heyāḥ tān upāyān pracakṣate |
GS41aryabhcu:589: upāyānām ca niyamaḥ na avaśyam avatiṣṭhate ||
GS41aryabhcu:594: atha pātabhagaṇapradarśanārtham āha ã buphinaca pātavilomā adhikṛtayugabhagaṇasaṃyogāt yugapātavilomabhagaṇāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:597: pātasya vilomā viparītagatiḥ prasiddhā, tena atra anulomagatijijñāsubhiḥ maṇḍalāt
GS41aryabhcu:601: yadi etāvatā prayojanena pātaḥ maṇḍalāt śodhya anulomaḥ kriyate atra, tarhi mahāprayāsaḥ - pātaḥ maṇḍalāt śodhyaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:603: katham tarhi? yaḥ eva karaṇāgatapātaḥ candramasi
GS41aryabhcu:605: tasmāt uttaraḥ dakṣiṇaḥ vā vikṣepaḥ sādhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:606: kim ayam candramasaḥ pātaḥ ucyate, nanu ca sarveṣām
GS41aryabhcu:607: eva ayam iti? nahi, pāriśeṣyāt candrasya eva ayam pātaḥ, grahāṇām pātāḥ vakṣyante, “navarāṣaha” [gītikāí, 8] iti |
GS41aryabhcu:609: nanu sūryaḥ api anyaḥ asti? tasya vikṣepābhāvāt pātābhāvaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:611: ete grahoccapātabhagaṇāḥ kasmin kāle, kasmin deśe, kasmāt jyotiścakrapradeśāt pravṛttāḥ iti etat na jñāyate |
GS41aryabhcu:612: ataḥ tatpradarśanārtham āha ã budhāhni ajārkodayāt ca laṅkāyām || 4 ||
GS41aryabhcu:616: [aṣṭādhyāyī, 5.4.19] iti samāsānte kṛte budhāhe iti bhavitavyam |
GS41aryabhcu:618: anityaḥ samāsāntavidhiḥ, kasmin cit bhavati kasmin cit na bhavati iti |
GS41aryabhcu:621: tena budhādivārāt kṛtayugādi ahar gaṇaḥ gaṇyate |
GS41aryabhcu:628: meṣādeḥ bhagaṇapradeśāt sūryodayāt ca laṅkāyām ete grahāḥ svān svān bhagaṇān bhoktum ārabdhāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:629: meṣādeḥ yasmāt ete pravṛttāḥ tasmāt eṣu graheṣu na kṣepaḥ na apacayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:630: yasmāt sūryodayāt tasmāt ardharātryādiṣu kālaviśeṣeṣu yathā iṣṭam svabhogaiḥ sañcālanam, yataḥ laṅkāyām tataḥ anyeṣu deśeṣu deśāntararekhāyāḥ pūrvataḥ aparataḥ vyavasthiteṣu
GS41aryabhcu:636: kalpayugamanvantarāṇām gatāgatapratipādanāya āha ã kāhaḥ manavaḥ ḍha manuyu-
GS41aryabhcu:637: gāḥ śkha gatāḥ te ca manuyugāḥ chnā ca |

GS41aryabhcu:641: [avibhaktikaḥ], ca, kalpādeḥ, yugapādāḥ, ga avibhaktikaḥ eva, ca,
GS41aryabhcu:644: kasya ahaḥ kāhaḥ, brahmadivasaḥ iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:645: tasya kāhasya kiyat pramāṇam iti āha ã manavaḥ ḍha |
GS41aryabhcu:648: ekaikasya manaḥ kiyat kiyat antaram iti āha ã manuyugāḥ śkha |
GS41aryabhcu:650: atra katham ucyate tad dvāsaptatiyugāni manoḥ antaram iti |
GS41aryabhcu:651: anye punar anyathā manyante ã tad ekasaptatiguṇam manvantaram iha ucyate | iti |
GS41aryabhcu:656: ekasaptatiḥ caturyugāni manoḥ antaram iti uktvā ta evam punar api āha ã sahasrayugaparyantam ahar yat brahmaṇaḥ viduḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:660: tatra ekasaptatiḥ caturdaśabhiḥ guṇitāni na eva yugasahasram bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:662: yadi ekasaptatiḥ manoḥ antaram, katham caturdaśamanvantarāṇi yugasahasram bhavati? asmākam tu dvāsaptatiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:664: aṣṭottaram sahasram brāhmaḥ divasaḥ iti etat upapannam |
GS41aryabhcu:665: teṣu manuṣu caturdaśasu kiyantaḥ manavaḥ vyatikrāntāḥ iti āha ã gatāḥ te ca |
GS41aryabhcu:667: saptamasya manoḥ kiyanti yugāni iti āha ã manuyugāḥ chnā |
GS41aryabhcu:669: aṣṭāviṃśatitamasya yugasya pādāḥ vyatītāḥ ga trisaṅkhyāḥ kṛtatretādvāparasaṃjñitāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:672: | guroḥ divasaḥ gurudivasaḥ, tasmāt gurudivasāt, bhāratāt ca pūrvam |
GS41aryabhcu:673: gurudivasena upalakṣitāt bhāratāt pūrvam iti sāmānyena abhihitatvāt kaliyugādeḥ pūrvam iti vyākhyeyam |
GS41aryabhcu:675: ete manavaḥ, etāni ca yugāni, ete ca yugapādāḥ vyatikrāntāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:677: atra etat praṣṭavyam ã kim etāni yugāni yugapādāḥ ca tulyapramāṇāḥ āhosvit bhinnapramāṇāḥ iti? kecit āhuḥ bhinnapramāṇāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:678: tad yathā ã catvāri āhuḥ sahasrāṇi [varṣāṇām yat kṛtam yugam] |
GS41aryabhcu:679: tasya tāvat śatī sandhyā sandhyāṃśaḥ ca tathāvidhaḥ ||
GS41aryabhcu:683: asmākam punaḥ tatra yugapādāḥ sarve eva tulyapramāṇāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:686: tad yathā ã ṣaṇmanavaḥ vyatikrāntāḥ iti |

GS41aryabhcu:716: ya-va-ña-guṇāḥ, prāṇena, eti, kalām, bham, khayugāṃśe, grahajavaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:720: katham iti āha ã ṭha cakram, dvādaśarāśayaḥ cakram bhavati iti
GS41aryabhcu:721: | śaśibhagaṇāḥ cakrasaṃjñitāḥ dvādaśabhiḥ guṇyante, tataḥ te rāśayaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:724: katham iti āha ã te aṃśakalāyojanāni ya-va-ña-guṇāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:729: yāvantam ākāśapradeśam raveḥ mayūkhāḥ samantāt dyotayanti tāvān pradeśaḥ khagolasya paridhiḥ, khakakṣyā |
GS41aryabhcu:730: anyathā hi aparimitatvāt ākāśasya parimāṇākhyānam na upapadyate |
GS41aryabhcu:731: candramasaḥ liptā daśayojanāni iti ataḥ aṇutvāt candrabhagaṇaiḥ eva upadiṣṭā khakakṣyā |
GS41aryabhcu:732: anyeṣām bhagaṇaiḥ api eṣā śakyate eva |
GS41aryabhcu:733: nanu tad yathā ã raveḥ yugabhagaṇāḥ liptīkṛtāḥ dvayekāgnirāmanavakāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:735: raveḥ liptāyojanāni rāmāgnīndavaḥ, yojanāṣṭādaśasahastrabhāgāḥ ca randhravasvagniravayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:737: etaiḥ yojanaiḥ yojanabhāgaiḥ ca guṇitāḥ yugaraviliptāḥ khakakṣyāyojanāni bhavanti |
GS41aryabhcu:740: etaiḥ yugaśanaiḥ caraliptāḥ guṇitāḥ tāni eva khakakṣyāyojanāni bhavanti |
GS41aryabhcu:743: nanu ca atra kakṣyāḥ prakrāntāḥ, tāsu prakrāntāsu “prāṇena eti kalām bham” iti etat aprākaraṇikam
GS41aryabhcu:746: sūtreṣu ca kecit arthāḥ prākaraṇikāḥ kecit aprākaraṇikāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:748: prāṇena ucchvāsena, eti gacchati, kalām liptām,
GS41aryabhcu:752: jyotiścakram liptānām khakhaṣaḍghanam, tat ahorātreṇa paryeti |
GS41aryabhcu:754: tena kalāḥ ca jyotiścakrasambandhāḥ prāṇāḥ ca tulyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:755: tasmāt chāyākaraṇādiṣu prāṇeṣu eva jyādikam karma pravartate |
GS41aryabhcu:756: jyotiścakrāhorātrayoḥ ādiḥ ravyudayāt iti kālakriyāpāde vistareṇa vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:758: kha iti anena pūrvanirdiṣṭā khakakṣyā parigṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:760: yadi khayugāṃśe grahajavaḥ iti yugam parigṛhyate, ekatvāt yugasya ekā eva sarveṣām grahāṇām kakṣyā syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:762: khakakṣyāyāḥ svaiḥ svaiḥ yugabhagaṇaiḥ bhāge hṛte yat labdham tat yugāṃśaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:768: khakakṣyāyām svaiḥ svaiḥ yugabhagaṇaiḥ bhāge hṛte yathāsvam grahakakṣyāḥ bhavanti |
GS41aryabhcu:770: “ṣaṣṭyā sūryābdānām” [kālakriyāí, 12] iti atra khyughṛ-tulyaiḥ arkavarṣaiḥ khakakṣyātulyāni yojanāni sarve eva grahāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:772: tena yadi etāvadbhiḥ yugabhagaṇaiḥ iṣṭagrahasya [= iṣṭagrahasya yugabhagaṇaiḥ] khakakṣyā
GS41aryabhcu:773: [labhyate], tataḥ ekena bhagaṇena kā iti svakakṣyā labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:775: bhasya vāṃśaḥ bhavāṃśaḥ, nakṣatraparidheḥ ṣaṣṭyaṃśaḥ sūryakakṣyā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:776: katham ucyate nakṣatrakakṣyāyāḥ ṣaṣṭibhāgaḥ sūryakakṣyā iti, nakṣatrakakṣyāyāḥ asiddhatvāt? na atra sūryakakṣyā
GS41aryabhcu:779: katham? yā atra sūryakakṣyā sā nakṣatrakakṣyāyāḥ ṣaṣṭibhāgaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:780: sūryakakṣyā ca “khayugāṃśe grahajavaḥ” iti anena siddhā yadi nakṣatrakakṣyāyāḥ ṣaṣṭibhāgaḥ tadā sarvā nakṣātrakakṣyā
GS41aryabhcu:781: kiyatī bhavati iti ṣaṣṭyā guṇyate, tadā tasyāḥ nakṣatrakakṣyāyāḥ pramāṇam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:783: vicitratvāt gaṇitanirdeśasya kvacit rāśiḥ sakalaḥ abhidhīyate, kvacit rāśeḥ ekadeśaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:784: atra punaḥ rāśeḥ ekadeśena ṣaṣṭyaṃśena sakalaḥ rāśiḥ abhyūhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:786: yadi ã caturadhikam śatam aṣṭaguṇam dvāṣaṣṭiḥ tathā sahasrāṇām |
GS41aryabhcu:788: iti etāvatā paridhinā ayutapramāṇaviṣkambhārdham labhyate, tadā iṣṭakakṣyāparidhinā kim iti tatkakṣyāyojanaviṣkambhārdham labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:790: yadi vyāsārdhaliptābhiḥ iyāniṣṭayojanakarṇaḥ labhyate, tadā tena aviśeṣakarṇena
GS41aryabhcu:791: bhūtārāgrahavivareṇa kiyān yojanakarṇaḥ iti sphuṭayojanakarṇaḥ labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:796: tatparijñānārtham bhūgrahāṇām vyāsapramāṇapratipādanārtham ca āha ã nṛṣi yojanam, ñilā bhū-
GS41aryabhcu:797: vyāsaḥ arkendvoḥ ghriñā giṇa, ka meroḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:800: nṛṣi avibhaktikaḥ, yojanam, ñilā avibhaktikaḥ, bhūvyāsaḥ, arkendvoḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:801: ghbiñā giṇa ka iti ete avibhaktikāḥ nirdeśāḥ, meroḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:806: etat uktam bhavati ã aṣṭau dhanussahasrāṇi yojanam |
GS41aryabhcu:812: anye punar anyathā manyante ã jambūdvīpaviṣkambhaḥ, tataḥ dviguṇottarāḥ samudrāḥ dvīpāḥ ca iti anayā prakriyayā dviguṇaśreḍhyāḥ caturdaśagacchāyāḥ yat sarvadhanam tāvat pramāṇam tasya iti |
GS41aryabhcu:813: etat api ca golapāde vistāreṇa vicārya pratyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:814: anyat ca tatra eva akṣonnatyā bhūparidhiyojanānayanam upadekṣyāmaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:815: atha tu purāṇe gaṅgādvārakumāryantarālam yojanasahasram ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:817: tat yathā ã laṅkojjayinyoḥ antarālam yojanānām śatadvayam |
GS41aryabhcu:819: tathā ca kumāryujjayinyoḥ antarālam na yojanaśatadvayam api pūryate |
GS41aryabhcu:821: evam gaṅgādvārakumāryantarālam yojanaśatatrayam api na pūryate, kim ucyate yojanasahasram iti |
GS41aryabhcu:822: atha anye manyante viṣayāntarabahutvāt bhuvaḥ mahattvam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:828: tatpṛṣṭhaparidhyuparicakravyavasthitāḥ ete deśāḥ iti etat sarvam eva sambhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:829: athavā tatra alpapramāṇāni yojanāni śrūyante, yena ekena divasena viṃśatimātrāṇi yojanāni gacchanti iti |
GS41aryabhcu:832: tat yathā ã sphuṭatithiḥ tāvat sūryagrahaṇe pūrvāparayoḥ kapālayoḥ pare [= parame tithau] vijñāyate eva |
GS41aryabhcu:833: tatra parāyām [=amāyām] tithau udayāstamayayoḥ catasraḥ nāḍikāḥ apacīyante upacīyante vā
GS41aryabhcu:837: ubhayoḥ api sūryācandramasoḥ viparītakarmaṇā svābhiḥ svābhiḥ lambanaliptābhiḥ svayojanakarṇāvabhyasya, dṛggatijyayā vyāsārdhatulyayā vibhajya, sūryācandramasoḥ bhūvyāsārdham pṛthak pṛthak labhyate taddviguṇam bhūvyāsaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:840: arkaḥ ca induḥ ca arkendū, tayoḥ arkendvoḥ, vyāsaḥ iti anuvartamānāt,
GS41aryabhcu:844: | liptābhiḥ vyavahāraḥ iti liptāvyāsaḥ kriyate ã yadi svayojanakraṇena vyāsārdhaliptāḥ labhyante tadā yojanavyāsaiḥ kiyantaḥ iti
GS41aryabhcu:848: | etat api ca “meruḥ yojanamātraḥ” [golapādaḥ, 11] iti asyām kārikāyām
GS41aryabhcu:851: bhṛguḥ ca guruḥ ca budhaḥ ca śaniḥ ca bhaumaḥ ca bhṛgugurubudhaśanibhaumāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:855: yadā vyatirekaḥ vivakṣitaḥ tadā vyatirekalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:856: yadā punar vyatirekan eva na vivkṣitaḥ tadā ṣaṣṭhī na utpadyate |
GS41aryabhcu:857: tat yathā kaścit kañcana bravīti “ādityasya bimbam paśa” iti |
GS41aryabhcu:860: yadā punar avyatirekavivakṣā tadā yat eva bimbam sa eva ādityaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:861: na īkṣeta udyantam ādityam na astam yāntam kadācana [manusṛtiḥ, 4.37]
GS41aryabhcu:867: śaśivyāsasya ṅāṃśaḥ bhṛguḥ pañcabhāgaḥ, ñāṃśaḥ guruḥ daśabhāgaḥ, ṇāṃśaḥ budhaḥ pañcadaśabhāgaḥ, nāṃśaḥ śaniḥ viṃśatibhāgaḥ, māṃśaḥ bhaumaḥ pañcaviṃśatibhāgaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:869: atha kim iti svakakṣyāpramāṇasambhavāni eva ca yojanāni na ucyante? ayam ācāryasya abhiprāyaḥ ã yadi grahāṇām svakakṣyāniṣpannāni vyāsayojanāni abhidhīyante tadā vyāsaliptānayane svakakṣyotpannāḥ sphuṭayojanakarṇāḥ bhāgahārāḥ syuḥ, lambanadṛkkṣepaliptānayane ca |
GS41aryabhcu:870: tathā grahāṇām manāg api lambanadṛkkṣepaliptāḥ na syuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:878: sa tāvat chedaḥ śaśivyāsaḥ śukrādivyāsaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:884: uparimāṃśaḥ vyāsārdhena guṇitaḥ chedena vibhaktaḥ liptāgataḥ grahavyāsaḥ bhavati madhyamaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:885: sphuṭārtham punar yathā ã svabhūtārāgrahavivareṇa chedān saṃguṇayya vyāsārdhena vibhajet, sphuṭāḥ bhavanti |
GS41aryabhcu:886: te eva grahayogeṣu bhūvyāsārdhaguṇitasya svadṛggateḥ svadṛkkṣepasya ca bhāgahārāḥ, phalam lambanāvanatiliptāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:888: tatra na jñāyate kena mānena śāstre asmin vyavahāraḥ kartavyaḥ iti ataḥ āha ã samārkasamāḥ samāḥ varṣam, samāḥ asmin śāstre arkasamāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:894: ete grahāḥ svakakṣyāsu bhramantaḥ viṣuvate uttareṇa dakṣiṇena ca vyāvartamānāḥ lakṣyante |
GS41aryabhcu:895: tasmāt tatparijñānārtham āha ã bhāpakramaḥ grahāṃśāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:900: śani-guru-kuja, kha-ka-ga-ardham, bhṛgu-budha, kha scāṅgulaḥ, ghatastaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:905: yaddakṣiṇena uttareṇa vā samarekhātaḥ apagamanam apakramaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:906: keṣām ayam apakramaḥ kimātmakaḥ vā caturviṃśatiḥ iti āha ã grahāṃśāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:907: grahāṇām ādityādīnām ete aṃśakāḥ rāseḥ triṃsadbhāgāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:908: samarekhātaḥ uttareṇa caturviṃśatibhāgān grahaḥ apakrāmati meṣavṛṣamithuneṣu krameṇa, tān eva apakramabhāgān utkrameṇa karkaṭakasiṃhakanyāsu nivartate; dakṣiṇena tulāvṛścikadhanuḥṣu [krameṇa] tān eva utkrameṇa makarakumbhamīneṣu iti |
GS41aryabhcu:909: atra grahagrahaṇam kim artham kriyate? grahāṇām sarveṣām eva ete apakramāṃśakāḥ yathā syuḥ iti, anyathā hi keṣām eva syuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:911: atra grahāḥ prakrāntāḥ teṣām prakṛtatvāt grahāṇām eva ete aṃśakāḥ na anyeṣām |
GS41aryabhcu:914: apakramamaṇḍalāt jhārdham candraḥ vikṣipati tathā śanigurukujabhṛgubudhāḥ svān bhāgān vikṣipanti
GS41aryabhcu:915: yasmāt candrādīnām apakramamaṇḍalāt vikṣepabhāgāḥ abhidhīyante ataḥ candrādīnām eva kevalānām apakramabhāgāḥ api syuḥ na
GS41aryabhcu:917: grahagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe sarveṣām eva apakramabhāgāḥ siddhyanti iti |
GS41aryabhcu:923: viṣuvan maṇḍalāt apakramaḥ uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā, apakramamaṇḍalam [ca], tasmāt vikṣepaḥ uttareṇa
GS41aryabhcu:925: jhārdham, jhakāreṇa nava, jhasya ardham jhārdham,
GS41aryabhcu:927: tathā eva apakramamaṇḍalāt eva śeṣāṇām api grahāṇām vikṣepāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:930: dvau [bhāgau] vikṣepaḥ; guroḥ ka, ekaḥ bhāgaḥ; kujasya gārdham, gakāreṇa trayaḥ bhāgāḥ, gasya ardham gārdham, sārdhaḥ aṃśaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:934: kha” iti ucyamāne khakāragrahaṇam ekam na kartavyam bhavati, tat kim iti
GS41aryabhcu:935: ācāryeṇa pṛthak pāṭhena dviḥ khakāragrahaṇam kṛtam? ucyate ã pṛthak
GS41aryabhcu:937: bhṛgubudhayoḥ anyat, tasmāt etat karmadvayam iti pṛthak pṛthak pāṭhāt eva siddhyati |
GS41aryabhcu:938: “nṛṣi yojanam” iti atra puruṣaḥ eva kevalaḥ abhihitaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:939: saḥ puruṣaḥ katyaṅgulaḥ, katihastaḥ vā iti etat na upadiṣṭam |
GS41aryabhcu:941: sakāreṇa navatiḥ, cakāreṇa ṣaṭ, scāṅgulaḥ ṣaṇṇavatyaṅgulaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:942: aṅgulasya pramāṇam gaṇitaparibhāṣātaḥ pratipattavyam ã aṣṭau yavamadhyānyaṅgulapramāṇam iti ādi |
GS41aryabhcu:945: nanu ca “nṛṣiyojanam” iti atra eva etat vaktum yuktam |
GS41aryabhcu:948: aṅgulāni hastān ca kṛtvā grahayoḥ antaram avadhāryam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:949: evam api vijñāyate eva kiyatībhiḥ liptābhiḥ aṅgulam bhavati iti |
GS41aryabhcu:951: uddeśataḥ tu svadhiyā upalakṣitam ucyate ã yoge pādāṅgulam liptā yathā vā lakṣyate dṛśā |
GS41aryabhcu:958: pātasya, grahāṇām punaḥ kasmāt prabhṛti vikṣepāḥ sādhyante eva iti etat na jñāyate |
GS41aryabhcu:959: ataḥ teśām pātabhāgānām mandoccabhāgānām ca pratipādanāya āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:964: budha-bhṛgu-kuja-guru-śani avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ, na-va-rā-ṣa-ha ayam api avibhaktikaḥ, gatvā, aṃśakān, prathamapātāḥ, savituḥ, amīṣām, ca, tathā,
GS41aryabhcu:965: dvā ñakhi sā hdā hlya khicya etāni api dvādīni avibhaktikāni, mandoccam |
GS41aryabhcu:972: bhṛgoḥ va ṣaṣṭiḥ, kujasya rā catvāriṃśat, guroḥ ṣa aśītiḥ, śaneḥ ha śatam
GS41aryabhcu:973: | etān aṃśakān gatvā, eteṣām budha-bhṛgu-kuja-guru-śanīnām prathamapātāḥ vyavasthitāḥ iti
GS41aryabhcu:975: yadi prathamapātagrahaṇan na kriyate tadā sāmānyena dvayoḥ api pātayoḥ grahaṇam syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:976: tathā ca vikṣepādigrahaṇe niścayaḥ na syāt, yasmāt prathamapātāt uttareṇa grahāṇām vikṣepaḥ bhavati, dvitīyāt pātāt dakṣiṇena |
GS41aryabhcu:977: uktam ca ã prathamāt pātāt śaśinaḥ apamaṇḍalasya uttareṇa vikṣepaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:978: vikṣepaḥ dakṣiṇataḥ punar api pātāt dvitīyāt ca || iti |
GS41aryabhcu:980: ete eva pātāḥ ṣaḍrāśiyutāḥ dvitīyapātāḥ bhavanti |
GS41aryabhcu:983: yadi grahapātāḥ calanti tadā evam yuktam vaktum ã etān aṃśakān gatvā prathamapātāḥ vyavasthitāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:984: bāḍham calanti ete grahapātāḥ, anyathā hi ayam nirdeśaḥ eva na ghhaṭate “gatvā
GS41aryabhcu:986: yadi eteṣām grahapātānām [gatiḥ tarhi] candrapātavat yugabhagaṇanirdeśaḥ kim iti ācāryeṇa na kriyate ? anyat ca, yadi eteṣām gatiḥ syāt grahavikṣepāḥ na sphuṭāḥ bhaveyuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:987: atyantasūkṣmā eṣām gatiḥ, mahatā kālena kiyatī upacīyate, tataḥ stokatvāt antarasya vikṣepāḥ sphuṭāḥ eva lakṣyante |
GS41aryabhcu:988: ācāryeṇa gatimatvam pātānāt nirdeśatā teṣām gatiḥ api nirdiṣṭā eva “yasmāt iṅgitena,
GS41aryabhcu:989: ceṣṭitena, nimiṣitena, mahatā vā sūtraprabandhena ca, ācāryāṇām abhiprāyaḥ gamyate” |
GS41aryabhcu:990: tasmāt anena eva sūtrabandhena grahapātānām gatimatvam upadiṣatā teṣām yugabhagaṇān muktakāt eva nirdiṣṭavān, anyathā hi teṣām
GS41aryabhcu:996: kalpādeḥ gatakālāt gaṇanīyam ataḥ gatiḥ teṣām ||
GS41aryabhcu:997: tadānayanam idānīm ã kalpādeḥ abdanirodhāt ayam abdarāśiḥ iti īritaḥ khāgnyadrirāmārkarasavasurandhrendavaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:999: asmin budhādipātabhagaṇaguṇite svayugavibhakte bhagaṇādayaḥ pātabhogāḥ labhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:1002: etaiḥ yugavarṣaiḥ budhasya pātaḥ bhagaṇam ekam bhuṅkte, śukrasya trīṇi, kujasya
GS41aryabhcu:1004: eteṣām yathāsvam labdhāḥ pātabhāgāḥ yathāpaṭhitāḥ, etat eva guruśanaiḥ carayoḥ ekā tatparā [ca] labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:1009: meṣādiparamāṇoḥ prabhṛti gatvā prathamapāteṣu vyavasthitāḥ iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1010: atra “tātsthyāt tācchābdyam”, yathā “mañcāḥ krośanti”, mañcastheṣu krośatsu mañcāḥ krośanti iti ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:1011: evam atra api prathamapātavyavasthitān eva grahān prathamapātaḥ iti uktavān |
GS41aryabhcu:1012: tadā tāvantaḥ eva bhāgāḥ, na ete calanti |
GS41aryabhcu:1013: yadi api kaiścit eṣām gatiḥ ucyate tathā api asmākam nādaraḥ, yena atimahatā api kālena manāg api antaram na bhavati,
GS41aryabhcu:1014: yataḥ kaliyugānte śanaiḥ carapātasya tisraḥ liptāḥ, na kiñcit antaram |
GS41aryabhcu:1015: kaliyuge ca parisamāpte sarvam eva jagat pralīyate, pralīne ca jagati
GS41aryabhcu:1016: punar anyā sṛṣṭiḥ jāyate, tatra na jānīmaḥ kim bhaviṣyati iti |
GS41aryabhcu:1017: atha ca antare ne kiñcit antaram, na kaścit viśeṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1019: | anyathā hi anantatvāt kālasya gatiḥ eṣām alpā api upacīyamānā mahatī sañjāyate |
GS41aryabhcu:1020: sā ca anyathā na pratipattum śakyate iti pātayugabhagaṇanirdeśaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1023: budhabhṛgukujaguruśanīnām mandoccabhāgāḥ, kena eva prakāreṇa savituḥ dvā aṣṭasaptatibhāgāḥ, budhasya ñakhi śatadvayam daśottaram, bhṛgoḥ sā navatiḥ, kujasya hdā śatam aṣṭādaśottaram, guroḥ hlya sāśītikam śatam,
GS41aryabhcu:1025: ete bhāgāḥ eṣām grahāṇām pṛthak pṛthak mandoccam |
GS41aryabhcu:1029: prayojanam” [aṣṭādhyāyī, 1.1.1., pātañjalabhāṣyam] iti, evam atra api “dvā
GS41aryabhcu:1030: ñakhi sā hdā hlya khicya mandoccam” |
GS41aryabhcu:1032: yasya śīghrā gatiḥ tat śīghroccam, yasya punar gatiḥ eva na asti tat mandoccam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:1034: loke ã “śīghraḥ devadattaḥ” yaḥ hi kṣiprataram gacchati sa śīghraḥ, “mandaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:1035: yajñadattaḥ” iti yaḥ hi mandataram gacchati sa mandaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1036: evam atra api yasya atiśīghragatiḥ grahagateḥ tat śīghroccam |
GS41aryabhcu:1037: yasya punar grahagateḥ alpīyasī gatiḥ [tat mandoccam] |
GS41aryabhcu:1038: evam grahāṇām api yuktam eva etat |
GS41aryabhcu:1039: atha kim iti mandoccagatiḥ na abhihitā? ucyate ã sūkṣmatvāt ācāryasya na atra ādaraḥ, mahatā api kālena na kiñcit eva antaram bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:1040: api ca muktakena eva ācāryeṇa abhihitam iti sampradāyāvicchedāt avadhāryate |
GS41aryabhcu:1041: athavā gatvā aṃśakān savitrādīnām mandoccāni vyavasthitāni iti vyākhyāyate |
GS41aryabhcu:1043: yathā budhādīnām prathamapātāḥ “nā”dīn aṃśakān gatvā vyavasthitāḥ, evam eteṣām savitrādīnām
GS41aryabhcu:1046: teṣām ca mandoccānām atyantasūkṣmatvāt varṣagaṇena eva ācāryeṇa yat ākhyātam tat eva avyavacchinnasampradāyapratipattyā abhidhīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:1047: tat yathā ã aṣṭikṛtādryaṣṭinavājaiḥ uccayugam tigmadīdhiteḥ uktam |
GS41aryabhcu:1048: daśaghanaguṇitaiḥ abdaiḥ viśvān bhuṅkte kramāt bhagaṇān ||
GS41aryabhcu:1050: śataguṇitāḥ śaśijasya prāhuḥ bhagaṇān ca sapta eva ||
GS41aryabhcu:1052: śukrasya ardham sūreḥ bhagaṇaḥ bhogaḥ tayoḥ ekaḥ ||
GS41aryabhcu:1057: tat yathā ã mandoccānayanam pratyeteṣām kalpādeḥ abdanirodhāt gatakālaḥ khāgnyadrirāmārkarasavasurandhrendavaḥ, te ca 1986123730 |
GS41aryabhcu:1058: eteṣu varṣeṣu yathāsvam mandoccabhagaṇaguṇiteṣu svayugābdavibhakteṣu ravyādīnām mandoccānām rāśibhāgādayaḥ labhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:1059: eteṣām api kaliyugānte api alpam antaram, yataḥ ca śanaiḥ carasya api saptamātrā liptā mandoccasya upacayaḥ, na kaścit phalaviśeṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1060: yathā api tu śāstrasampradāyāvicchittikathane grahapāteṣu uktam tat atra api avadhāraṇīyam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:1063: mandaśīghroccaparidhipramāṇapratipādanāya āha ã jhārdhāni mandavṛttam śaśinaḥ cha, ga-cha-gha-ḍha-cha-jha yathā uktebhyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1066: jhārdhāni, mandavṛttam, śaśinaḥ, cha ga cha gha ḍha cha jha ete chādayaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:1073: “pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ” [aṣṭādhyāyī, 1.1.1, pātañjalabhāṣyam] iti anena nyāyena mandavṛttam śaśinaḥ cha, sapta jhārdhāni, sārdhaikatriṃśat
GS41aryabhcu:1085: yathā uktebhyaḥ yathā uktam yathoktam, tebhyaḥ yathā uktebhyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1087: nanu ca atra sambandhalakṣaṇayā ṣaṣṭhyā bhavitavyam, yathā uktānām iti |
GS41aryabhcu:1089: yathā uktebhyaḥ iti anayā pañcamyā mandoccaviśuddhebhyaḥ rāśibhyaḥ mandoccāt adhikebhyaḥ rāśibhyaḥ vā rāśyādibhyaḥ jyāvibhāgena ete paridhayaḥ guṇakārāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1090: yathā uktebhyaḥ iti anena eva vacanena mandoccam grahamadhyāt pātyate,
GS41aryabhcu:1093: yady asya ṣaṣṭiśatatrayaparidheḥ iyam jyā tataḥ abhīṣṭagrahaparidheḥ kā jyā labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:1094: sā eva jyā bhujāphalam koṭiphalam ca iti abhidhīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:1095: tatra jhārdhena apavartya ṣaṣṭiśatatrayaparidhim yathā uktāḥ ca grahaparidhayaḥ jhārdhāpavartitāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:1096: tena guṇakārabhāgahārayoḥ jhārdhāpavartitayoḥ karmaṇi kriyamāṇe iṣṭajyāyāḥ aśītiḥ bhāgahāraḥ yathoktākṣarasaṅkhyāparidhayaḥ guṇakārāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1097: śīghroccaparidhayaḥ ã jhā, nava jhārdhāni, catvāriṃśat sārdhāḥ bhāgāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:1101: jhārdhāni, śatadvayam aṣṭatriṃśaduttaram sārdham bhāgānām kujasya |
GS41aryabhcu:1103: ekonaṣaṣṭiḥ jhārdhāni, pañcaṣaṣtyadhikaśatadvayam sārdham bhāgānām bhṛgoḥ
GS41aryabhcu:1104: | dḍa ekatriṃśat jhārdhāni, ekonacatvāriṃśaduttaram śatam sārdham bhāgānām budhasya |
GS41aryabhcu:1107: śīghroccebhyaḥ iti vaktavye uccaśīghrebhyaḥ iti viparītanirdeśam kurvan ācāryaḥ jñāpayati ã śīghroccāt grahaḥ śodhyate iti |
GS41aryabhcu:1111: śaśī sarvebhyaḥ śīghraḥ lakṣyate, tasmāt mandaḥ savitā, tataḥ mandaḥ budhaḥ, tathā uttaram
GS41aryabhcu:1116: etebhyaḥ eva mandaśīghrebhyaḥ dvitīyacaturthapadaparidhipramāṇaparijñānāya āha ã mandāt ṅa-kha-da-ja-ḍā
GS41aryabhcu:1120: mandāt, ṅa kha da ja ḍā iti etāni avibhaktikāni, vakriṇām, dvitīye, pade,
GS41aryabhcu:1121: caturthe, ca, jā ṇa kla chla jhna etāni avibhaktikāni, uccāt, śīghrāt,
GS41aryabhcu:1124: tathā eva mandoccaviśuddhāt rāśyādikāt utpannāyāḥ jyāyāḥ ete paridhisaṃjñitāḥ guṇakārāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1125: tathā eva jhārdhapramāṇaparimitāḥ ã budhasya ṅa, pañca jhārdhāni, dvāviṃśatissārdhabhāgāḥ, bhṛgoḥ kha, dve jhārdhe,
GS41aryabhcu:1134: vakriṇaḥ iti anena śaśisavitroḥ agrahaṇam, yena tayoḥ vakrā gatiḥ na asti |
GS41aryabhcu:1138: ye pūrvābhihitāḥ paridhayaḥ te utsargeṇa caturṣu padeṣu prāptāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1139: teṣām dvitīyacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ ete paridhayaḥ apavādena abhidhīyante |
GS41aryabhcu:1141: cakāraḥ dvitīyeṣu ca caturtheṣu ca iti etat artham samuccinoti |
GS41aryabhcu:1143: ete budhādayaḥ grahāḥ dvitīye pade vakriṇaḥ bhavanti |
GS41aryabhcu:1145: nanu ca mandagrahaṇānantaram dvitīye pade vakriṇaḥ iti ucyante, tena mandoccasya dvitīyapade vakraparijñānam prāpnoti, tat ca na iṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:1147: vakriṇaḥ dvitīye pade budhādayaḥ iti sāmānyena ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:1148: “sāmānyacodanāḥ ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhante “ iti viśeṣe avasthāpyate |
GS41aryabhcu:1150: śīghroccadvitīyapade eteṣām budhādīnām vakraparijñānam iti ayam viśeṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1151: uktam ca ã mandoccāt anulomam pratilomam ca eva śīghroccāt |
GS41aryabhcu:1155: ete paridhayaḥ dvitīye caturthe ca pade guṇakārāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1156: dvitīye eva pade vakraparijñānam anyatra api ã prathame dṛśyavidhānam dvitīyapadagāḥ tu vakragāḥ sarve |
GS41aryabhcu:1157: anuvakragāḥ tṛtīye pade caturthe astam upayānti || iti |
GS41aryabhcu:1167: budhasya jhna, ekonaviṃśajjhārdhāni triṃśaduttaram śatam sārdham bhāgānām |
GS41aryabhcu:1169: atra api śīghroccāt iti vaktavye uccāt śīghrāt iti viparītagrahaṇam kurvannāccāryaḥ jñāpayati ã śīghroccāt grahaḥ śodhyate iti |
GS41aryabhcu:1170: padacatuṣṭayagrahaṇāt ca karmacatuṣṭayam ã prathamam mandoccakarma,
GS41aryabhcu:1171: tadanantaram śīghrakarma, punar mandakarma, tadanantaram śīghrakarma |
GS41aryabhcu:1174: atha kaścit jyārahitam karma kartum icchati, tadartham āha ã giyiṅśa kuvāyukakṣyāntyā |
GS41aryabhcu:1177: kuḥ bhūḥ, kuvāyuḥ bhūsambandhī vāyuḥ, tasya iyam antyā kakṣyā |
GS41aryabhcu:1178: etāvataḥ vāyukakṣyāparicchinnākāśapradeśāt parataḥ niyataḥ vāyuḥ yena niyatagatinā pravaheṇa jyotiścakram idam bhrāmyate |
GS41aryabhcu:1179: kuvāyukakṣyāpramāṇaparicchinnāt ākāśapradeśāt ārādaniyatāḥ vāyavaḥ itaḥ tataḥ paribhramanti kuvāyukakṣyāyāḥ grahakarma ã ye abhīṣṭāḥ bhāgāḥ tān cakrārdhabhāgebhyaḥ viśodhya śeṣam taiḥ eva abhīṣṭabhāgaiḥ guṇitam pratirāśya ekam kuvāyukakṣyāyāḥ dvādaśaguṇitāyāḥ śodhyate, tataḥ śeṣasya yaḥ caturthoṃśaḥ sa bhāgahāraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1180: yat pratirāśitam tat antyaphalena guṇitam bhāgahāreṇa vibhajet |
GS41aryabhcu:1182: uktam ca asmābhiḥ karmanibandhe ã makhyādirahitam karma kathyate tatsamāsataḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1190: atra aśeṣagrahakarma, tat ca jyāpratibandham iti ataḥ jyādarśanārtham āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:1191: makhi bhakhi phakhi dhakhi ṇakhi ñakhi ṅakhi hasjha skaki kiṣga śghaki kighva |
GS41aryabhcu:1192: ghlaki kigra hakya dhaki kica sga jhaśa ṅva kla pta pha cha kalārdhajyāḥ || 12 ||
GS41aryabhcu:1195: kalāḥ ca tāḥ ardhajyāḥ ca kalārdhajyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1197: ardhajyābhiḥ yataḥ śāstravyavahāraḥ tena ardhajyā eva uktā || 12 ||
GS41aryabhcu:1199: daśagītikāsūtraparijñānaphalapradarśanāya āha ã daśagītikasūtram idam bhūgrahacaritam bhapañjare jñātvā |
GS41aryabhcu:1200: grahabhagaṇaparibhramaṇam sa yāti bhittvā param brahma || 13 ||
GS41aryabhcu:1204: grahāṇām caritanibandhanatvāt etat eva daśagītikasūtram grahacaritam, grahacaritahetutvāt vā yathāsukham kṛtam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:1206: na anyaloke grahacaritanibandhanam asti yataḥ daśagītikasūtram tena ucyate bhūgrahacaritam
GS41aryabhcu:1209: grahacaritam jñātvā, avagamya, grahāṇām sphuṭagateḥ pratipattihetuḥ
GS41aryabhcu:1210: yataḥ golaḥ, etat grahāṇām bhānām ca paribhramaṇamārgam bhittvā param brahma yāti |
GS41aryabhcu:1211: yaḥ gole samagram daśagītikasūtrapratibaddham grahacaritam jānāti sa param brahma yāti iti daśagītikasūtrarthā vyākhyātā bhāskareṇa mandadhiyām |
GS41aryabhcu:1212: pratipattaye prakāmam sarvaḥ hi samānabhūtaye yatate ||
GS41aryabhcu:1219: ācāryāryabhaṭaḥ tapobhiḥ amalaiḥ ārādhya padmodbhavam yat lebhe grahacārasāraviṣayam bījam mahārtham sphuṭam |
GS41aryabhcu:1220: tasya atīndriyagocarārthanipuṇaspaṣṭorusadvastunaḥ vyākhyānam gurupādalabdham adhunā kiñcit mayā likhyate || 2 ||
GS41aryabhcu:1223: kālakriyā, golaḥ iti yat etat gaṇitam tat dvividham caturṣu sanniviṣṭam |
GS41aryabhcu:1224: vṛddhiḥ hi apacayaḥ ca iti dvividham |
GS41aryabhcu:1227: āha ca ã saṃyogabhedā guṇanāgatāni śuddheḥ ca bhāgaḥ gatamūlamuktam |
GS41aryabhcu:1228: vyāptam samīkṣya upacayakṣayābhyām vidyāt idam dvyātmakam eva śāstram ||
GS41aryabhcu:1230: tāni ca ã asadṛṣayaḥ rāśyoḥ abhyāsaḥ guṇanā, yathā caturṇām pañcānām ca viṃśatiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1232: dvigatam vargaḥ, yathā caturṇām caturṇām ca ṣoḍaśa |
GS41aryabhcu:1233: evam trigatam ghanaḥ, yathā caturṇām caturṇām caturṇāñ ca catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1234: “śuddheḥ ca” iti atra yogārtham cakāraḥ paṭhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:1235: tena śreḍhīkuṭṭākārādiṣu loke ca aniyatasvarūpavṛddhiḥ sā ca parigṛhītā bhavati
GS41aryabhcu:1238: śuddheḥ apacayasya bhedaḥ bhāgaḥ, gatānām mūlāni ca |
GS41aryabhcu:1239: atra api śreḍhīkuṭṭākārādi[ṣu] loke ca aniyatasvarūpaḥ apacayaḥ cakārāt eva parigṛhyate
GS41aryabhcu:1240: evam śāstre, loke ca na saḥ asti gaṇitaprakāraḥ yaḥ ayam vṛddhyātmakaḥ apacayātmakaḥ vā na bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:1241: yadi evam atra katham prakriyā parikalpanīyā? yatra caturbhāgaḥ pañcabhāgena guṇitaḥ jātaḥ viṃśatibhāgaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1242: iyam ca guṇanā saṃyogasya bhedaḥ ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:1243: sa ca ayam śuddheḥ bhedaḥ āpatitaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1244: yatra caturbhāgena viṃśatibhāgasya bhāgaḥ, tatra dṛṣṭaḥ pañcabhāgaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1245: evam ayam śuddheḥ bhedaḥ saṃyogabhedaḥ āpatitaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1246: ubhayatra parigāraḥ ucyate ã [ ekāyām avistāre caturaśrakṣetre viṃśatyāyātacaturaśrakṣetrāṇi
GS41aryabhcu:1247: ] tatra ekasya āyāmaḥ pañcabhāgaḥ, vistāraḥ caturbhāgaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1249: viṃśatibhāgasya caturbhāgaḥ pañcabhāgaḥ iti na doṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1254: evam karaṇīparikarma ã karṇabhujayoḥ samatvam karoti yasmāt tataḥ karaṇī |
GS41aryabhcu:1256: anupātakuṭṭākārādayaḥ gaṇitaviśeṣāḥ rāśigaṇite abhihitāḥ, śreḍhīcchāyādayaḥ kṣetragaṇite |
GS41aryabhcu:1257: tat evam rāśyāśritam kṣetrāśritam vā aśeṣam gaṇitam |
GS41aryabhcu:1258: yat etat karaṇīparikarma tat kṣetragaṇite eva |
GS41aryabhcu:1259: yadi api anyatre karaṇīparikarma, tathā api tasya
GS41aryabhcu:1262: caturṣu sanniviṣṭam, catvāri bījāni, teṣu sanniviṣṭām |
GS41aryabhcu:1265: atra ācāryāryabhaṭaḥ śāstram ārabhamāṇaḥ cetasi iṣṭadevatāpraṇāmaḥ hi bhaktyā prayuktaḥ ã
GS41aryabhcu:1268: āryabhaṭaḥ tu iha nigadati kusumapure abhyarcitam jñānam || 1 ||
GS41aryabhcu:1270: iṣṭadevatāpraṇāmaḥ hi bhaktyā prayuktaḥ svābhiḥ lāṣateṣṭakāryavighātinaḥ vighnān vinihanti
GS41aryabhcu:1271: athavā devāsuramukuṭamaṇimayūkhamālālaṅkṛtacaraṇatvāt sarvāsām devatānām pradhānatamaḥ brahmā, ataḥ tasya ādau namaskriyām kṛtavān ācāryaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1273: svāyaṃbhuvasiddhāntasya ca vidhātā bhagavān vedhāḥ, tataḥ asya yujyate
GS41aryabhcu:1275: | akṣadeśāntarāyattā grahagatiḥ, tau ca akṣadeśāntaraviśeṣau bhūvaśāt iti tat anantaram namaskṛtavān bhuvam |
GS41aryabhcu:1276: śaśyādīn upari upari avasthitān tadgatinibandhanatvāt śāstrasya iti namaskṛtavān |
GS41aryabhcu:1277: brahmā ca kuḥ ca śaśī ca budhaḥ ca bhṛguḥ ca raviḥ ca kujaḥ ca guruḥ ca koṇaḥ ca bhagaṇāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:1279: ataḥ tān brahma-ku-śaśi-budha-bhṛgu-ravi-kuja-guru-koṇa-bhagaṇān, namaskṛtya praṇamya iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1280: bhāni jyotīṃṣi aśvinyādīni, teṣām gaṇaḥ bhagaṇaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1281: yat atra śaśyādīnām upari upari avasthāne vaktavyam tat kālakriyāpāde vakṣyāmaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1282: āryabhaṭaḥ iti svasaṃjñābhidhānena anyāḥ svāyaṃbhuvasiddhāntānusāriṇyaḥ kṛtayaḥ santi iti etat pradarśayati |
GS41aryabhcu:1283: tena bahutvāt svāyāṃbhuvasiddhāntānusāriṇīnām kṛtīnām kena iyam kṛtiḥ kṛtā iti na jñāyate
GS41aryabhcu:1292: kusumapuram pāṭaliputram, tatra abhyarcitam jñānam nigadati |
GS41aryabhcu:1293: evam anuśrūyate ã ayam kila svāyaṃbhuvasiddhāntaḥ kusumapuranivāsibhiḥ kṛtibhiḥ pūjitaḥ, satsu api pauliśa-romaka-vāsiṣṭha-sauryeṣu |
GS41aryabhcu:1297: saṅkhyāsthānanirūpaṇārtham āha ã ekam ca daśa ca śatam ca sahasram tu ayutaniyute tathā prayutam
GS41aryabhcu:1298: koṭyarbudam ca vṛndam sthānāt sthānam daśaguṇam syāt || 2 ||
GS41aryabhcu:1300: anyathā hi saṅkhyāsthāna nirūpaṇābhāvāt guruḥ gaṇitavidhiḥ syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:1301: katham? rūpabahutvasthāpanāyām rūpāṇi bahūni sthāpayitavyāni bhavanti |
GS41aryabhcu:1302: satyām punaḥ sthānakalpanāyām yat rūpaiḥ bahubhiḥ nirvartyam karma tat ekena eva nirvartayitum śakyate |
GS41aryabhcu:1303: ekam ca daśa ca śatam ca sahasram |
GS41aryabhcu:1306: ayutaniyute ayutam ca niyutam ca ayutaniyute |
GS41aryabhcu:1311: tathā tena eva prakāreṇa prayutasya saptamam sthānam |
GS41aryabhcu:1320: sthānāt sthānam anyat daśaguṇam svaparikalpitasthānāt uttaram sthānam daśaguṇam bhavati iti yāvat |
GS41aryabhcu:1322: nanu ca etāni sthānāni anantarāpekṣayā daśaguṇāni eva
GS41aryabhcu:1323: | yadi ebhyaḥ anyasthānaparigrahārtham vacanam tathā sati sthānābhidhānam anarthakam |
GS41aryabhcu:1324: kutaḥ? sthānāt sthānam daśaguṇam syāt iti anena eva abhihitā,
GS41aryabhcu:1327: sthānāt sthānam daśaguṇam syāt iti etat lakṣaṇam |
GS41aryabhcu:1330: na hi sūtrakārāḥ saṃkṣepavivakṣavaḥ lakṣaṇam udāharaṇam brūyuḥ
GS41aryabhcu:1332: yadā lakṣaṇam udāharaṇam ca nirarthakam tarhi ekādivṛndānatāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ saṃjñāḥ nirūpyante
GS41aryabhcu:1333: sthānāt sthānam daśaguṇam iti ekādisaṃkhyāyāḥ sthānanirūpaṇamātram eva upadiśyate,
GS41aryabhcu:1335: atra etat praṣṭavyam ã kā eṣām sthānānām śaktiḥ, yat ekam rūpam daśa śatam sahasram ca bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:1336: satyām ca etasyām sthānaśaktau krāyakāḥ viśeṣeṣṭakrayyabhojanāḥ syuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1337: krayyam ca vivakṣātaḥ alpam bahu ca syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:1341: kim tarhi taiḥ? tāni pratipādyante lekhāgamanyāyena |
GS41aryabhcu:1342: athavā laghvartham sthānāni prakramyante iti uktam asmābhiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:1345: vargaparikarmapradarśanāya āryāpūrvārdham āha ã vargaḥ samacaturaśraḥ phalam ca sadṛśadvayasya saṃvargaḥ |

GS41aryabhcu:2345: anirjñātadīpocchrāyāvasānayoḥ śaṅkucchāyādvayena ānayanam āha ã chāyāguṇitam chāyāgravivaram ūnena bhājitam koṭī |

GS41aryabhcu:2355: ūnena bhājitam, ūnam chāyayoḥ viśeṣaḥ, tena ūnena bhājitam |
GS41aryabhcu:2357: tat yadi prathamacchāyayā guṇitam tadā prathamacchāyāgrayaṣṭipradīpāntarālam

GS41aryabhcu:2373: dvitīyacchāyātaḥ api koṭī 28, bhujā sā eva 48 |
GS41aryabhcu:2374: viṣuvat ahani gaganatala[madhya]vartini savitari samadakṣiṇottaradeśacchāyāgrāntarālayojanaiḥ chāyāviśeṣeṇa śaṅkunā [ca]
GS41aryabhcu:2379: śaṅkubhujāvivaram, sakalajagadekapradīpaḥ bhagavān bhāskaraḥ svayam eva pradīpocchrāyaḥ iti ataḥ
GS41aryabhcu:2380: vivasvadavanitalāntarālayojanānayanam na ghaṭate, “bhūravivivaram” iti siddhānām eva yojanānām upadeśāt |
GS41aryabhcu:2381: atha savitā eva pradīpocchrāyaḥ iti savitṛviṣkambhapramāṇam ānīyate iti cet, tat ca na |
GS41aryabhcu:2382: yasmāt svakakṣyākarṇabhūvivarayojanaḥ gaganatalamadhyāsīnaḥ lokān dyotayan lakṣyate, tasmāt pradīpocchrāyaḥ svayam savitā [na] bhavitum arhati |
GS41aryabhcu:2384: vivaram, tathā ca dvitīyasya tāvat śaṅkoḥ avasthānābhāvāt ca na yujyate |
GS41aryabhcu:2385: tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam “pradīpacchāyā[dvaya]karmālāpāvatāraḥ api na upapadyate “ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:2387: tena tatpṛṣṭhavartinām asmākam vakratvāt paridheḥ śaṅkucchāyā bhujakoṭikarmaparikalpanā atra
GS41aryabhcu:2389: bhujākoṭikarṇakṣetrasaṃsthānam, na ca etāvatyā bhuvaḥ śakyate samīkaraṇam
GS41aryabhcu:2391: atha abhyupagamya idam udāhriyate ã viṣuvatī ujjayinyām dinārdhavartinī uṣṇadīdhitau chāyā pañcāṅgulā |
GS41aryabhcu:2392: tayā akṣaḥ labdhaḥ bhāgāḥ dvāviṃśatiḥ liptāḥ saptatriṃśat
GS41aryabhcu:2394: tataḥ ujjayinyā uttareṇa viṣuvatī eva madhyāhnacchāyā sthāneśvare saptāṅgulā |
GS41aryabhcu:2395: tayā ca akṣaḥ labhdaḥ bhāgāḥ triṃśat sapādāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:2397: atra eteṣām yojanānām viśeṣaḥ aṣṭaṣaṣṭiḥ śaṅkudvayavivaram, chāyayoḥ antareṇa dvābhyām yuktā aṣṭaṣaṣṭiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:2401: taiḥ ca dvitīyacchāyayā nīyamānaiḥ laṅkāsthāneśvarāntarālayojanaiḥ eva bhavitavyam , yasmāt tasmin kāle vivasvadadhovasthitaḥ deśaḥ laṅkā |
GS41aryabhcu:2402: yadi vivasvān bhujā yadi vā vivasvataḥ yaḥ ucchrāyaḥ, tasmāt koṭeḥ laṅkāsthāneśavarāntarālayojanasaṅkhyānatvāt gaṇitakarma api atra na krāmati |
GS41aryabhcu:2403: atra ca yayā koṭyā bhujā sādhyate sā ca tāvat na siddhā, tayā asiddhayā siddhabhujā sādhyate iti etat ayuktam |
GS41aryabhcu:2404: anyat ca yat chāyā dvādaśāṅgulasya śaṅkoḥ pratyakṣam asmābhiḥ upalabdhā tayā āṅgulapramāṇayā yojanaiḥ karma kriyate iti etat ca na upapadyate |
GS41aryabhcu:2405: atha dvādaśayojanapramāṇasya śaṅkoḥ pañcayojanā saptayojanā ca chāyā iti etat api tāvataḥ śaṅkoḥ lambakena ṛjusthitiḥ aśakyā jñātum, na ca utkṣepaṇasthāpane |
GS41aryabhcu:2406: chāyā ca samāyāmavanau sādhyate tāvatsu yojaneṣu nimnonnatasarit iti ādiviṣamatā tena tadavagatiḥ na śakyate |
GS41aryabhcu:2407: tasmāt yathā āgamasiddhau eva sahasramarīceḥ ucchrāyaviṣkambhau |

GS41aryabhcu:2494: etena aṣṭādaśabhiḥ saṃkramaṇena labdham matsyabakagatipramāṇam vāpīpārśvaśeṣaḥ ca 10, 8 |

GS41aryabhcu:2504: vṛttāvagāhaśarānayanāya āha ã grāsone dve vṛtte grāsaguṇe bhājayet pṛthaktvena |

GS41aryabhcu:2513: sampāte śarau sampātaśarau, avagrāhaśarau iti yāvat |
GS41aryabhcu:2515: yasmāt mahāviṣkambhasya alpaḥ śaraḥ mahatvāt maṇḍalasya, alpavyāsasya mahān śaraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:2516: yasmāt alpasya maṇḍalasya alpaḥ api avayavaḥ ativakraḥ
GS41aryabhcu:2519: uddeśakaḥ ã aśītiviṣkambhatamomayena dvātriṃśat indoḥ sthagitā yadā aṣṭau |

GS41aryabhcu:2525: | anena labdhau śarau candramasaḥ 6, rāhoḥ 2, parasparataḥ iti || 18 ||
GS41aryabhcu:2527: atha idānīm śreḍhīgaṇitānayanāya āha ã iṣṭam vyekam dalitam sapūrvam uttaraguṇam samukham madhyam |
GS41aryabhcu:2528: iṣṭaguṇitam iṣtadhanam tu athavā ādyantam padārdhahatam || 19 ||

GS41aryabhcu:2540: atra bahūni sūtrāṇi muktakavyavasthitāni, teṣām yathāsaṃyogam sambandhaḥ |

GS41aryabhcu:2543: “iṣṭam vyekam sapūrvam uttaraguṇam samukham” iti antyopāntyādidhanānayanārtham |

GS41aryabhcu:2547: uddeśakaḥ ã ādiḥ dvitayam dṛṣṭam śreḍhyāḥ pravadanti ca uttaram trīṇi |
GS41aryabhcu:2548: gacchaḥ pañca niruktaḥ madhyāśeṣe dhane brūhi || 1 ||

GS41aryabhcu:3973: sa yaḥ asau māsaḥ abhihitaḥ saḥ trimśaddivasaḥ iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:3975: tasya divasasya ekasya pramāṇam ṣaṣṭiḥ nāḍyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:3980: atra ucyate ã “varṣam dvādaśa māsāḥ” iti ādi na ārabdhavyam,
GS41aryabhcu:3982: sarveṣu eva ayam nyāyaḥ lokavedaprasiddhyā aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:3983: “varṣam dvādaśamāsāḥ” iti ādi vinā api lakṣaṇena lokaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:3984: jānīte, tathā ca bhṛtakebhyaḥ bhuktavetanam dadāti |
GS41aryabhcu:3985: yadi lokaprasiddham api abhidhīyate tadā atra bahu vaktavyam jāyate |
GS41aryabhcu:3990: atha yadi api lokaprasiddhiḥ aṅgīkriyate tathā api tu “vargākṣarāṇi varge” [gītikāí, 2] iti atra vargāvargākṣarasvaranirūpaṇam
GS41aryabhcu:3996: lokaḥ pūrvācāryāḥ abāhyaśāstrāṇām praṇetāraḥ iti uktam |
GS41aryabhcu:3997: “vargākṣarāṇi varge” [gītikāí, 2] iti atra vargāvargākṣarasvaranirūpaṇāyām vyākaraṇam abāhyam śāstram |
GS41aryabhcu:3999: ṣaṣṭiḥ vināḍikā” [kālakriyāí, 2] iti atra gurvakṣarāṇām lakṣaṇam vaktavyam |
GS41aryabhcu:4000: yadi “varṣam dvādaśa māsāḥ” iti ādi granthaḥ na ārabhyate tadā etat sarvam lokaprasiddhyā setsyati |
GS41aryabhcu:4003: anārabhyamāṇāyām asyām paribhāṣāyām sāvanasya eva mānasya ete bhedāḥ syuḥ na sauracāndranākṣatrāṇām,
GS41aryabhcu:4004: yasmāt sāvanam eva ekam mānam lokaprasiddham, na sauracāndranākṣatrāṇi |
GS41aryabhcu:4005: tat sarveṣu eva māneṣu iyam eva paribhāṣā yathā syāt iti [sūtram
GS41aryabhcu:4007: anyathā hi “ravimāsebhyaḥ adhikāḥ tu ye cāndrāḥ” [kālakriyāí, 6] iti atra ravibhagaṇānām dvādaśa guṇakāraḥ na labhyeta, “śaśidivasāḥ vijñeyāḥ bhūdivasonāḥ tithipralayāḥ” [kālakriyāí, 6] iti atra śaśidivasānām
GS41aryabhcu:4008: triṃśatkaḥ guṇakāraḥ na labhyeta, “ṣaṣṭiḥ nāḍyaḥ divasaḥ” iti atra api
GS41aryabhcu:4010: anyathā hi icchayā vibhāgaḥ divasasya śakyate parikalpayitum |
GS41aryabhcu:4011: icchayā vibhāge parikalpyamāne kaḥ punar horāśāstravirodhaḥ?
GS41aryabhcu:4012: ucyate ã ādyantarāśyorudayapramāṇam dvau dvau muhūrtau niyatam pradiṣṭau |
GS41aryabhcu:4014: sā ca nāḍikā divasasya ṣaṣṭibhāgaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4015: anyathā parikalpyamāne ayam arthaḥ anyathā syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:4016: katham punar divasasya ṣaṣṭibhāgaḥ sādhyate iti atra abhidhīyate ã atra kecit bruvate ã “suvarṇarajatatāmrāṇām anyatamam pātram ardhavṛttākāram
GS41aryabhcu:4017: ṣaṣṭipalapānīyādhārakam pūrakam nisrāvakam vā ghaṭike” iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4019: yāvat palāni ṣaṣṭiḥ pānīyam prasravati āpūryate vā, tāvatā nāḍikākālaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4020: prājñāḥ tu na evam iti manyante |
GS41aryabhcu:4022: ahorātraprasrutasya pānīyasya ṣaṣṭibhāgaḥ ghaṭikāpramāṇaḥ iti sthūlaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4024: nirdiṣṭākārasya śaṅkoḥ ghaṭikācchāyām aṅkayitvā ghaṭikā sādhyate,
GS41aryabhcu:4026: gurvakṣarāṇi ṣaṣṭiḥ vināḍikā ārkṣī ṣaṭ eva vā prāṇāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4029: gurūṇi ca tāni akṣarāṇi ca gurvakṣarāṇi, ṣaṣṭiḥ vināḍikā ārkṣī |
GS41aryabhcu:4030: yāvatā kālena ṣaṣṭiḥ gurvakṣarāṇi paṭhitāni tāvān kālaḥ vināḍīsaṃjñitaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4031: “gurvakṣarāṇi ṣaṣṭiḥ vināḍikā” iti anena sarveṣām eva saurasāvananākṣatracāndrāṇām mānānām
GS41aryabhcu:4032: vināḍikākālatulyatāyām prasaktāyām tadviṣayanirūpaṇārtham āha ã ārkṣī |
GS41aryabhcu:4033: katamā vināḍikā gurvakṣarāṇi ṣaṣṭiḥ? ārkṣī, na śeṣāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4037: ayam ca kālaḥ vināḍikābhidhīyamānaḥ strītvam pratipadyate iti strīliṅganirdeśena vināḍikā iti uktam |
GS41aryabhcu:4038: ṣaṭ eva vā prāṇāḥ, prāṇāḥ ucchvāsāḥ, ārkṣyavināḍikāyāḥ pramāṇam |
GS41aryabhcu:4040: yataḥ āha ã “prāṇena eti kalām bham”
GS41aryabhcu:4042: ucchvāsakālena bhacakram kalām paryeti, ṛkṣacakram iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4043: atra ārkṣī vināḍikā ṣaṭ vā prāṇāḥ [tulyāḥ] |
GS41aryabhcu:4045: ataḥ jyotiścakrasambandhinaḥ prāṇāḥ liptāsaṅkhyāḥ iti prāṇaiḥ jyādikarma pravartate |
GS41aryabhcu:4048: [giītikāí, 12] iti uktatvāt prāṇaiḥ jyāgrahaṇam na prāpnoti |
GS41aryabhcu:4049: anyat ca ã sāmānyena eva “ṣaṭ vā prāṇāḥ vināḍikā” it ucyamāne sarvamānānām eva vināḍikākālasya tulyatāprasaṅgaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4050: avaśiṣṭānām mānānām vināḍikāyāḥ pramāṇam nāḍikāyāḥ ṣaṣṭibhāgaḥ eva |
GS41aryabhcu:4051: na tasyāḥ vināḍikāyāḥ avayavapramāṇābhidhānam kriyate, prayojanābhāvāt |
GS41aryabhcu:4053: “gurvakṣarāṇi ṣaṣṭiḥ” iti atra madhyamāyām vṛttau ṣaṣṭiḥ gurvakṣarāṇi vināḍikākālaḥ iti vaktavyam |
GS41aryabhcu:4054: anyathā hi tisṛṣu api vṛttiṣu aviśeṣeṇa grahaṇam prāpnoti |
GS41aryabhcu:4055: tat yathā ã drutāyām vṛttau ṣaṣṭiḥ gurvakṣarāṇi alpena kālena paṭhyante, bilambitāyām mahatā kālena iti, madhyamāyām punar na alpena, na mahatā kālena |
GS41aryabhcu:4059: | tat yathā ã loke anirdiṣṭeṣu kāryeṣu madhyamaprāptiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4061: “māsānte pakṣasya ante sa hi ākāśe deśe svam miśram vakram kāntam vṛttam pūrṇam candram sattvāt rātrau te kṣutkṣāma prādante śvetaḥ prājyaḥ krūraḥ tasmāt vā ante harmyasya antaḥ saṃsuptasya ekānte kartavyā” |
GS41aryabhcu:4065: te vā ṣaṭ, tasyāḥ eva arkṣyavināḍikāyāḥ kālaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4066: atra api svasthasya aśrāntasya nīrujasya yoginaḥ prāṇāḥ parigṛhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:4067: atra api svasthaḥ na mahatā kālena ucchvasiti |
GS41aryabhcu:4070: yogī na punar vyānavaśān mahatā kālena ucchvasiti |
GS41aryabhcu:4072: truṭi-truṭyavayavādayaḥ kālāvayavāḥ kasmāt na ucyante? evam manyante ã
GS41aryabhcu:4077: kim artham idam abhidhīyate ã “evam kālavibhāgaḥ” iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4079: evam tasya nirdiṣṭasya grahaṇam “evam kālavibhāgaḥ” iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4080: asya anabhidhānāt śakyate jñātum yathā aprapañcitapramāṇaḥ kālavibhāgaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4083: prakārārthe tu vyākhyāyamāne anye api kālavibhāgāḥ parigṛhītāḥ bhavanti |
GS41aryabhcu:4084: tat yathā ã pañcasaṃvatsarāḥ yugam, dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ, dvau māsau ṛtuḥ te ca vasanta-grīṣma-varṣā-śarad-hemanta-śiśirākhyāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:4085: ayanam, māsārdham pakṣaḥ śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ca, divasarātricaturbhāgaḥ yāmaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:4091: yathā kālasya vibhāgaḥ, kṣetrasya api bhagaṇāt |
GS41aryabhcu:4092: kālasya varṣāt prabhṛti vibhāgaḥ uktaḥ, kṣetrasya tu bhagaṇāt prabhṛti pravṛtteḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4093: tat yathā ã dvādaśarāśayaḥ bhagaṇaḥ, rāśiḥ triṃśat bhāgāḥ, ṣaṣṭiḥ liptā bhāgaḥ, ṣaṣṭiḥ viliptā liptā, ṣaṣṭiḥ tatparā viliptā iti īdṛśaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4094: uddeśakaḥ ã bhagaṇaḥ rāśiḥ bhāgaḥ kalā ca vikalā ca tatparā ca eva |
GS41aryabhcu:4095: kṣetrasya etāḥ saṃjñāḥ kālavibhāgena tulyāḥ syuḥ ||
GS41aryabhcu:4097: dviyogaparijñānāya āryāpūrvārdham āha ã bhagaṇāḥ dvayoḥ dvayoḥ ye viśeṣaśeṣāḥ yuge dviyogāḥ te |
GS41aryabhcu:4100: ye viśeṣaśeṣāḥ, dvayoḥ dvayoḥ grahayoḥ bhagaṇānām ye viśeṣaśeṣāḥ bhagaṇāḥ tāvantaḥ tayoḥ yuge dviyogāḥ babhūvuḥ bhaviṣyanti vā
GS41aryabhcu:4101: atra dvayoḥ dvayoḥ bhagaṇaviśeṣāḥ eva tayoḥ yogāḥ iti katham avasīyate, na punar tayoḥ abhyāsaḥ yogaḥ vā? ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4102: tat yathā ã dvau aśvau ca parimaṇḍalārohe parikalpitau |
GS41aryabhcu:4106: mahati maṇḍale yāvat maṇḍalacaturbhāgam gacchati tāvat alpe maṇḍale ardham gacchati |
GS41aryabhcu:4107: yāvat mahati maṇḍale ardham gacchati tāvat sakalam alpamaṇdalam gacchati |
GS41aryabhcu:4108: evam yāvat mahati maṇḍale ekaḥ parāvartaḥ tāvat alpe maṇḍale parāvartadvayam, tāvati ca tayoḥ ekaḥ yogaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4112: uddeśakaḥ ã guroḥ aṅgārakasya ca yuge kiyantaḥ yogāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4115: kaḥ punar atra dviyogānām viniyogaḥ? ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4116: yadi caturyugāhargaṇena iṣṭagrahayoḥ dviyogāḥ labhyante, [tarhi] kaliyātāhargaṇena kiyantaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4120: [śeṣam ṣaṣṭyā saṅguṇya yugadviyogaiḥ vibhajet labdham ghaṭyādi |] yadi caturyugāhargaṇena iṣṭagrahayoḥ dviyogāḥ labhyante [tarhi]
GS41aryabhcu:4121: kaliyātāhargaṇena kiyantaḥ iti labdham samatikrāntāḥ dviyogāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4123: taiḥ dviyogarāśyādibhiḥ mandagatigrahaḥ yuktaḥ śīghragatigrahaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:4124: śīghragatiḥ ca dviyogarāśyādihīnaḥ mandagatiḥ bhavati iti aparaḥ viniyogaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4125: dviyogaiḥ ca rāśyādīn ānīya tayoḥ api bhagaṇasamāsena api bhagaṇasamāsagatabhagaṇarāśyādīn vidhāya “antarayuktam hīnam” [gaṇitaí,
GS41aryabhcu:4126: 24] iti anena ekatra kṣipet ekatra viśodhayet, kṣiptaviśodhitayoḥ ardham tayoḥ gatabhagaṇarāśibhāgaliptāḥ iti anyaḥ viniyogaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4129: vyatīpātajñānāya āryāpaścārdham āha ã raviśaśinakṣatragaṇāḥ sammiśrāḥ ca vyatīpātāḥ || 3 ||
GS41aryabhcu:4140: te eva vyatīpātāḥ dviguṇitāḥ iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4143: atra idam praṣṭavyam ã [kim idam] vyatīpātayoḥ udāharaṇam āhosvit lakṣaṇam iti? yadi idam udāharaṇam tadā sarvam iṣṭam setsyati, tat astu udāharaṇam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4144: tat yathā ã candrādityau sphuṭīkṛtau yadi ekatra dvādaśarāśayaḥ tadā vyatīpātaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4145: nanu ca loke dvādaśarāśikaḥ vaidhṛtaḥ iti prasiddham ? na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4146: saṃjñākṛtaḥ bhedaḥ na phalam prati, yasmāt vyatīpātasya vaidhṛtasya ca tulyam phalam bhagavadbhiḥ gargādibhiḥ upadiṣṭam |
GS41aryabhcu:4147: tau eva sūryācandramasau sphuṭau ekatra yadi ṣaḍrāśayaḥ tadā api vyatīpātaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4148: atha vyatīpātasya atītaiṣyaparijñānārtham trairāśikam ã yadi sūryācandramasoḥ sphuṭabhuktisamāsena ṣaṣṭighaṭikāḥ labhyante, [tadā]
GS41aryabhcu:4149: anena atītaiṣyeṇa kiyatya iti labhdam ghaṭikāḥ vighaṭikāḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:4150: athavā atītaiṣyavyatīpātakālikau sūryācandramasau jñātum icchati, tadā atītaiṣyeṇa saha trairāśikam ã yadi sūryācandramasoḥ sphuṭabhuktisamāsena sūryabhuktiḥ candrabhuktiḥ vā labhyate, [tadā] anena atītaiṣyasūryācandramasoḥ bhuktisamāsena kim iti bhuktiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4155: uktam ca ã nānāyane vyatīpātaḥ tulyāpakramayoḥ tayoḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4156: uddeśaḥ tasya cakrārdham vikṣepam ca adhikonakam ||
GS41aryabhcu:4159: sūryācandramasau nānāyane tulyāpakramau yadā bhavataḥ tadā
GS41aryabhcu:4160: vyatīpātaḥ, candrasya vikṣepasahitaḥ rahitaḥ vā apakramaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4163: uccanīcaparivartajñānārtham āha ã svoccabhagaṇāḥ svabhagaṇaiḥ viśeṣitāḥ svoccanīcaparivartāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4165: svakīyam uccam svoccam, tasya svoccasya bhagaṇāḥ svoccabhagaṇāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4166: atra grahāṇām uccadvayam, mandoccam śīghroccam ca |
GS41aryabhcu:4167: atra katarat uccam parigṛhyate? śīghroccam iti āha |
GS41aryabhcu:4168: mandoccasya yadi api gatiḥ abhyupagatā tathā api yugabhagaṇasya vyavahāraḥ na asti iti śīghroccabhagaṇāḥ eva parigṛhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:4170: uccabhagaṇānām svabhagaṇānām ca yaḥ viśeṣaḥ sa
GS41aryabhcu:4172: | yasmāt nairaṃśyāt yāvat nairaṃśyam tāvat udayāstamayavakrānuvakrāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4174: ye niraṃśadvayāntare divasāḥ te parivartasya divasāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4175: parivartāḥ grahāḥ ca yugādau meṣāditaḥ pravṛttāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4179: uccaparivartāḥ nīcaparivartāḥ ca tāvantaḥ eva, yasmāt ekasmin niraṃśadvayāntareṣu grahasya uccanīcaprāptī saṃbhavataḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4180: atha kaḥ punar uccaḥ, kaḥ vā nīcaḥ iti? yatra grahāḥ sūkṣmāḥ lakṣyante karṇasya mahattvāt sa ākāśapradeśaḥ uccasaṃjñitaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4181: yatra asau eva grahaḥ mahābimbaḥ lakṣyate karṇasya alpatvāt sa ākāśapradeśaḥ nīcasaṃjñitaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4182: atha parivartaiḥ api uccam kendram vā ānīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4183: katham? yadi caturyugāhargaṇena ete uccanīcaparivartāḥ labhyante, tadā kaliyātāhargaṇena kiyantaḥ iti labdham samatikrāntāḥ parivartāḥ, śeṣe
GS41aryabhcu:4185: parivartabhogarahitaḥ grahaḥ grahasahitaḥ vā parivartabhogaḥ uccabhogaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4189: atha “bhagaṇāḥ dvayoḥ dvayoḥ ye viśeṣaśeṣāḥ yuge dviyogāḥ te” [kālakriyāí,
GS41aryabhcu:4190: 3] iti asyām eva kārikāyām nanu gataḥ ayam arthaḥ kim atra abhidhīyate?
GS41aryabhcu:4193: atha ca tat dvayoḥ dvayoḥ grahayoḥ bhagaṇaviśeṣaḥ iti abhihitaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4196: guruvarṣanirūpaṇāya āha ã gurubhagaṇāḥ rāśiguṇāḥ aśvayujādyāḥ guroḥ abdāḥ || 4 ||
GS41aryabhcu:4198: guroḥ bhagaṇāḥ gurubhagaṇāḥ, bṛhaspatibhagaṇāḥ iti yāvat |
GS41aryabhcu:4201: aśvayuk abdaḥ, ādau bhavati [iti] ādyaḥ, aśvayuk ādyaḥ yeṣām te aśvayujādyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4202: guroḥ abdāḥ guroḥ saṃvatsarāḥ iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4204: | atra trairāśikam ã yadi caturyugāhargaṇena ete guroḥ abdāḥ vasuvasurasākāśamunidahanakṛtāḥ [4370688] [labhyante, tadā]
GS41aryabhcu:4207: labdhāsu samāsu dvādaśabhakte, śeṣāḥ aśvayujādyāḥ samāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4208: katham idam vijñāyate aśvayujādyāḥ samāḥ iti ? ucyate ã “aśvayujādyāḥ guroḥ abdāḥ” iti vacanāt
GS41aryabhcu:4209: nanu tat eva vacanam asmābhiḥ coditam parihāraḥ api asmābhiḥ ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4210: yasmāt yugādau aśvinyām amarapatigururudayaśikhariśikharamadhirūḍhaḥ tasmāt aśvayujādyāḥ guroḥ samāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4211: uktam ca ã yasmin udeti nakṣatre pravāsopagataḥ aṅgirāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4214: atha vasuvasurasākāśamunidahanakṛtasaṅkhyaiḥ [4370688] trairāśikena bṛhaspatiḥ api ānīyate
GS41aryabhcu:4216: bṛhaspatirāśayaḥ labhyante, [tadā] kaliyātāhargaṇena kiyantaḥ iti labdhāḥ rāśayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4219: ye samatikrāntāḥ guroḥ rāśayaḥ te samatikrāntāḥ guroḥ aśvayujādyāḥ saṃvatsarāḥ, śeṣe ca vartamānaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4220: atha vasuvasvādayaḥ guroḥ saṃvatsarāḥ iti abhidhīyante |
GS41aryabhcu:4221: nanu ca taiḥ yugasaṃvatsaraiḥ tulyaiḥ bhavitavyam? na iti āha |
GS41aryabhcu:4222: ye yugasaṃvatsarāḥ te sauryeṇa mānena dṛṣṭāḥ, am ca ye guroḥ abdāḥ te gurumānena |
GS41aryabhcu:4223: ttat eva yugam sauryeṇa anumīyamānam gaganajaladabindume[gha]yamahutāśakṛta

GS41aryabhcu:4500: tasmāt na arthaḥ anayā kārikayā, tathāpi lokavyavahārārtham adhimāsāvamānām
GS41aryabhcu:4506: adhimāsārtham trairāśikam ã yadi yugavarṣaiḥ māsaiḥ vā yugādhimāsakāḥ labhyante, tataḥ yātavarṣādibhiḥ kiyantaḥ iti adhimāsakalabdhiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4508: atra ca ayam praśnaḥ ã “tena divākaroḍupau” iti ahargaṇena vinā
GS41aryabhcu:4510: tat yathā ã yātavarṣeṣu dvādaśaguṇiteṣu gatamāsān kṣipet |
GS41aryabhcu:4511: tataḥ triṃśadguṇiteṣu divasān prakṣipya trairāśikam ã yadi pūrṇaviyadambarajaladharapayodharayamaśaraviṣayeṣucandraiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4512: yugasauradivasaiḥ yugādhimāsakāḥ labhyante, tataḥ etaiḥ divasaiḥ kiyantaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4514: śeṣe kṣepaḥ ucyate ã yadi bhūdivasatulyena avamaśeṣeṇa yugādhimāsatulyaḥ upacayaḥ adhimāsakaśeṣasya labhyate, tadā anena avamaśeṣeṇa kiyān iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4515: yat labdham tat adhimāsakaśeṣe prakṣipya yugacāndramāsaiḥ rasarāmāgnigutāśanatrikṛtatriviṣayaiḥ [5343336] bhāgalabdham bhāgāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:4517: triṃśaguṇādhikayutam divasarāśim kṛtvā trairāśikam ã yadi yugacāndradinaiḥ yugāvamadināni labhyante, tataḥ etaiḥ kim iti labhdam avamaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4520: atha kim artham adhikāvamaśeṣayoḥ śaśimāsabhūdivasaiḥ bhāgaḥ hriyate?
GS41aryabhcu:4521: ucyate ã yaḥ asau adhimāsaśeṣaḥ sa cāndramāsāvayavaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4522: ataḥ tena sacchedena trairāśikam ã yadi yugaśaśimāsaiḥ sūryabhagaṇāḥ labhyante,
GS41aryabhcu:4524: tatra śaśimāsāvayavacchedena saha ravibhagaṇena apavartanam ã ravibhagaṇānām ravibhagaṇabhāgena
GS41aryabhcu:4526: tatra bhagaṇeṣu bhāgam na prayacchati iti dvādaśa triṃśat ca guṇakāraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4528: tāvat bhāgena eva chedasya api rūpam eva |
GS41aryabhcu:4530: avamaśeṣaḥ api bhūdināvayavaḥ iti trairāśikam ã yadi bhūdinaiḥ cāndradivasāḥ labhyante, tataḥ anena bhūdivasāvayavena
GS41aryabhcu:4535: māsāḥ rāśayaḥ, dināni bhāgāḥ iti parikalpya avamaśeṣalabdhaghaṭikāḥ ca liptāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4541: tat yathā ã abhīṣṭavarṣāṇi dinīkṛtya trairāśikam ã [yadi] yugasūryadivasaiḥ yugādhimāsakāḥ labhyante, tataḥ etaiḥ abhīṣṭasūryadivasaiḥ kiyantaḥ iti, adhimāsakāḥ samatikrāntāḥ labhyante, vartamānasya ca śeṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4542: tat etat trairāśikam ã yadi yugādhimāsaiḥ yugāvamarātrā[ṇi] labhyante tataḥ etaiḥ adhimāsakaiḥ abhīṣṭaiḥ kiyantaḥ iti gaṇitanyāyena savarṇīkṛtya yugāvamaiḥ guṇayet |
GS41aryabhcu:4543: athavā abhīṣṭādhimāsarāśim aṃśarāśim ca pṛthak pṛthak yugāvamaiḥ saṃguṇayya aṃśarāśim yugasūryadivasaiḥ vibhajya labhdam upari kṣiptvā yugādhimāsakaiḥ bhāgalabdham abhīṣṭakālāvamāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4544: athavā trairāśikadvayam bhaṅktvā api ānīyante ã yadi yugasūryadivasaiḥ adhimāsakāḥ labhyante, tataḥ abhīṣṭadivasaiḥ kiyantaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4546: tataḥ punar api ã yadi yugādhimāsakaiḥ yugāvamāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4549: tatra pūrvatrairāśike yugādhimāsakaḥ guṇakāraḥ dvitīyatrairāśike bhāgahāraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4550: ataḥ guṇakārabhāgahārayoḥ tulyatvāt naṣṭayoḥ abhīṣṭadivasānām yugāvamaḥ guṇakāraḥ, yugasauryadivasaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4553: abhīṣṭavarṣamāseṣu tat utpannādhimāsakān prakṣipya triṃśatā saṃguṇayya trairāśikadvayam kriyate ã yadi yugaśaśidivasaiḥ yugāvamāḥ labhyante tataḥ abhīṣṭaśaśidivasaiḥ kiyantaḥ iti avamāḥ evam ekam trairāsikam |
GS41aryabhcu:4554: punar ã yadi yugāvamaiḥ yugādhimāsakāḥ labhyante tataḥ abhīṣṭāvamaiḥ pūrvatrairāśikaviracitaiḥ kiyantaḥ iti, adhimāsakāḥ labhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:4557: ataḥ guṇakārabhāgahārayoḥ tulyatvāt naṣṭayoḥ yugaśaśidivasaḥ bhāgahāraḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:4559: pūrvavat vā pṛthak pṛthak trairāśikena api karaṇīyam |
GS41aryabhcu:4561: tat yathā ã yadi yugādhimāsakaiḥ abhīṣṭagrahabhagaṇāḥ labhyante, tadā iṣṭādhimāsakaiḥ kiyantaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4566: tatra bhagaṇādayaḥ labhyante, [te] pūrvalabdhādhimāsakagrahabhagaṇeṣu yojyante tadā
GS41aryabhcu:4568: tataḥ punar api avamarātraśeṣam ṣaṣṭyā saṃguṇayya śaśidivasaiḥ eva vibhajet |
GS41aryabhcu:4570: tataḥ ã yadi ṣaṣṭighaṭikābhiḥ abhīṣṭagrahabhuktiḥ labhyate, [tadā] ābhiḥ ghaṭikābhiḥ kim iti
GS41aryabhcu:4571: labdham pūrvasthāpite grahe dadyāt, abhīṣṭadivasasya udayakālāvadheḥ [grahaḥ] bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:4572: atha avamaiḥ api ã yadi yugā[vamaiḥ abhīṣṭagrahabhagaṇāḥ] labhyante tataḥ yātāvamaiḥ kiyantaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4573: avamarātraparisamāptikālāvadheḥ abhīṣṭagrahabhagaṇādayaḥ labhyante, tataḥ iṣṭadivasaudayikaḥ kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4579: atra ayam praśnaḥ ã avamaiḥ yaḥ adhikamāsān avamāni ca yaḥ karoti adhikamāsaiḥJ|
GS41aryabhcu:4580: tābhyām vā graham iṣṭam tasya aham śiṣyatām yāmi || 1 ||
GS41aryabhcu:4584: tat yathā ã yugāvamam ṣaṣṭyā apavartya sthāpanā ã 418043 |
GS41aryabhcu:4585: atha ādityānayane tāvat ete apavartitāvamāḥ kena guṇitāḥ apavartitādityabhagaṇān apanīya tat apavartitabhūdinānām tu śuddham bhāgam dadyuḥ iti kuṭṭākāraḥ kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4588: anena avamaśeṣam saṃguṇayya apavartitabhūdinaiḥ eva vibhajet |
GS41aryabhcu:4592: etena śeṣaḥ ravimaṇḍalānām vācyaḥ vivasvān ca kalāntasaṅkhyam || 2 ||
GS41aryabhcu:4596: apavartitāvamāḥ kena guṇitāḥ apavartitacandrabhagaṇān apanīyā apavartita[bhū]dinānām śuddham bhāgam prayacchati iti kuṭṭākāranyāyena labdham kuṭṭākāraḥ 2119236 |
GS41aryabhcu:4598: athavā madhyamāt sūryāt sahayātabhagaṇaiḥ liptīkṛtya trairāśikam ã yadi yugaraviliptābhiḥ yugaśaśibhagaṇāḥ labhyante, [tadā] etābhiḥ yātaraviliptābhiḥ kiyantaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4599: labdham bhagaṇāḥ, śeṣe dvādaśādiguṇite madhyamaḥ candraḥ labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4600: athavā khakhaṣaḍghanena yadā yugaraviliptāḥ apavartitāḥ bhavanti [tadā] ravibhagaṇāḥ bhāgahāraḥ, śaśibhagaṇāḥ yātaraviliptānām guṇakāraḥ, phalam madhyamacandraliptāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4601: evam anena nyāyana candrāt abhīṣṭagrahāt vā iṣṭagrahaḥ ānīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4602: katham? nirjñātagrahayātaliptānām abhīṣṭagrahabhagaṇāḥ guṇakāraḥ nirjñātagrahayugaliptāḥ bhagaṇāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4604: atra ayam praśnaḥ ã savituḥ śaśinam karoti yaḥ śaśinaḥ sthititaḥ tārakagrahān |
GS41aryabhcu:4608: mānuṣapitṛdevānām varṣapramāṇanirūpaṇāya āha ã ravivarṣam mānuṣyam tat api triṃśadguṇam bhavati pitryam |
GS41aryabhcu:4611: ravivarṣasya ca pramāṇam abhihitam ã “ravibhagaṇāḥ ravyabdāḥ” [kālakriyāí, 5] iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4613: yat eva raveḥ varṣam tat eva mānuṣāṇām varṣam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4615: tat mānuṣyam varṣam triṃśadguṇitam pitryam varṣam bhavati, yasmāt māsaḥ teṣām ahorātram |
GS41aryabhcu:4619: piṭrṇām yat varṣam tat dvādaśaguṇitam ekam varṣam devānām,
GS41aryabhcu:4625: caturyugabrahmadinajñāpanārtham āha ã divyam varṣasahasram grahasāmānyam yugam dviṣaṭkaguṇam
GS41aryabhcu:4627: yat etat divyam varṣam tat dvādaśabhiḥ sahasreṇa guṇitam grahasāmānyam yugam |
GS41aryabhcu:4630: yasmāt sarve grahāḥ sahaśīghroccaiḥ yugapat mīnameṣasandhau bhavanti, tasmāt yugam grahasāmānyam
GS41aryabhcu:4633: asmākam tu yugapādāḥ sarve eva ca tulyakālāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4634: paurāṇikaiḥ tu bhinnakālāḥ vyākhyātāḥ ã catvāri āhuḥ sahasrāṇi varṣāṇām yat kṛtam yugam |
GS41aryabhcu:4635: tasya tāvat śatī sandhyā sandhyāṃśaḥ ca tathāvidhaḥ ||
GS41aryabhcu:4644: samāsitāni viyadambarākāśaśūnyayamarāmavedāḥ [4320000]| kim punar atra yuktam ã purāṇakāraiḥ yathā bhinnapramāṇāni kṛtādīni vyākhyātāni tathā pratipattum,
GS41aryabhcu:4645: āhosvit yathā asmākam ācāryeṇa pratipāditāni samapramāṇāni
GS41aryabhcu:4646: iti? yathā asmākam prasiddhāni tathā iti āha |
GS41aryabhcu:4647: yadi purāṇaprakriyāprasiddhāni yugapādapramāṇāni parigṛhyantām, tadā kaliyugādau grahāḥ mīnameṣasandhau yugapat madhyamagatyā na syuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4649: yugapādānām trayāṇām ekatrapramāṇam viyadambarākāśāṣṭavasuvasurāmāḥ [3888000] iti etaiḥ ahargaṇam utpādya yathāvihitamadhyamagrahagaṇitaprakriyāyām yugapat mīnameṣasandhau madhyamagrahāḥ na labhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:4650: anayā eva prakriyayā idānīm api grahagatyām sādhyamānāyām eva iṣṭagrahāṇām gatiḥ na labhyate
GS41aryabhcu:4651: yadi punar samam eva kṛtādīnām pramāṇam tat idam trayāṇām api yugapādānām pramāṇam viyadambarākāśaśūnyakṛtayamāgnayaḥ [3240000], anena yātena sarvam
GS41aryabhcu:4653: tasmāt “yathā asmākam prasiddhāni “ iti suṣṭhu uktam |
GS41aryabhcu:4655: grahayugam iti yat etat grahasāmānyam yugam tat parigṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4656: tat aṣṭottareṇa sahasreṇa guṇitam prajāpateḥ ekadivasapramāṇam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:4657: nanu ca atra api paurāṇikaiḥ saha virudhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4663: atra ca aṣṭottaram sahasram caturyugānām iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4665: paurāṇikaiḥ ã “sahasrayugaparyantam ahar yat brahmaṇaḥ viduḥ” iti abhidhāya taiḥ eva ekasaptatiḥ caturyugānām manvantaram caturdaśa manavaḥ brāhmaḥ divasaḥ iti
GS41aryabhcu:4667: atra ekasaptatiḥ caturdaśaguṇitā sahasrasaṅkhyām na prāpnoti
GS41aryabhcu:4668: | ucyate ca ã caturdaśa manvantarāṇi brahmaṇaḥ divasaḥ, sahasram caturyugānām iti svavacanavirodhaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4669: | asmākam tu dvāsaptatiḥ caturyugānām manvantaram, aṣṭottarasahasram brāhmaḥ divasaḥ iti yuktisiddham etam |
GS41aryabhcu:4670: katham punar idam jñāyate dvāsaptatiḥ caturyugānām manvantaram iti? gītikāsūktatvāt |
GS41aryabhcu:4671: kāhaḥ manavaḥ ḍha manuyugāḥ śkha | iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4675: utsarpiṇyapasarpiṇīsuṣamāduṣṣmāparijñānāya āha ãã utsarpiṇī yugārdham paścāt apasarpiṇī yugārdham ca |
GS41aryabhcu:4676: madhye yugasya suṣamā ādau ante duṣṣamā indūccāt || 9 ||
GS41aryabhcu:4677: utsarpiṇī nāma yasmin prāṇinām āyuryaśovīryasaukhyādīni upacīyante sa kālaḥ utasrpiṇīsaṃjñakaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4683: paścāt iti anena ustarpiṇīkālānantaram apasarpiṇīkālam darśayati |
GS41aryabhcu:4684: yasmāt pūrvapravṛttasya paścāt iti vyapadeśaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:4685: yasmin prāṇinām āyuryaśovīryasaukhyādīni apacīyante sa apasarpiṇīsaṃjñakaḥ kālaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4686: tasya ca pramāṇam yugasya paścārdham viyadambarākāśaśūnyarasenduyamāḥ [2160000]
GS41aryabhcu:4687: evam ca ã madhye yugasya suṣamādau ante duṣṣamenūccāt |
GS41aryabhcu:4688: tasya pūrvārdhasya madhye suṣamā duṣṣamā ca |
GS41aryabhcu:4696: indūccāt niṣpannāt yugāt ete utsarpiṇyapasarpiṇīsuṣamāduṣṣamākālāḥ avagantavyāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4697: atha kim ucyate indūccāt iti ? nanu ca grahasāmānyam
GS41aryabhcu:4702: tat yathā ã raveḥ maṇḍalāni ṣaṇmuniśarāḥ [576],
GS41aryabhcu:4706: atha yugasya kim lakṣaṇam? ucyate ã caitraśuklapratipadi ardhodite savitari laṅkāyām mīnameṣasandhau pravṛttaḥ grahaḥ punar mīnameṣasandhau caitraśuklapratipadi savituḥ ardhodaye laṅkāyām yāvatā kālena prāpnoti tāvat kālaḥ yugam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4707: uktam ca ã caitrasitādau sūrye viṣuvati ardhodite pravṛttasya |
GS41aryabhcu:4708: meṣādeḥ mīnāntam tathāvidhasya eva saṃprāptiḥ || iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4710: bhinnāgreṣu yugeṣu ekāgrīkaraṇam kuṭṭākāreṇa abhihitam ã “kaścit dvābhyām ekāgraḥ tribhiḥ dvyagraḥ” iti ādi |
GS41aryabhcu:4711: athavā indūccāt nimittāt utsarpiṇyapasarpiṇīsuṣamāduṣṣamāṇām gatagantavyam vijñeyam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4712: katham punar gatagantavyaparijñānasya indūccanimittatvam pratipadyate iti ?
GS41aryabhcu:4713: ucyate ã kuṭṭākāragaṇitena, yasmāt indūccayātāgrasya indūccabhagaṇāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4715: tat yathā asmin vastubhiḥ vā parikalpitaḥ uddeśakaḥ ã niśīthinīnām adhipasya tuṅgajam gatam tu rāśitritayam yadā bhavet |
GS41aryabhcu:4716: tadā kiyat yātam atha āśu gaṇyatām yugasya varṣāgradināgratām ca me || 1
GS41aryabhcu:4717: labdham varṣāgram viyadambarākāśaśūnyakṛtayamāgnayaḥ [3240000], dināgram ca śararavivasuvahnivedarāmavasurudrāḥ athavā ayam aparaḥ prakāraḥ ã utsarpiṇī yugārdham |
GS41aryabhcu:4718: utsarpati iti utsarpiṇī, upacīyate iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4719: kā sā utsarpiṇī? grahabhuktiḥ iti adhyāhāryam |
GS41aryabhcu:4720: sā punar kiyantam kālam utsarpiṇī iti āha ã yugārdham |
GS41aryabhcu:4723: yasmāt ekasmin maṇḍale grahasya grahaiḥ saha yogaḥ sambhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:4726: paścāt punar api apasarpiṇī yugārdham eva |
GS41aryabhcu:4728: madhye yugasya suṣamā, tasya yugasya madhye
GS41aryabhcu:4730: suṣamā āditaḥ antataḥ ca gaṇyamāne suṣamā, ekasya padasya āditaḥ aparasya antataḥ iti arthaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4733: katham etāḥ punar utsarpiṇyapasarpiṇīsuṣamāduṣṣamāgrahabhuktayaḥ vijñāyante iti atra āha ã indūccāt, candrakendrāt iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4734: tat yathā ã indoḥ kendrasya yadā rāśitrayam dvau bhāgau aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ ca kalāḥ, tadā prabhṛti madhyamabhuktiḥ upacīyate, yāvat kendram rāśiṣaṭkam saṃjātam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4735: tataḥ tasmāt rāśiṣaṭkāt kendrāt upacitānām bhuktīnām utkrameṇa apacayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:4736: yāvat kendrasya aṣṭau rāśayaḥ saptaviṃśatiḥ bhāgāḥ dvātriṃśat liptāḥ ca
GS41aryabhcu:4738: | etāḥ eva utkrameṇa dvitīyapadāntāt pravigaṇyamānāḥ tulyāḥ iti ādau ante
GS41aryabhcu:4740: athavā ādau ante ca, dvitīyapadanirdiṣṭakendrāt prabhṛti krameṇa yāḥ bhuktayaḥ yāḥ ca tṛtīyapadanirdiṣṭakendrāt utkrameṇa bhuktayaḥ tāḥ tulyāḥ, evam caturthaprathamapadayoḥ api, iti ādau ante ca suṣamā anyathā duṣṣamā |
GS41aryabhcu:4741: atra indukendram uddiśya ācāryeṇa utsarpiṇyapasarpiṇīsuṣamāduṣṣamāḥ pradarśitāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4742: etat vidhānam anyeṣām api grahāṇām pratipattavyam |
GS41aryabhcu:4743: tat yathā ã sūryasya yadā kendram rāśitrayam sacatuṣpañcāśalliptam, tadā sūryasya vyāsārdhatulyaḥ karṇaḥ, bhuktiḥ ca madhyamā |
GS41aryabhcu:4744: yadā ca aṣṭau rāśayaḥ ekonatriṃśadbhāgāḥ liptāḥ ca ṣaṭ gatāḥ [tadā api] vyāsārdhatulyaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4749: ācāryāryabhaṭaḥ svajanmakālajñānārtham āha ã ṣaṣṭyabdānām ṣaṣṭiḥ yadā vyatītāḥ trayaḥ ca yugapādāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4750: tryadhikā viṃśatiḥ abdāḥ tadā iha mama janmanaḥ atītāḥ || 10 ||
GS41aryabhcu:4756: yugasya pādāḥ yugapādāḥ, te ca yadā trisaṅkhyāḥ vyatītāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4762: etat eva ācāryāryabhaṭaḥ śāstravyākhyānasamaye vā pāṇḍuraṅgasvāmi-lāṭadeva-niśaṅku-prabhṛtibhyaḥ provāca |
GS41aryabhcu:4763: atha atra idam praṣṭavyam ã asya vyākhyānam kim upakaroti iti? ucyate ã anena atītena kālena parijñātena sukham ādityādīnām kālaḥ atītaḥ anāgataḥ vā paṭhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4764: atha ca sampradāyāvicchedāt vyatītaḥ kālaḥ vijñāyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4770: ekasya abhidhāne etāvataḥ tāvat sampradāyāvicchedāt araḥ na kartavyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4771: kintu ācāryajanmakālāvadheḥ yaḥ uttaraḥ kālaḥ asya eva sampradāyāvicchedaḥ adhigantavyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4772: anyat ca “ṣaṣṭyabdānām ṣaṣṭiḥ” iti asya abhidhāne prayojanam abhidhāsyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4773: ayam asya abhiprāyaḥ ã kṛtayugādeḥ ahargaṇaḥ sādhyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4775: kṛtayugādeḥ punar ahargaṇe kriyamāṇe śaśyuccapātayoḥ na eva kṣepaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4780: candroccasya rāśitrayam, rāśiṣaṭkam ca rāhoḥ kṣepaḥ, tamasaḥ ca maṇḍalāt vilomatvāt viśodhyate
GS41aryabhcu:4781: athavā karaṇāgatam eva tamaḥ yathā iṣṭasphuṭacandramasi prakṣipya dakṣiṇottaradigvidheḥ vikṣepānayanam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4782: atha ahargaṇe dṛṣṭe grahagatyānayanam ã yadi yugāhargaṇena grahāṇām gītikābhihitabhagaṇāḥ labhyante anena ahargaṇena kiyantaḥ iti, labdham samatikrāntāḥ bhagaṇāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4784: atha atra romakāḥ pratyabdaśodhanena ādityam ānayanti |
GS41aryabhcu:4785: tena ca ādityena sarvān eva grahān iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4787: tat yathā ã pratyabdaśodhanam hi nāma caitraśuklapratipadi ardhodayāt ārabhya yāvat ādityaudayikasya maṇḍalagantavyasya bhogakālaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4788: sa yugānte yugaravibhagaṇaiḥ pramāṇecchābhūtaiḥ divasasaṅkhyāḥ eva bhavanti |
GS41aryabhcu:4789: yathā iṣṭaravibhagaṇaiḥ trairāśikam kriyate, tat yathā ã “yadi yugaravibhagaṇaiḥ bhūdivasasaṅkhyaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4790: labhyate iṣṭaravibhagaṇaiḥ kiyān iti ahargaṇaḥ labhyate, śeṣe ṣaṣṭyādiguṇite ghaṭikādayaḥ iti ravibhagaṇasamāptikālāvadheḥ ahargaṇaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4794: athavā varṣāntikena ahargaṇena trairāśikam ã yadi caturyugāhargaṇena
GS41aryabhcu:4795: khughṛ-tulyāḥ sūryabhagaṇāḥ labhyante, anena kaliyātāhargaṇena kiyantaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4797: śeṣāt gatagantavyam kṛtvā gatagantavyarāśeḥ yugasūryabhagaṇaiḥ bhāgalabdham divasāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4799: | caitraśuklādeḥ upariṣṭāt adhaḥ vā ravibhagaṇasamāptikālāvadhayaḥ divasādayaḥ bhavanti
GS41aryabhcu:4800: etat eva pratyabdaśodhanam asmābhiḥ karmanibandhe laghutaram pratipāditam |
GS41aryabhcu:4801: tat yathā ã rudraiḥ sahasrahataṣaṭchakalaiḥ ca hatvā varṣāṇi randhravasuvahnisamānasaṅkhyaiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4802: yuktvā sadā pravigaṇayya kharāmabhakte māsāḥ bhavanti divasāḥ ca hṛte avaśiṣṭāḥ ||
GS41aryabhcu:4803: saṃhatya randhrayamalaiḥ sararāmabhāgaḥ bhūyaḥ agnivedaguṇiteṣu haret ca bhāgam |
GS41aryabhcu:4804: khavyomakhadvimunibhiḥ pralayāḥ tithīnām saṃyojya bhūtayamarudrahṛte dināni ||
GS41aryabhcu:4806: te yojitāḥ daśahatāsu samāsu saṃjñām samprāpnuvanti ravijāḥ iti niścayaḥ me ||
GS41aryabhcu:4807: ravijadivasayojyāḥ ca avamāḥ ye atra labdhāḥ satatam adhikamāsān śodhayet khāgninighnān |
GS41aryabhcu:4808: bhavati yat avaśiṣṭam śodhanīyam samāyām yadi tat adhikaśuddham kṣepyam eva upadiṣṭam || iti
GS41aryabhcu:4810: evam pratyabdaśodhanam ānīya tataḥ arkaḥ sādhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4812: uktam eva ã madhusitadivasādyaḥ hīnahīnaḥ gaṇaḥ ahnām divicarahṛtaśiṣṭaḥ vāramāhābdapādim
GS41aryabhcu:4813: tataḥ idam api śodhyam śodhanīyam samāyām patitasamatiriktaḥ gṛhyate na aparaḥ atra ||
GS41aryabhcu:4814: saptatyā divasādyāḥ śarabhāgāḥ dviguṇitāḥ vighaṭikāḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:4815: tadrahitaḥ grahadehaḥ ravibudhabhṛgavaḥ ca nirdiṣṭāḥ || iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4825: labhyante, tadā ekena ravidivasena kiyantaḥ iti trairāśikanyāyena [labdham
GS41aryabhcu:4829: ataḥ khakhaṣaḍghanasya khakhaṣaḍghanabhāge ekam, yugaravidivasānām khakhaṣaḍghanabhāgena dvāsaptatiḥ sahasrāṇi,
GS41aryabhcu:4830: iti ataḥ dvāsaptatisahasraiḥ pratisvasvagrahabhagaṇānām bhāgaḥ, labhyante grahāṇām sūryadivasabhuktayaḥ ataḥ ca yathālabdhāḥ likhyante ã candramasaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4831: liptāḥ dvāviṃśatiḥ liptātrisahasrabhāgāḥ navavasurāmāḥ, bhaumasya liptāḥ ekatriṃśat liptātrisahasrabhāgāḥ rūpakhamunipakṣāḥ, bṛhaspateḥ liptāḥ pañca liptāpañcasaptatyuttaratriṃśatabhāgāḥ dvāviṃśatiḥ, śanaiḥ carasya liptādvayam liptāṣṭādaśasahasrabhāgāḥ śaśikṛtarasāḥ, budhoccasya liptāḥ nava liptāṣaṭtriṃśacchatabhāgāḥ śaśīṣuvedāḥ, bhṛgoḥ liptāḥ saptatriṃśat liptāṣāṭsahasrabhāgāḥ navanavendurāmāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4832: evam yathāvilikhitasūryadivasagrahabhuktibhiḥ sūryāhargaṇam guṇayet, sūryabhuktaliptābhiḥ ca trairāśikena yat avāptam phalam prakṣipya khakhaṣaḍghanena vibhajet, śeṣam grahabhuktaliptāḥ iyān tatra viśeṣaḥ candramasi trayodaśaguṇaḥ sūryaḥ kṣepaḥ, budhocce
GS41aryabhcu:4834: etat api aśeṣagrahānayanam karma laghutaram eva karmanibandhe pradarśitam tatra eva avagantavyam iti || 10 ||
GS41aryabhcu:4836: kālapravṛtyānantyapratipādanāya āha ã yugavarṣamāsadivasāḥ samam pravṛttāḥ tu caitraśuklādeḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4837: kālaḥ ayam anādyantaḥ grahabhaiḥ anumīyate kṣetre || 11 ||
GS41aryabhcu:4838: yugam ca varṣam ca māsaḥ ca divasaḥ ca yugavarṣamāsadivasāḥ, ete samam pravṛttāḥ yugapat pravṛttāḥ iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4840: caitraḥ māsaḥ, tasya [yaḥ] śuklaḥ pakṣaḥ, tasya śukla[pakṣa]sya yaḥ ādiḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:4841: [sa] ardhodayaḥ iti arthaḥ, tasmāt caitraśuklādeḥ yugādayaḥ ye te yugapat
