GS41aryabhcu:4843: nanu ca yuge caitraśuklādeḥ pravṛtte sarve eva samam pravṛttāḥ syuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4844: tasmāt yugam caitraśuklādeḥ pravṛttam iti etat eva astu |
GS41aryabhcu:4845: na iti āha ã śāstrāntare varṣādīnām anyasmāt pravṛttiḥ abhihitā ã prathame vāsavasya aṃśe dvitīyāṃśe tu ajasya tu |
GS41aryabhcu:4847: saumyasya prathamāṃśe ca dvitīyāṃśe punar vasoḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4848: sārpasya aṃśe tṛtīye tu caturthāṃśe bhagasya ca ||
GS41aryabhcu:4849: tvāṣṭrasya ādyāṃśake ca eva dvitīyāṃśe viśākhayoḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4850: aindrasya aṃśe tṛtīye ca āpyasya aṃśe caturthake ||
GS41aryabhcu:4851: yadā samānām adhipaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ataḥ utthitaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4852: udayati aṃśakānte vā prathamaḥ paryayaḥ bhavet ||
GS41aryabhcu:4855: tasyām ca varṣapravṛttau bhinnāyām māsadivasapravṛttī api bhinne eva bhavataḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4856: athavā evam syāt ã iyam varṣāṇām pravṛttiḥ nānāprakārā phalārthibhiḥ saṃhitākāraiḥ upadiṣṭā
GS41aryabhcu:4857: na eṣā prasiddhā loke, na paratantreṣu |
GS41aryabhcu:4858: tasmāt yā paratantreṣu loke ca prasiddhā pravṛttiḥ tasyāḥ grahaṇam bhaviṣyati iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4860: tat yathā ã surāṣṭrāsu kārtikaśuklapratipadaḥ pravṛttiḥ varṣamāsadivasānām,
GS41aryabhcu:4863: tathā ca magadhāsu āṣāḍhe kṛṣṇapratipadaḥ samāmāsadivasānām
GS41aryabhcu:4865: tathā ca arthaśāstre api abhihitam ã “triśatam sacatuṣpañcāśatam ahorātrāṇām karma sāṃvatsaraḥ, tam āṣāḍhīparyavasānam ūnam pūrṇam vā dadyāt” iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4868: kṛtakṛtavarṣaiḥ yātaiḥ śakendrakālāt yugasya ādiḥ || iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4870: yugādīnām caitraśuklādeḥ pravṛttyabhidhānam siddham eva etat |
GS41aryabhcu:4871: idānām praṣṭavyam ã siṃharājena na śuklāntaḥ māsaḥ svatantre pratipāditaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:4872: tathā ca loke śuklāntaḥ eva prasiddhaḥ, horāyām api ã
GS41aryabhcu:4875: atra ucyate ã yat tu siṃharājena abhihitam tat svābhiprāyeṇa adhikamāsakāvamānām yugapat pravṛttatvāt āṣāḍhapaurṇamāsī [taḥ ārabhya
GS41aryabhcu:4878: “śuklāntaḥ māsaḥ loke prasiddhaḥ” iti, tat na |
GS41aryabhcu:4881: yat api ucyate ã candrayutāt navabhāgāt māsaḥ śuklāntanāmasamaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4882: iti, asya api anyaḥ eva arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4886: kṛttikāsu yuktaḥ candramā asmin sati kārtikaḥ māsaḥ iti ādi |
GS41aryabhcu:4887: anyat ca ã śuklāntena māsena na kadācit api mīnameṣasandhau māsasya varṣasya vā ante grahāḥ syuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4888: atra āha yavaneśvaraḥ ã māse tu śuklapratipatpravṛtte pūrve śaśī mandabalaḥ daśāhe |
GS41aryabhcu:4890: yadā punar śuklādiḥ māsaḥ tadā punar śrutyarthaḥ anuṣṭhitaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:4891: evam hi śrutau paṭhyate ã eṣā hi vai saṃvatsarasya prathamā rātriḥ yat phālgunī paurṇamāsī yā uttarā | iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4893: [yadi] kṛṣṇa[pratipad]ādiḥ māsaḥ syāt, tadā katham iyam uttarā paurṇamāsī phālgunī bhavati, yat uta tat caitramāsaḥ syāt ? kutaḥ?
GS41aryabhcu:4894: phālgunyām paurṇamāsyām phālgunaḥ māsaḥ pūrṇaḥ, tadā uttarā paurṇamāsī
GS41aryabhcu:4896: tataḥ manyāmahe na adya api phālgunaḥ māsaḥ samāpyate iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4897: yasmāt āha ã phālgunī paurṇamāsī yā uttarā |
GS41aryabhcu:4900: [ yā asau] vaiśākhasya amāvāsyā tasyām agnim ādadhīta, sā rohiṇyā sampadyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4903: yadi śuklāntaḥ māsaḥ parikalpyate tadā na vaiśākhasya amāvāsyāyām rohiṇyā candramasaḥ yogaḥ vidyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4906: tataḥ ca svātyādiṣu nakṣatreṣu pratipat [prabhṛti] gaṇyamānā amāvāsyā bharaṇyā yujyate, na rohiṇyā |
GS41aryabhcu:4908: nakṣatrārdhasya sakalasya vā hrāsavṛddhī bhavataḥ, na nakṣatradvayasya |
GS41aryabhcu:4909: śuklādau punar māse vaiśākhapaurṇamāsyām vyatītāyām vaiśākhasya eva amāvāsyā bhaviṣyati |
GS41aryabhcu:4910: tataḥ kṛṣṇapakṣapratipatprabhṛtyanurādhādiṣu gaṇyamānāsu rohiṇyā amāvāsyāyāḥ ca yogaḥ saṃbhavati
GS41aryabhcu:4911: anyat ca ã saḥ aparapakṣe apa oṣadhīḥ praviśati | iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4915: | anyat ca smārtavacanam ã aparapakṣe śrāddham kurvīta ūrdhvam vā caturthyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4916: iti atra kṛṣṇādi[māsatvāt] pūrvapakṣaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ, aparaḥ śuklaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4917: aparatvāt śuklapakṣasya śuklapakṣe eva śrāddhavidhiḥ prāpnoti na kṛṣṇe, iṣyate ca śukle [tare], tasmāt śuklādiḥ māsaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4922: pravṛtti]tvāt kālasya ādimattāprasaṅgaḥ iti āha ã kālaḥ ayam anādyantaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4923: ayam kālaḥ asmābhiḥ yugādiḥ abhihitaḥ, caitraśuklādeḥ pravṛttaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4924: na asya antaḥ na asya ādiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4926: yadi kālasya ādiḥ syāt tataḥ kim syāt? āha ã saṃsārasya ādimattā prāpnoti,
GS41aryabhcu:4929: katham punar asya ādiḥ vyavahārārtham parikalpitaḥ iti āha ã grahabhaiḥ anumīyate kṣetre |
GS41aryabhcu:4931: taiḥ grahabhaiḥ anumīyate ādiḥ antaḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:4932: “māṅ māne” [pāṇinīyadhātupāṭhaḥ 1143] iti ayam dhātuḥ dhūmāt agnyanumānam iti atra māne vartate |
GS41aryabhcu:4933: atra punar grahabhaiḥ anumīyate iti mānārthaḥ eva |
GS41aryabhcu:4935: kuṅkumādayaḥ vā palādibhiḥ, evam grahabhaiḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4936: yadā sarve eva grahāḥ yugapat mīnameṣasandhau kṣitisaṃyuktāḥ tadā yugasya ādiḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4937: kaḥ bhuvaḥ grahasya ca yogaḥ, dvayoḥ atyantaviprakṛṣṭayoḥ? na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4938: mukhyasya yogasya asaṃbhavāt gauṇaḥ yogaḥ parigṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4939: yatra bhūlagnaḥ iva grahaḥ lakṣyate sa bhūgrahayoḥ yogaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4940: sa ca udayāstamayayoḥ saṃbhavati iti udayāstamayayoḥ vā parigṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4941: anye punar anyathā vyāvarṇayanti ã grahabhaiḥ anumīyate iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4942: grahaiḥ ca nakṣatraiḥ ca kālasya ādiḥ antaḥ ca parikalpyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4943: tat yathā ã udeti yasmin nakṣatre pravāsopagataḥ aṅgirāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4944: tasmāt saṃvatsaraḥ māsāt bārhaspatyaḥ pragaṇyatām || iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4946: loke ca evam vaktāraḥ bhavanti ã “svātau udite prasthāsyāmahe udayaḥ “ iti, “śukre astam gate prasthitaḥ” iti, “adya kṛttikāsu madhyasthitāsu dārukaḥ [gataḥ]” iti ādi |
GS41aryabhcu:4948: kṣetram bhagolaḥ, tasmin bhagole, nakṣatragrahacāravaśāt ādiḥ antaḥ ca parikalpitaḥ || [ grahāṇām samagatitvam ]
GS41aryabhcu:4949: grahāṇām samagatipratipādanāya āha ã ṣaṣṭyā sūryābdānām prapūrayanti grahāḥ bhapariṇāham |
GS41aryabhcu:4951: ṣaṣṭyā sūryābdānām ādityavarṣāṇām ṣaṣṭyā grahāḥ nakṣatrakakṣyām
GS41aryabhcu:4952: prapūrayanti, nakṣatrakakṣyātulyāni yojanāni svāsu svāsu kakṣyāsu gacchanti iti arthaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4956: kim tarhi? kā eṣā pratipāditā iti? ucyate ã “bhavāṃśe arkaḥ” [gītikāí, 6] iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4957: atra katham punar etena eva nakṣatrakakṣyātulyāni yojanāni gacchanti iti ucyate? yadi
GS41aryabhcu:4958: khyughṛ-tulyaiḥ arkavarṣaiḥ svān-svān bhagaṇān grahāḥ bhuñjante [tadā]
GS41aryabhcu:4960: ṣaṣṭibhāgena api ṣaṣṭyā ekaḥ, punar ṣaṣṭibhāgena ete[ṣām] khyughṛ-tulyānām arkavarṣāṇām dvāsaptatisahasrāṇi
GS41aryabhcu:4962: tataḥ punar api ã yadi ekena bhagaṇena pratisvakakṣyā labhyate [tadā] ṣaṣṭyabdabhogena kā
GS41aryabhcu:4965: divi bhavam divyam, yugam iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4966: katham punar divyaśabdena yugam abhidhīyate? yasmāt divi sañcaratām grahāṇām ekatra yogaḥ bhavati, ataḥ [divyam yugam uktam tena] divyena nabhaḥparidhim |
GS41aryabhcu:4967: nabhasaḥ paridhiḥ nabhaḥparidhiḥ, ākāśakakṣyā iti arthaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:4968: | katham idam ucyate? nanu ca viyat aparimitayojanapramāṇam iti śrūyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4969: tasya parimitayojanapramāṇam katham kakṣyā bhavet? ucyate ã viyat asmākam yāvat divasakaramarīcinidhānam avabhāsayati tāvat viyat iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4971: atra khakakṣyābhidhānena etat pratipādayati, iyatpramāṇam viyadarkamarīcayaḥ prāpnuvanti iti
GS41aryabhcu:4974: yāvanti yojanāni svakakṣyāyām śaśī saṃcarati tāvanti eva yojanāni ārkiḥ api svakakṣyāyām sañcarati
GS41aryabhcu:4975: tat yathā ã yadi ekena bhagaṇena svakakṣyā labhyate [tadā] yugabhagaṇaiḥ kim iti khakakṣyā labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4976: athavā ã ṣaṣṭyabdabhogena nakṣatrakakṣyā labhyate svaiḥ yugabhagaṇaiḥ kim iti khakakṣyā labhyate
GS41aryabhcu:4978: kakṣyātaḥ grahāṇām madhyamānayanam ã yadi [yuga]bhūdinaiḥ sarve eva svāsu kakṣyāsu samagatyā
GS41aryabhcu:4979: [kha]kakṣyātulyāni yojanāni prayānti, ekena ahnā kiyanti iti sarvagrahāṇām yojanagatā dinabhuktiḥ labhyate iti, khakakṣyāyām bhūdinaiḥ bhāge hṛte yojanagatā grahāṇām dinabhuktiḥ labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:4980: tayā trairāśikam bhaṅktvā madhyamagrahāḥ ānīyante ã yadi svakakṣyāyojanaiḥ bhagaṇaḥ labhyate tadā gatiyojanaiḥ kim iti āhnikī bhuktiḥ labhyate, tataḥ punar api ã yadi ekena
GS41aryabhcu:4981: ahnā bhuktiḥ labhyate ahargaṇena kim iti |
GS41aryabhcu:4982: atra ekaḥ pūrvatrairāśike guṇakāraḥ, [apare bhāgahāraḥ |] ataḥ guṇakārabhāgahārayoḥ tulyatvāt naṣṭayoḥ ahargaṇasya dina[gati]yojanāni
GS41aryabhcu:4984: [uktam ca] ã ambarakakṣyā bhūdinahṛtā phalam tatra yojanāni teṣu |
GS41aryabhcu:4989: samagatyā pravṛttagrahakakṣyāvyavasthāpradarśanārtham āha ã maṇḍalam alpam adhastāt kālena alpena pūrayati candraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4990: upariṣṭāt sarveṣām mahat ca mahatā śanaiḥ cārī || 13 ||
GS41aryabhcu:4992: sarveṣām adhaḥ vyavasthitam maṇḍalam alpam alpe[na kālena pūraya]ti candramāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4993: adhastāt iti anena eva maṇḍalasya alpatvasiddhiḥ, alpam iti etat na vaktavyam |
GS41aryabhcu:4994: katham adhastāt iti etāvati ucyamāne maṇḍalasya alpatvam gamyate? ucyate ã upari upari kakṣyāḥ vyavasthitāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:4995: tāsām upari upari vyavasthitānām adhaḥ yā vyavasthitā sā sarvatanīyasī |
GS41aryabhcu:5000: 15] iti atra kakṣyāṇām upari upari vyavasthitim vakṣyati |
GS41aryabhcu:5001: nanu ca anye bruvate ã sarveṣām upari candramasaḥ kakṣyā iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5002: [tat ayuktam |] sarveṣām grahāṇām adhaḥ candrakakṣyā iti āha |
GS41aryabhcu:5003: yadi upari syāt tadā candrasya grahanakṣatrabhede sphuṭakalaṅkahariṇe grahanakṣatra[tārāḥ dṛśyeran] |
GS41aryabhcu:5004: sūryavaśāt yadi upari candraḥ syāt tadā sūryeṇa ārāt vyavasthitena sadā candramasoḥ api svasya ārāt bhāgam akhaṇḍam dṛśyeta, uparisthitaḥ [na
GS41aryabhcu:5007: anye punar sugata[matā]valambinaḥ sūryācandramasoḥ ekām kakṣyām ācakṣate ã
GS41aryabhcu:5009: ardharātraḥ astagamanam madhyāhnaḥ udayaḥ sakṛt || iti ||
GS41aryabhcu:5012: sūryaḥ tadā kim iti sūryaḥ [na] mahān upalabhyate, tulyau etau [ardho]ditau ardhāstamitau paurṇamāsyām lakṣyete? atha vidūratvāt arkaḥ na mahān upalakṣyate iti cet na |
GS41aryabhcu:5014: anyat ca tulyakakṣyāvyavasthitatvāt sūryācandramasoḥ sūryagrahaṇam na eva syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5015: na ca candramasam muktvā anyaḥ rāhuḥ asti yena savitā chādyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5016: yadi api adhaḥ candraḥ syāt tathā api mahattvāt sūryabimbasya na eva arkaḥ sakalaḥ chādyate
GS41aryabhcu:5017: na eva arkaḥ candreṇa chādyate iti cet tat api uttaratra vyākhyāsyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5020: kim? tat alpam maṇḍalam adhaḥ vyavasthitam |
GS41aryabhcu:5021: upariṣṭāt sarveṣām maṇḍalānām mahat maṇḍalam mahatā kālena śanaiḥ caraḥ pūrayati |
GS41aryabhcu:5022: etau alpamahatkakṣyāmaṇḍalaparimāṇau grahau uddiṣṭau, anyeṣām ca [maṇḍalāni
GS41aryabhcu:5024: tat yathā ã candramāḥ divasasaṅkhyayā saptaviṃśatyā sārdhaikayā maṇḍalam gacchati, budhaśukraravayaḥ kiñcit ūnena varṣeṇa, bhaumaḥ kiñcit ūnena
GS41aryabhcu:5025: varṣadva[yena, guruḥ] tu varṣaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ kiñcit ūnaiḥ, śanaiścaraḥ tu triṃśatā varṣaiḥ kiñcit ūnaiḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5026: evam ete bhinnakakṣyāsthāḥ yojanagatena tulyagatayaḥ grahāḥ vyākhyātāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5027: atha yadi tulyakakṣyāsthāḥ yojanagatena tulyagatayaḥ eva syuḥ tadā eteṣām yugādeḥ saṃpravṛttānām na kadācit viyogaḥ syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5028: atha [yadi] yojanagatena ete bhinnagatayaḥ syuḥ tadā eteṣām bhuktiliptānayane yojanaiḥ yathāsvam
GS41aryabhcu:5030: tasmāt bhinnakakṣyāsthāḥ api grahāḥ yojanagatena tulyagatayaḥ eva iti || 13 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5032: kakṣyāṇām alpamahattvāt rāśibhāgaliptāḥ bahvyaḥ alpāḥ iti sandehaḥ tannivṛttyartham āha ã alpe hi maṇḍale alpāḥ mahati mahāntaḥ ca rāśayaḥ jñeyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5033: aṃśāḥ kalāḥ tathā evam vibhāgatulyāḥ svakakṣyāsu || 14 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5034: alpe maṇḍale alpāḥ rāśayaḥ mahati maṇḍale mahāntaḥ, evam aṃśāḥ kalāḥ ca,
GS41aryabhcu:5036: tat yathā ã alpe mahati ca maṇḍale maṇḍaladvādaśabhāgaḥ rāśiḥ, ṣaṣṭiśatatrayabhāgaḥ bhāgaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:5037: khakhaṣaḍghanabhāgaḥ liptāḥ iti, svāsu svāsu kakṣyāsu jyotiścakrasya tulyatvāt || 14 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5039: kakṣyāṇām upari adhaḥ ava[sthiti]kramaparijñānāya āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:5041: eṣām adhaḥ ca bhūmiḥ medhībhūtā khamadhyasthā || 15 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5043: teṣām adhaḥ śanaiścaraḥ, tasya api adhaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5048: atra “bhūta”-śabdaḥ bahuṣu artheṣu vartamānaḥ iva arthe pratipattavyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5051: kham ākāśam tasya madhyam khamadhyam, tasmin sthitā khamadhyasthā |
GS41aryabhcu:5053: atra ucyate ã yadā dṛśye cakrārdhe grahanakṣatrāṇi, tadā teṣām adhaḥ bhūmiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5054: yadā ataḥ anyeṣu grahanakṣatrāṇi smararipusutahibukasahajadhaneṣu vartante tadā katham adhaḥ bhūḥ, yat uta upari syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5056: yasmāt sarveṣām asmadādīnām bhūḥ adhaḥ, upari ca ākāśaḥ, [tasmāt] sarvadā grahāḥ upari,
GS41aryabhcu:5058: vakṣyati ca ã yadvat kadambapuṣpagranthaḥ pracitaḥ samantataḥ kusumaiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5059: tadvat hi sarvasattvaiḥ jalajaiḥ sthalajaiḥ ca bhūgolaḥ || iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5064: alpamaṇḍalam bhāni bhramanti, tāvat mahānti maṇḍalāni śanaiścarādayaḥ [na]
GS41aryabhcu:5065: śaknuvanti pūrayitum iti pṛṣṭhataḥ lakṣyante, yathākakṣyā[maṇḍalakrameṇa] iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5067: atra parihāraḥ prāk pradarśitaḥ ã yadi upari syāt tadā candrasya grahanakṣatrabhede sphuṭakalaṅkahariṇe grahanakṣatratārāḥ kṛśyeran [pṛí 212] iti ādinā granthena |
GS41aryabhcu:5070: ataḥ drutagatibhiḥ nakṣatraiḥ īṣamandagatiḥ īṣat jīyate,
GS41aryabhcu:5074: atra api yadi prāṅmukhāḥ grahādayaḥ tadā prāṅmukhaiḥ drutagatibhiḥ nakṣatraiḥ jīyamānaḥ aśvinyām dṛṣṭaḥ revatyām upalakṣyeta, na bharaṇyām |
GS41aryabhcu:5075: vakrakāle api ca, pratilomagatitvāt aśvinyām dṛṣṭaḥ bharaṇyām eva upalakṣyeta |
GS41aryabhcu:5076: atha ete grahādayaḥ aparābhimukhāḥ kalpyante, tathā api vakrakāle aśvinyām dṛṣṭaḥ pratilomagatitvāt bharaṇyām upalakṣyeta |
GS41aryabhcu:5078: anyat ca ã anyonyabimbacchādanam na syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5079: grahoparāgaḥ api ca tulyakakṣyāvyavasthitatvāt na yujyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5081: adhaḥ śanaiścaraḥ” iti ādi suṣṭhu uktam || 15 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5083: kālahorādinādhipatijñāpanāya āha ã sapta ete horeśāḥ śanaiścarādyāḥ yathākramam śīghrāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5085: ete grahāḥ śanaiścarādayaḥ tulyagatayaḥ api santaḥ yathākrameṇa śīghrāḥ lakṣyante, maṇḍalānām yathākrameṇa alpatvāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5087: | tat yathā ã śanaiścarasya kālahorāyām nivṛttāyām bṛhaspateḥ kālahorā,
GS41aryabhcu:5088: tataḥ aṅgārakasya, tataḥ raveḥ iti ādi |
GS41aryabhcu:5089: evam sūryodayāt prabhṛti yāvat sūryasya ardhāstamayaḥ iti dvādaśa kālahorāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5090: tataḥ ca ardhāstamayāt ardhodayaḥ iti punar dvādaśa |
GS41aryabhcu:5092: kālahorā hi nāma lagnarāśeḥ ardhodayasya kālaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5093: sā ca divase divase divasādhipātaḥ prabhṛti pratipattavyā |
GS41aryabhcu:5094: uktam ca sphujidhvajayavaneśvareṇa ã ādityaśukrendujacandrasaurajīvāvaneyāḥ syuḥ aharniśāsu
GS41aryabhcu:5095: horeśvarāḥ taddivasādhipādikrameṇa tāḥ tatra caturguṇāḥ ṣaṭ ||
GS41aryabhcu:5096: evam divasādhipāt sūryodayāt gaṇyamānāt uttaradivasasya adhipāt eva ardhodayāt śīghrakramāt caturthaḥ, yaḥ śīghrakramaḥ abhihitaḥ “bhānām
GS41aryabhcu:5097: adhaḥ śanaiścaraḥ” iti ādi tasmāt caturthaḥ divasādhipatiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5098: tat yathā ã śanaiścarāt caturthaḥ sūryaḥ divasādhipatiḥ, sūryāt somaḥ caturthaḥ, somāt aṅgārakaḥ iti ādi |
GS41aryabhcu:5099: evam anena krameṇa māsādhipāḥ abdādhipāḥ ca avagantavyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5100: katham? [māsasya varṣasya ca yaḥ] prathamadivase adhipaḥ sa
GS41aryabhcu:5104: yadi api śeṣeṇa uktaḥ sūryodayaśeṣeṇa ardhodayaḥ pratipattavyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5105: kutaḥ? idam bimbāvayavābhidhāne api tadavayavapramāṇasya mānakālāvadhāraṇāśakyatvāt ardhodayasya ca vyaktalakṣaṇatvāt suparicchedanayā ardhodayaḥ āśriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5106: athavā anirdiṣṭeṣu vastuṣu madhyamapratipatteḥ ardhodayāt ārabhya punar ardhodayaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5109: yasmāt uktam ã āsīt idam tamobhūtam aprajñātam alakṣaṇam |
GS41aryabhcu:5113: yadā protpannaḥ sahasrakiraṇaḥ tadā prabhṛti vārādivyavahāraḥ sañjātaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5114: ataḥ suṣṭhu uktam sūryodayāt dinapāḥ iti || 16 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5116: ete grahāḥ kasmin maṇḍale bhramanti iti [na jñāyate] ataḥ tannirūpaṇāya āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:5118: mandoccāt anulomam pratilomam ca eva śīghhroccāt || 17 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5119: kakṣyāyāḥ pratimaṇḍalam kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalam, tat gacchanti iti
GS41aryabhcu:5121: athavā kakṣyā ca pratimaṇḍalam ca kakṣyāpratimaṇḍale, te gacchanti iti kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalagāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5123: athavā kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalayoḥ yatra sampātaḥ sa kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalaśabdena ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5126: katamaḥ vigrahaḥ parigṛhyate iti sandehe ucyate ã kakṣyā ca pratimaṇḍalam ca kakṣyāpratimaṇḍale
GS41aryabhcu:5129: katham? iṣṭatvāt śeṣavigrahārthavācakatvāt ca atra iṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5130: kakṣyāgāḥ madhyamāḥ grahāḥ yasmāt tulyabhuktayaḥ, pratimaṇḍalagāḥ sphuṭagrahāḥ yataḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5132: atha ke te madhyamāḥ, ke vā sphuṭāḥ grahāḥ? nanu ca ekaḥ eva sūryaḥ, ekaḥ eva candramāḥ, ekaḥ eva aṅgārakaḥ iti ādi |
GS41aryabhcu:5134: na evam vijñāyate madhyamaḥ grahaḥ sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5135: katham tarhi? madhyamagrahaśabdena madhyamagrahasya grahagatiḥ abhidhīyate, sphuṭagrahaśabdena ca sphuṭagrahagatiḥ iti? tat yathā ã kaścit sāṃvatsaram pṛcchati ã “kaḥ savitā” iti, sa tasmā āha ã rāśiḥ ekaḥ pañcadaśa bhāgāḥ triṃśat liptāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5136: tatra yaḥ paripṛcchati yaḥ ca ācaṣṭe tayoḥ ubhayoḥ abhi[prāya]dvayaprasaṅgaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5138: yā madhyamā gatiḥ sā sphuṭagatisādhanasya upāyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5139: anyathā aniyatatvāt sphuṭagatiḥ aśakyā syāt vijñātum |
GS41aryabhcu:5142: yat asya grahasya vyāsārdhatulyam bhūtārāgrahavivaram sa tasmāt pradeśāt prabhṛti kakṣyāmaṇḍalasya upari adhaḥ vā avatiṣṭhate |
GS41aryabhcu:5143: atha kaḥ asau ayam pradeśaḥ? ucyate ã yadā tṛtīye karmaṇi dvitīye pade mandoccakendram rāśitrayam dvau bhāgau pañcāśat liptāḥ, tadā bṛhaspateḥ mandoccakarṇaḥ vyāsārdhatulyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5144: caturthe karmaṇi yadā śīghroccakendram rāśitrayam pañcabhāgāḥ viṃśatiḥ ca kalā, tadā vyāsārdhatulyaḥ śīghroccakarṇaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5146: asmāt pradeśāt prabhṛti bhūtārāgrahavivaram pratidinam apacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5147: anayā yuktyā śeṣāṇām api grahāṇām vyāsārdhatulyam bhūtārāgrahavivaram ūhyam |
GS41aryabhcu:5148: bhramanti sarve grahāḥ svacāreṇa iti etat nigadavyākhyānam eva |
GS41aryabhcu:5151: tena mandoccāt hetoḥ anulomam iti vyākhyāyate, yasmāt na mandocce vakraparijñānam |
GS41aryabhcu:5153: śīghroccāt hetoḥ pratilomam, yasmāt śīghrocce vakraparijñānam
GS41aryabhcu:5154: | katham punar śīghrocce vakraparijñānam? ucyate ã yadā śīghroccakendram dvitīyapade tadā sarve grahāḥ vakriṇaḥ bhavanti, yadā ca tṛtīyapade
GS41aryabhcu:5156: uktam ca ã grahonaśīghragraheṣu kṛtaṣaḍvasuṣu kramāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5157: bhavet vakrātivakrā ca tathā anukuṭilā gatiḥ || iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5160: ucyate ã yadā adyatanāt grahāt śvastanaḥ grahaḥ tulyaḥ bhavati tadā vakraprārambhaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5161: athavā hyastanāt grahāt adyatanaḥ grahaḥ tulyaḥ tadā api vakraprārambhaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5162: yadā adyatanāt tṛtīyapade śvastanaḥ grahaḥ adhikaḥ tadā vakrasya nivṛttiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5163: athavā hyastanāt grahāt adyatanaḥ grahaḥ adhikaḥ tṛtīyapade tadā api vakrasya nivṛttiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5164: yadā grahaḥ bahvīḥ liptāḥ nivartate tadā ativakragatiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5165: katham punar idam vidhānam śīghroccāt eva gaṇakaḥ prajānate, na punar mandoccāt iti? ucyate ã yasmāt sūryavaśāt grahāṇām udayāstamayavakrānuvakrāḥ gatayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5166: yadi evam atra katham budhaśukrayoḥ anyat śīghroccam, [madhyaḥ] sūryaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5167: atra api sūryavaśāt eva tayoḥ udayāstamayaparijñānam |
GS41aryabhcu:5176: tathā hi bhiṣajaḥ hi utpalanālādiṣu vadhādīni abhyasyante |
GS41aryabhcu:5177: nāpitāḥ piṭharādiṣu muṇḍanādīni, yajñaśāstravidaḥ śu[ṣkeṣṭyā] yajñādīni, śābdikāḥ prakṛtipratyayavikārāgamavarṇalopavyatyayādibhiḥ śabdān pratijānate |
GS41aryabhcu:5181: tasmāt upāyeṣu asatyeṣu satyapratipādanapareṣu na codyam asti |
GS41aryabhcu:5182: atha kim artham ime grahāḥ pratidinam bhrāmyanti |
GS41aryabhcu:5183: atha ca loke kaścit bhraman kāraṇena bhramati |
GS41aryabhcu:5184: anyat ca ã na evaṃvidhaḥ kaścit dṛśyate anavaratagatiḥ yathā ime tārāgrahāḥ bhramanti iti dṛṣṭāntatvena udāharaṇabhūtaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5185: ucyate ã sarvādau kila bhagavān prajāpatiḥ grahān uktavān yat “bhavantaḥ meṣādigaṇeṣu prajānām śubhāśubhaphalāya bhrāmyata” iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5187: uktam ca sphujidhvajayavaneśvareṇa ã prajāḥ sisṛkṣuḥ kila viśvadhātā prajāpatiḥ prāgvratam ācacāra |
GS41aryabhcu:5188: sa dvādaśāṅgaprabhavam svadeham sṛṣṭvā āditaḥ vai bhagaṇam sasarja ||
GS41aryabhcu:5189: tebhyaḥ sa meṣādigaṇān prajajñe tebhyaḥ ca tadbhedavikalpataḥ anyān |
GS41aryabhcu:5190: ataḥ bhavargasya vibhuḥ praṇetā prajābhavābhāvavidhīśvaratvam || iti ādi |
GS41aryabhcu:5192: śrūyante ca śabdāḥ ye ca apare atra gativācakāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5193: tat yathā ã “pathaḥ ṣkan” [aṣṭādhyāyī, 5.1.75] iti vartamāne “panthaḥ ṇa nityam” [aṣṭādhyāyī, 5.1.76] iti anena nityam panthānam gacchati iti asmin arthe pānthaḥ iti ayam śabdaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5194: atra loke na kaścit adhvānam anavaratam gacchan dṛśyate, tasmāt amī eva grahāḥ pānthāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5195: na ca ayam śabdaḥ asatsvārtheṣu śaśaviṣāṇakūrmaromavandhyāputraśabdavat pravṛttaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5196: tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate śabdena arthānumānam pānthāḥ grahāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5198: mandoccāt anulomam pratilomam ca eva śīghroccāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5199: mandoccāt yataḥ mandoccakendrāt pratimaṇḍalavidhānena ānītam phalam pratyaham upacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5203: yasmāt pratimaṇḍalavidhānena ānītam phalam sarvadā apacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5207: sphuṭāḥ pratimaṇḍale bhramanti iti uktam, ataḥ tajjñāpanāya āha ã kakṣyāmaṇḍalatulyam svam svam pratimaṇḍalam bhavati eṣām |
GS41aryabhcu:5211: kakṣyāmaṇḍalapramāṇam “śaśirāśayaṣṭha cakram” [gītikāí, 6] iti etasmin sūtre vyākhyātam
GS41aryabhcu:5212: svam svam pratimaṇḍalam ātmīyam ātmīyam pratimaṇḍalam,
GS41aryabhcu:5216: yat madhyam kendram tat ghanabhūmadhyāt atikrāntam |
GS41aryabhcu:5217: ghanāḥ ca asau bhūḥ ca ghanabhūḥ, tasyāḥ ghanabhuvaḥ madhyam ghanabhūmadhyam, tasmāt ghanabhūmadhyāt,
GS41aryabhcu:5219: tat yathā ã yāvat pramāṇaparikalpitam ṣaṣṭiśatatrayāṃśāvacchinnam kakṣyāmaṇḍalam pūrvāparam ūrdhvam vinyasya, tādṛś eva anyat maṇḍalam upari adhaḥ kakṣyāmaṇḍalāt vakṣyamāṇena antareṇa pūrvāparayoḥ diśoḥ yatra sampātaḥ tatra yat badhyate gole tatpratimaṇḍalam nāma |
GS41aryabhcu:5222: kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalāntarapratipādanārtham āha ã pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram vyāsārdham svoccanīcavṛttasya
GS41aryabhcu:5223: vṛttaparidhau grahāḥ te madhyamacārāt bhramanti evam || 19 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5227: svasya uccanīcavṛttam svoccanīcavṛttam, tasya svoccanīcavṛttasya vyāsārdham pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram
GS41aryabhcu:5229: iti adhikṛtya “śaśinaḥ cha” [gītikāí, 10] iti sapta śaśinaḥ jhārdhāni
GS41aryabhcu:5231: yasya yat vyāsārdham tat trairāśikagaṇitena siddham |
GS41aryabhcu:5232: yadi “caturadhikam śatam aṣṭaguṇam” [gaṇitaí, 10] iti evamādeḥ paridheḥ ayutatulyam vyāsārdham labhyate tadā sārdhaikatriṃśadbhāgapramāṇasya paridheḥ kim iti labdham bhāgāḥ pañca,
GS41aryabhcu:5235: sārdhatrayodaśabhāgapramāṇam, tasya ca trairāśikena svavṛttaviṣkambhārdham labdham bhāgadvayam, ardhādhikena nava liptāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5238: vyāsārdham labhyate tadā uccanīcaparidheḥ kim iti labdham candrasya uccanīcavyāsārdham liptātriśatī sārdhādhikarūpā |
GS41aryabhcu:5240: tatra bhāgapramāṇena liptāpramāṇena vā kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalamadhyāntaram parikalpyam |
GS41aryabhcu:5242: anyathā anyeṣām samaviṣamavṛttamandoccaśīghroccabhedena anekapratimaṇḍalaprasaṅgabhayāt uttaratra vakṣyati ã “bhūtārāgrahavivaram”
GS41aryabhcu:5245: kakṣyāmaṇḍalam, tasmin vṛttaparidhau madhyamacāram grahāḥ bhramanti |
GS41aryabhcu:5246: pratimaṇḍaleṣu sphuṭacāram bhramanti iti arthāt avasīyate || 19 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5248: grahabhuktyānayanavakrānuvakraparijñānāya āha ã yaḥ śīghragatiḥ svoccāt pratilomagatiḥ svavṛttakakṣyāyām
GS41aryabhcu:5249: anulomagatiḥ vṛtte mandagatiḥ yaḥ grahaḥ bhavati || 20 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5250: śīghrā gatiḥ yasya tat śīgrahgatiḥ, śīghragatiḥ ca tat svoccam ca śīghragatiḥ svoccam, śīghratatiḥsvoccāt yaḥ pratilomagatiḥ śīghragatiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5259: pratilomā gatiḥ yasya saḥ pratilomagatiḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5260: āditaḥ eva etat bhuktyānayanam prati vakṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5261: tat yathā ã mandoccakendrāntajyām krameṇa utkrameṇa vā niṣpannām svamadhyamabhuktiliptābhiḥ guṇayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5262: punar ca tat kālapratidhinā guṇitasya aṣṭādaśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ bhāgalabdham kendrapadavaśāt ardhīkṛtya grahamadhyamabhuktiliptāsu prakṣipya viśodhya vā svaśīghroccabhuktiliptābhiḥ śodhayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5266: labhdasya ardham kendrapadavaśāt grahamadhyamabhuktiliptāsu kṣipet, viśodhayet vā |
GS41aryabhcu:5267: tataḥ tam kṣiptaviśodhitaśeṣam gṛhītvā tṛtīyakarma ã mandoccakendrāntajyākramotkramajyām tat kālaparidhiguṇam aṣṭādaśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ vibhajet |
GS41aryabhcu:5268: labdham samastam eva grahamadhyamabhuktiliptāsu mandakendrapadavaśāt kṣipet, viśodhayet vā
GS41aryabhcu:5269: kṣiptam viśodhitaśiṣṭam vā sphuṭamadhyamabhuktiliptāḥ avinaṣṭāḥ tāḥ svaśīghroccabhuktiliptābhyaḥ viśodhayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5271: caturthakarma ã śīghroccakendrānta[jyākramotkrama]jyām tat kālaparidhiguṇam aṣṭādaśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ vibhajet |
GS41aryabhcu:5273: tatra yad avāptam tat yadi kṣepyam sphuṭamadhyamabhuktiliptāsu kṣipet, niṣpannā grahasya sphuṭabhuktiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5274: atha viśodhyam sad yadi sphuṭamadhyamabhuktitaḥ na patati tadā pratilomagatiḥ grahaḥ sphuṭamadhyamabhuktiliptāḥ eva viparītam śodhyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5276: asmin arthe iyam kārikā ã yaḥ śīghragatiḥ svoccāt pratilomagatiḥ svavṛttakakṣyāyām |
GS41aryabhcu:5283: tataḥ arthāt ayam vigrahaḥ avasitaḥ ã anulomā gatiḥ yasya sa anulomagatiḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5284: sa ca alpam gaccahati iti mandagatiḥ abhidhīyate || 20 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5286: grahāṇām sphuṭīkaraṇaprakārāntaram āha ã anulomagāni mandāt śīghrāt pratilomagāni vṛttāni
GS41aryabhcu:5291: tat atra api śīghroccāvadheḥ madhyamāt iti etat ekaprakrameṇa bhavitavyam |
GS41aryabhcu:5292: na iti āha ã śīghrā[t pratilomaga]tiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5294: śīghroccasya pratilomagatīni viparītagatīni yāni vṛttāni paridhayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5295: atra vṛttasya ekadeśe vṛttaśabdopa[cārāt paridhayaḥ ca] iti,
GS41aryabhcu:5297: ataḥ tāni dhanūṃṣi mandakendrāt jātāni krameṇa
GS41aryabhcu:5301: katham punar vṛttāni mandaśīghrakendrayoḥ tajjyādhanūṃṣi kramotkrama[gatīni? gate]ḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5303: yathā ã gatiḥ asti iti bhūtānām sukumārāyate manaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5304: [anastvaniśam eva ūḍham dhuram] vahati gauḥ iva ||
GS41aryabhcu:5305: tathā ã dānam bhogaḥ nāśaḥ tisraḥ gatayaḥ bhavanti vittasya |
GS41aryabhcu:5306: yaḥ na dadāti na bhuṅkte tasya tṛtīyā gatiḥ bhavati ||
GS41aryabhcu:5308: tasmāt yāni eva jyādhanūṃṣi tāni eva pratilomānulomagatīni |
GS41aryabhcu:5309: atha atra idam praṣṭavyam ã mandoccajyādhanūṃṣi mandoccāt upacīyante,
GS41aryabhcu:5315: athavā mandoccaśīghroccaśravaṇāt mandoccaśīghroccayoḥ eva pratipattiḥ, anyasya aśrutatvāt ca |
GS41aryabhcu:5317: ayam āryāsūtrārthaḥ yathā ghaṭate tathā karmaṇā pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5319: śeṣam rāśyādikam mandoccāt pravṛttam tat kakṣyāmaṇḍalotpannam iti pratimaṇḍale kriyate, yasmāt pratimaṇḍale sphuṭagrahaḥ bhramati |
GS41aryabhcu:5320: tena tasmāt mandoccāt ārabhya yat kāṣṭham tat mahati maṇḍale alpam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5323: alpe pratimaṇḍale tat eva kāṣṭham bahutaram
GS41aryabhcu:5325: vrīhyādayaḥ mahatā mānaviśeṣeṇa pramīyamānāḥ prasthādisaṅkhyayā alpāḥ bhavanti, [te] eva alpena mānaviśeṣeṇa mīyamānāḥ prasthādiśaṅkhyayā bahavaḥ bhavanti evam atra api |
GS41aryabhcu:5326: katham punar tat kāṣṭham kakṣyāmaṇḍalotpannam pratimaṇḍale pramīyate? ucyate ã tat
GS41aryabhcu:5327: kāṣṭhasya padāni vyatītāni pratyākalayya vartamānapadasya bhujākoṭijyayā karma idam kriyate ã “pratimaṇḍalasya madhyam ghanabhūmadhyāt atikrāntam”
GS41aryabhcu:5329: 18] iti pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram koṭyām prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ prakṣipyate, dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ apanīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5330: etat pratipādanārtham samāyāmavanau vṛttakendram nidhāya yāvat tāvat pramāṇaparikalpitavyāsārdhapramāṇena karkaṭakena vṛttam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:5332: antya]phala[jyā]pramāṇam [sūtram mandoccābhimukham] dakṣiṇena nidhāya tatra kakṣyāmaṇḍalavyāsārdhatulyakarkaṭakena vṛttam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:5334: [tat prathamacaturthapadayoḥ] kakṣyāmaṇḍalāt upari avatiṣṭhate, dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ adhaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5335: tatra yā koṭijyā sā kakṣyāmaṇḍalotpannā kakṣyāmaṇḍalabhūmyantarālapramāṇā |
GS41aryabhcu:5336: tena pratimaṇḍalabhūvivarāntarālamātreṇa pratimaṇḍalam prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ koṭiḥ na prāpnoti iti prakṣipyate, dvitīyatṛtīyapadayoḥ tāvatā atītāt pratimaṇḍalāt koṭiḥ iti apanīyate evam pratimaṇḍalotpannā koṭiḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5337: atha yadi koṭi[jyātaḥ] pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram na śudhyati, tadā pratimaṇḍalabhūvivarāt koṭijyā śodhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5339: | tatra evam niṣpannāyāḥ koṭeḥ bhujajyāyāḥ ca vargasamāsamūlam karṇaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5340: tat sūkṣmārthibhiḥ aviśiṣyate, pratimaṇḍalakarṇasya vṛddhihrāsavaśāt dṛṣṭiḥ bhidyate iti
GS41aryabhcu:5341: tat yadi vyāsārdhatulyena pratimaṇḍalakarṇena yathā uktam pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram labhyate tadā tena pratimaṇḍalakarṇena kim iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5345: tena punar pratimaṇḍalabhūvivarānayanam iti yāvat aviśeṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5346: tataḥ aviśiṣṭakarṇena vyastatrairāśikam kriyate ã yadi vyāsārdhaviṣkambhasya kakṣyāmaṇḍalasya iyam bhujajyā labhyate, tadā tena karṇena
GS41aryabhcu:5350: tat kāṣṭham mandocce prakṣipya sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ bhavati, yasya mandoccakendram prathamapade
GS41aryabhcu:5351: dvitīyapade ṣaḍbhyaḥ rāśibhyaḥ viśodhya bhujā gṛhītā iti ṣaṅbhyaḥ apanīyate, śeṣam mandocce prakṣipyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5352: tṛtīyapade cakrārdhādhikabhujā iti tat cāpam cakrārdhasahitam mandocce prakṣipyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5353: caturthapade dvādaśebhyaḥ viśuddhaśeṣam bhujā iti cakrāt tat kāṣṭham viśodhya śeṣam mandocce prakṣipyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5356: yeṣām punar śīghroccam vidyate teṣām karmaviśeṣaḥ ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5357: tat yathā ã paridhicālanāprayogeṇa sphuṭīkṛtaparidhinā vyāsārdham samguṇayya aśītyā bhāgalabdham pratimaṇḍalabhūvivaram mandaśīghroccayoḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5361: tat evam niṣpannasya, madhyamasya grahasya [ca] yat antarārdham tat madhyamāt mandoccasiddhe
GS41aryabhcu:5364: etat eva karma “śanigurukujeṣu mande ardham ṛṇadhanam bhavati pūrvam” [kālakriyāí, 22] iti anena granthena abhidhīyate
GS41aryabhcu:5368: [kālakriyāí, 22] iti kasya ardham ṛṇam dhanam vā bhavati iti atra
GS41aryabhcu:5370: kim tasya ardham madhye grahe dhanam ṛṇam vā pūrvasiddhe mandoccakarmaṇi bhavati? idam ca
GS41aryabhcu:5373: | tat yathā ã evam ardhena phalena saṃskṛtam madhyamam graham śīghroccāt grahāt viśodhayet
GS41aryabhcu:5374: tatra kendrapadavibhāgena bhujākoṭijye gṛhītvā sphuṭīkṛtasvaśīghroccaparidhinā vyāsārdham saṃguṇayya aśītyā bhāgalabdhapratimaṇḍalabhūvivareṇa pūrvakarmaṇā eva saṃskṛtāt karṇam ānayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5376: tataḥ bhujajyayā vyāsārdham saṃguṇayya karṇena bhāgalabdhasya kāṣṭham śīghroccakendre prathamapade
GS41aryabhcu:5377: apanīyate, dvitīye pade ṣaḍbhyaḥ viśodhya śeṣam śīghroccāt apanīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5378: tṛtīye pade cakrārdhayuktam, caturthe pade dvādaśabhyaḥ viśuddhaśeṣam,
GS41aryabhcu:5381: tasya mandoccasiddhasya ca pūrvavat eva antarārdham mandoccasiddhe pūrvakalpanayā eva dhanam ṛṇam vā kuryāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5382: tat mandaśīghra[siddha]m avinaṣṭam vidhāya tasmāt mandoccam viśodhya pūrvavat eva mandoccam sādhayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5383: tasya mandoccasiddhasya dvisaṃskṛtasya avinaṣṭasthāpitasya ca yaḥ viśeṣaḥ tam sakalam eva dvisaṃskṛtahīnamadhyamāt viśodhayet, adhikamadhyame prakṣipet |
GS41aryabhcu:5384: [arthāt dvisaṃskṛtamandasiddhe ūne sati viśodhayet anyathā prakṣipet] |
GS41aryabhcu:5385: tam evaṃkṛtam śīghroccāt viśodhya śīghroccaprasiddhakarmaṇā saṃsiddhaḥ sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ bhaviṣyati iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5386: etat eva karma saṃkṣepeṇa asmābhiḥ karmanibandhe uktam ã pratimaṇḍalakarma api yojyam atra vipaśicitā |
GS41aryabhcu:5387: mandocce pūrvavat kuryāt śīghroccāt tat viśodhyate ||
GS41aryabhcu:5388: tat eva kevalam śodhyam [cakrārdhāt śodhya tat calāt] |
GS41aryabhcu:5389: cakrārdhasaṃyutam cāpam cakrāt śuddham ca śeṣayoḥ ||
GS41aryabhcu:5391: tyaktvā padeṣu yuktvā vā karṇaḥ prāgvat prasādhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5393: mandasiddhe adhike hīne rahitaḥ madhyamaḥ grahaḥ ||
GS41aryabhcu:5394: sa śīghroccāt punar sādhyaḥ siddhayoḥ antarālajam |
GS41aryabhcu:5397: mandasiddhasya tasya ayam viśeṣaḥ yaḥ abhidhāsyate ||
GS41aryabhcu:5399: prāgvat tat madhyame kṛtvā śīghrasiddhaḥ sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ ||
GS41aryabhcu:5402: tena budhaśukrayoḥ api idam karma kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5406: kakṣyāmaṇḍalalagnam ca tat svavṛttamadhyam ca kakṣyāmaṇḍalalagnasvavṛttamadhyam |
GS41aryabhcu:5409: yaḥ asau madhyaḥ grahaḥ sa kakṣyāmaṇḍalalagnasvavṛttamadhye bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5410: etat uktam bhavati ã kakṣyāpratimaṇḍalayoḥ yatra sampātaḥ tatra yaḥ asau madhyamagrahaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:5417: mandoccāt prabhṛti yāni mandoccavṛttāni mandoccāt ārabhya anulomam gacchanti, yasmāt mandoccakendram ahar ahar upacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5419: śīghrāt śīghroccāt ārabhya yāni śīghroccavṛttāni tāni pratilomam gacchanti, yasmāt śīghroccakendram ahar ahar apacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5420: atra idam praṣṭavyam ã katham vā mandoccakendram ahar ahar upacīyate, katham vā śīghroccakendram ahar ahar apacīyate iti?
GS41aryabhcu:5421: ucyate ã grahāt patite mandocce [mandakendra]bhuktayaḥ upacīyante, grahāt patite śīghrocce śīghrakendrabhuktayaḥ apacīyante |
GS41aryabhcu:5422: yadi evam grahāt śīghroccam na patati mahattvāt tarhi maṇḍalam prakṣipya pātyate iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5423: tatra bhagaṇāḥ bhagaṇebhyaḥ viśodhyāḥ, rāśayaḥ rāśibhyaḥ, bhāgāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5424: bhāgebhyaḥ, liptāḥ liptābhyaḥ iti eṣaḥ kramaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5425: tatra grahabhagaṇebhyaḥ śīghroccabhagaṇāḥ eva tāvat na śuddhyanti |
GS41aryabhcu:5426: kutaḥ asau bhagaṇaḥ yam prakṣipya śīghroccam viśodhyate?
GS41aryabhcu:5427: tasmāt gaṇitayuktyā yāni api śīghravṛttāni tāni api anulomagāni eva |
GS41aryabhcu:5428: ācāryeṇa tu karaṇalāghavārtham “pratilomagāni vṛttāni” iti uktam |
GS41aryabhcu:5430: yadi grahaḥ śīghroccāt patati tadā grahaḥ śīghroccāt viśodhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5431: yadā ca śīghroccam grahāt patati tadā grahāt śīghroccam viśodhyate iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5432: satyam eva etat, kintu jyāparidhikalpanā vyabhicarati |
GS41aryabhcu:5433: yadā grahāt śīghroccam viśodhitam bhavati tadā anyathā jyā anyathā paridhiḥ, tadānīm eva śīghroccāt viśuddhe grahe anyathā jyā anyathā eva paridhiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5434: atha manyate śīghroccaviśuddhe grahe yat prathamapadam tat caturthapadam, yat dvitīyapadam tat tṛtīyapadam, yat tṛtīyapadam tat dvitīyapadam, yat caturthapadam tat prathamapadam iti evam tarhi yat jyāyasī kalpanā,
GS41aryabhcu:5440: athavā kakṣyā ca sā maṇḍalam ca tat kakṣyāmaṇḍalam |
GS41aryabhcu:5445: tat ca sāmānyena mandavṛttam śīghravṛttam ca parigṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5447: tatra grahasya madhyaḥ, sa ca kakṣyāmaṇḍalāsaktaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5448: svavṛttasya kakṣyāmaṇḍale yathā madhyam bhavati tathā badhnīyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5449: tasmin svavṛtte yathā kakṣyāmaṇḍale yathā madhyam bhavati tathā badhnīyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5450: tasmin svavṛtte yathā kakṣyāmaṇḍale jyā avitiṣṭhate tathā eva avatiṣṭhamānā draṣṭavyā |
GS41aryabhcu:5452: evam atra api ṣaṇṇavatyaṃśakā kāṣṭhajyā parikalpanīyā |
GS41aryabhcu:5453: tat yathā ã uccāt ārabhya bhujajyākoṭijyābhyām trairāśikam ã yadi ṣaṣṭiśatatrayaparidhau ime
GS41aryabhcu:5455: athavā ã vyāsārdhena ime bhujajyākoṭijye, tataḥ antyaphalatulyena uccanīcavṛttavyāsārdhena ke iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5457: | tatra prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ vyāsārdhāt upari koṭisādhanam sthitam iti vyāsārdhe prakṣipyate
GS41aryabhcu:5458: dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ padayoḥ vyāsārdhonam pravṛttam iti vyāsārdhāt apanīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5463: grahāṇām ṛṇadhanapratipādanāya āha ã kṣayadhanadhanakṣayāḥ syuḥ mandoccāt vyatyayena śīghroccāt
GS41aryabhcu:5464: śanigurukujeṣu mandāt ardham ṛṇam dhanam bhavati pūrve || 22 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5466: kṣayaḥ ca dhanaḥ ca dhanaḥ ca kṣayaḥ ca kṣayadhanadhanakṣayāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5468: tat yathā ã prathame pade kṣayaḥ, dvitīye pade dhanam,
GS41aryabhcu:5469: tṛtīye pade dhanam eva, caturthe pade kṣayaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5471: padakramaḥ ca kasmāt parigṛhyate iti āha ã mandoccāt pravṛttāt grahāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5472: kutaḥ? ucyate ã “mandoccāt” iyam pañcamī maryādābhidhāyinī |
GS41aryabhcu:5473: tataḥ mandoccāt iti anena mandoccāt pravṛttaḥ grahaḥ parigṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5474: sa katham mandoccāt pravṛttaḥ grahaḥ jñeyaḥ? ucyate ã na atra kiñcit api jñeyam |
GS41aryabhcu:5475: yāvadbhiḥ mandoccāt adhikaḥ grahaḥ tavatā asau mandoccāt pravṛttaḥ grahaḥ jñeyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5476: tena tatparijñānārtham mandoccam grahāt pātyate, tatra śeṣeṇa rāśyādinā mandoccāt pravṛttaḥ asau grahaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5477: tasmāt prathamapade yā kramajyā tasyāḥ phalam trairāśikena ānīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5478: yadi ṣaṣṭiśatatrayaparidheḥ iyam jyā, tadā iṣṭagrahaparidheḥ kā iti phalam labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5486: punar tṛtīyapade krameṇa jyā vyavasthitā iti kramajyāphalam dhanam |
GS41aryabhcu:5487: caturthe pade utkrameṇa jyā vyavasthitā iti utkramajyāphalam kṣayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5488: tatra prathamapade eva mandakendram, tat utpannam eva phalam grahamadhye kṣayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5489: yadā dvitīyapade kendram tadā prathamapadavyāsārdhajyotpannam aśeṣaphalam kṣayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:5492: athavā karaṇalāghavārtham evam kriyate ã prathamapade yat utpannam krameṇa jyāphalam kṣayaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5493: dvitīyapade yat utpannam punar yat gatam rāśyādikam atītam prathamapadasaṃjñitarāśitrayāt kṣayātmakāt dhanātmakam tat dvitīyapadasya yat gatam tat viśodhya śeṣam tatra kṣayaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate,
GS41aryabhcu:5494: tena tat utpannam phalam madhyamagrahe kṣayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5495: evam dvitīyapadānte kṣayadhanayoḥ tulyatvāt na kiñcit avatiṣṭhate |
GS41aryabhcu:5496: tasmāt sāmarthyataḥ ayam arthaḥ saṃjātaḥ ã prathamapade gatajyāphalam kṣayaḥ, dvitīyapade api āgatajyāphalam kṣayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5498: tat etat prathamapade gatam bhujāsaṃjñitam dvitīyapade anāgatam |
GS41aryabhcu:5505: evam caturthapadānte dhanakṣayayoḥ tulyatvāt na kiṃcit avaśiṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5506: tasmāt atra api sa eva arthaḥ tulādikendre bhujāphalam dhanam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5508: yadi padeṣu sarveṣu tulyāḥ paridhayaḥ tadā evam syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5510: atulyeṣu ca paridhiṣu pratimaṇḍalasya ca api avasthā virudhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5514: grahaḥ tu gacchan krameṇa gacchati, na hariṇaplutena |
GS41aryabhcu:5517: nanu ca uktam ã na ca tulyāḥ paridhayaḥ paṭhyante iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5519: evam vijñāyate ã ete paridhayaḥ upacayā[pacayā]tmakāḥ, yataḥ tena tulyopacayāpacayātmakatvāt
GS41aryabhcu:5520: kramotkramavyavasthāyāḥ, yataḥ te eva bhavanti iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5522: tat yathā ã prathamapade kramajyām paridhyantareṇa hatvā vyāsārdhena labdham ūne viṣamapadaparidhau prakṣipyate, adhike apanīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5526: prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ dhanam, dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ kṣayaḥ iti viparyayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5527: athavā bhujāphalam śīghrakrameṇa ānītam meṣādau dhanam,
GS41aryabhcu:5530: atra śīghraphalam vyāsārdhena saṃguṇayya tat utpannakrarṇena bhāgalabdham phalam dhanam ṛṇam vā |
GS41aryabhcu:5531: etat ca karma trairāśikam ã yadi vyāsārdhamaṇḍale idam phalam
GS41aryabhcu:5532: labhyate, tadā śīghroccakarṇamaṇḍale kiyat iti vyastatrairāśikena vyāsārdham guṇakāraḥ, karṇaḥ bhāgahāraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5534: ucyate ã “alpe hi maṇḍale alpāḥ mahati mahāntaḥ ca rāśayaḥ jñeyāḥ”
GS41aryabhcu:5536: atha mandoccaphalam evam kasmāt na kriyate?
GS41aryabhcu:5537: ucyate ã kriyamāṇe api tāvat eva tat phalam bhavati iti na kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5539: tatra ca aviśeṣitena phalena vyāsārdham saṃguṇayya karṇena bhāge hṛte pūrvam ānītam eva phalam bhavati iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5540: atha kim iti śīghroccakarṇaḥ na aviśiṣyate? abhāvāt aviśeṣakarmaṇaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5541: atha atra idam praṣṭavyam ã kakṣyāmaṇḍalasya yathā svayojanakarṇaḥ vyāsārdhaḥ, tat ca svaliptābhiḥ mīyamānaḥ vasvagnivedarāmāḥ [3438],
GS41aryabhcu:5542: pratimaṇḍalasya api etat eva vyāsārdham iti etat |
GS41aryabhcu:5545: atha manyate ã tatkālotpannabhujākoṭiniṣpannakarṇaḥ vyāsārdham pratimaṇḍalasya |
GS41aryabhcu:5547: evam tarhi na kakṣyāmaṇḍalatulyam pratimaṇḍalam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5548: atra ucyate ã caturthapadādau kakṣyāpratimaṇḍale tulye |
GS41aryabhcu:5551: evam krameṇa upacīyamānam uccatulyagrahe svoccavṛttaviṣkambhārdham upacitam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5552: tat eva prathamapadādau prabhṛti utkrameṇa apacīyamānam prathamapadānte vyāsārdham eva bhavati
GS41aryabhcu:5553: evam krameṇa apacīyamānam dvitīyapadānte uccavṛttaviṣkambhārdham apacitam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5555: [padānte] ca utkrameṇa upacīyamānam iti etat kakṣyāmaṇḍalavyāsārdham eva |
GS41aryabhcu:5556: grahasya uccanīcagatikramāt upacayāpacayātmakam bhavati iti ataḥ pratimaṇḍalasya upadeśaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5557: ghanabhūmadhyāt eva grahasya uccanīcaparijñānam iti ataḥ vyāsārdham eva koṭiphalena upacīyate apacīyate vā |
GS41aryabhcu:5558: atha yadi pratimaṇḍalamadhyāt vyāsārdhasya vṛddhihrāsau syātām |
GS41aryabhcu:5564: śaniḥ ca guruḥ ca kujaḥ ca śanigurukujāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5565: ataḥ teṣu śanigurukujeṣu mandāt mandoccāt prabhṛti ya[t phalam upapadyate] tat ardham ṛṇam dhanam vā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5567: śīghrāt api ca yat phalam tat teṣu ardham kriyate prathame śīghrakarmaṇi |
GS41aryabhcu:5568: anyatra dvitīyakarmaṇi mandaśīghrayoḥ sakalaphalam iti arthāt avasīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5569: mandaśīghraphalāni kāṣṭhāni ṛṇam dhanam vā parikalpyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5571: tat phalam kva ṛṇam kva vā dhanam iti ã śanigurukujeṣu |
GS41aryabhcu:5575: yadi etat karma śanigurukujeṣu madhyameṣu kriyate, mandoccaphalārdhena madhyame ṛṇadhane kṛte tasya ṛṇadhanīkṛtasya madhyamatvam hīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5577: śīghroccaphalacāpārdhasya avikṛtamadhyame dhanarṇe prāpnutaḥJ| na etat asti |
GS41aryabhcu:5582: yathā devakattaḥ svalaṅkṛtaḥ api svam ākhyānam na jahāti, na ca karṇanāsāvacchedena api, evam atra api, dve karmaṇī tatra
GS41aryabhcu:5584: athavā prathamamadhyamāt mandoccāyātam phalārdham madhyamotpannatvāt madhyame kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5585: yat punar śīghroccāyātam sakṛtsaṃskṛtāt phalārdham tat sakṛtsaṃskṛtāyātam eva iti kṛtvā sakṛtsaṃskṛtaḥ eva kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5586: tasmāt dvikarmasaṃsiddhāt mandoccaphalam tat sakalam eva madhyame grahe kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5588: atha idam praṣṭavyam ã yat etat dvikarmasiddhamandoccāyātam tat dvikarmasaṃsiddhe eva kasmāt na kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5591: nanu ca dvikarmasiddhaḥ api madhyamaḥ eva |
GS41aryabhcu:5594: evam tarhi siddhe, punar sphuṭamadhyamagrahaṇam kurvan ācāryaḥ jñāpayati avikṛtamadhyaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5596: tasmāt dvitīyaphalam mandoccāyātam tat sakalam eva madhyame grahe kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5598: sa evaṃkṛte sphuṭamadhyamaḥ śīghroccakarmaṇā sphuṭaḥ bhavati iti sphuṭamadhyame śīghroccaphaladhanuḥ sakalam kriyate, sphuṭaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5599: ṛṇadhanayuktipradarśanārtham vyāsārdhatulyena karkaṭakena samāyāmavanau samavṛttamaṇḍalam ālikhya mātṛpitṛrekhām kuryāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5601: tanmaṇḍalakendrāt yāvatyaḥ abhīṣṭagrahāntyaphalaliptāḥ tāvati antare ca dakṣiṇena kendram kṛtvā vyāsārdhatulyena eva karkaṭakena tathā eva samavṛttamaṇḍalam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:5603: [kakṣyā]maṇḍalāt yāvadbhiḥ pratimaṇḍalam niṣkrāntam tāvatā vyāsārdhena kakṣyāmaṇḍaladakṣiṇottararekhāsaṃpāte kendram kṛtvā ubhayatra vṛttadvayam ālikhya[te |
GS41aryabhcu:5605: tayoḥ yathā kakṣyāmaṇḍale rāśijyāvikalpaḥ tathā karaṇīyam |
GS41aryabhcu:5606: prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ kakṣyāmaṇḍalāt uparisthitatvāt pratimaṇḍalasya vyāsārdhe koṭisādhanam prakṣipya karṇaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5607: kṛtaḥ, tāvat pramāṇam sūtram [pratimaṇḍalaparidhim] yatra spṛśati tatra
GS41aryabhcu:5609: kakṣyāmaṇḍalajyā ca tasmāt purataḥ iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5610: prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ tat utpannam phalam madhyamagrahāt apacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5611: dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ padayoḥ kakṣyāmaṇḍalāt adhovyavasthitatvāt pratimaṇḍalasya, vyāsārdhāt koṭisādhanam apanīya kṛtaḥ karṇaḥ, tāvatpramāṇam sūtram kakṣyāmaṇḍalamadhyāt pratimaṇḍalaparidhim yatra spṛśati tatra sphuṭaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5614: tena tat utpannam phalam dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ padayoḥ madhyamagrahāt upacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5615: śīghrocce punar yeṣām kṣayadhanadhanakṣayāḥ syuḥ mandoccāt evam eva śīghroccāt iti ayam pāṭhaḥ teṣām iyam ṛṇadhanopapattiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5616: yeṣām punar vyatyayena śīghroccāt iti ayam pāṭhaḥ teṣām iyam eva upapattiḥ viparītā |
GS41aryabhcu:5617: katham? pratimaṇḍale sphuṭaḥ ca grahaḥ, madhyamaḥ ca śīghroccaparikalpanāya kakṣyāmaṇḍale
GS41aryabhcu:5618: punar kendrajyā tena prathamacaturthayoḥ padayoḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitatvāt madhyamasya kendrajyāgrahasya ānīyamānasya kendrajyotpannam phalam dhanam bhavati puraḥsthitatvāt kendrajyāgrahasya, dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ padayoḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitatvāt kendrajyāgrahasya tat phalam apanīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5619: ataḥ evam mandaśīghrayoḥ parasparaviruddhatvāt upapatteḥ, ācāryeṇa paramārthasphuṭagrahapradeśaḥ bhūtārāgrahavivarapramāṇapradeśaḥ darśitaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5620: tena yāvat bhūtārāgrahavivarapramāṇam sūtram kakṣyāmaṇḍalamadhyāt pratimaṇḍalaparidhim padavibhāgena prasāritam yatra spṛśati, tatra sphuṭaḥ grahaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5621: anye punar anyathā paṭhanti ã śanigurukujeṣu mande ardham ṛṇam dhanam bhavati pūrvam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5622: mande mandocce ardham phalasya ṛṇam dhanam, yadi tat grahe ṛṇam dhanam tadā tat mandocce dhanam ṛṇam iti arthāt avasīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5623: tatra kiyat tat phalam mandocce ṛṇam sat dhanam bhavati, dhanam sat ṛṇam
GS41aryabhcu:5624: bhavati iti ucyate ã śīghroccaphalam yasmāt mandoccaphalam ca phaladvayam etat |
GS41aryabhcu:5628: karmacatuṣṭayagrahaṇāt tat utpannam ca phalam tatra eva |
GS41aryabhcu:5629: tat yathā ã prāg eva śīghraphalam ānīya tat ardham ṛṇam dhanam vā mandocce kṛtvā tat mandāyātam ca tena phaladvayasaṃskṛtena mandoccena saṃskṛtaḥ sa sphuṭamadhyaḥ grahaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5630: sa śīghrakarmaṇā sphuṭaḥ iti prakriyāntaram etat || 22 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5632: grahāṇām sphuṭīkaraṇaprakārāntaram āha ã mandoccāt śīghroccāt ardham ṛṇam dhanam graheṣu mandeṣu
GS41aryabhcu:5633: mandoccāt sphuṭamadhyāḥ śīghroccāt ca sphuṭāḥ jñeyāḥ || 23 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5634: mandoccāt yat phalam āyātam tasya cāpārdham ṛṇam dhanam vā graheṣu ṛṇam dhanam [mandeṣu vā kartavyam] |
GS41aryabhcu:5636: cakāreṇa vinā graheṣu mandeṣu ca iti cārthaḥ na labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5640: bāle vṛddhe kṣate kṣīṇe kṣīram yuktyā prayojayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5641: iti atra cakāreṇa vinā cārthasya avagamanāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5644: api vaktavyam, yena sveṣu madhyameṣu sveṣu ca mandeṣu kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5646: svasya grahasya yaḥ madhyamaḥ svasya ca yat mandam tatra eva karmasiddheḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5648: na ca tatra ucyate ã “svasyām mātari svasmin vā
GS41aryabhcu:5651: atha yat etat mandoccāyātam phalārdham tat kṣayadhanakrameṇa madhye grahe dhanam ṛṇam vā kriyate
GS41aryabhcu:5652: mande punar katham kriyate, mandasya ṛṇadhanakramasya anabhidhānāt? ucyate ã mandoccam sarvadā eva grahasya
GS41aryabhcu:5654: tatra yat grahasya ṛṇam tat mandocce prakṣipyate, ṛṇabhūtatvāt
GS41aryabhcu:5655: | yat grahe dhanabhūtam tat mandoccāt apanīyate, mandoccasya ṛṇabhūtatvāt eva |
GS41aryabhcu:5657: ṛṇa[ṛṇayoḥ dhana]dhanayoḥ saṃkṣepaḥ ṛṇadhanayoḥ ca viśeṣaḥ | iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5659: tasmāt anena krameṇa mandocce phalārdhasya upacayāpacayau bhavataḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5660: śīghroccāt ca yat phalārdham tat api evam eva grahavaiparītyena mande dhanam ṛṇam vā kriyate
GS41aryabhcu:5665: tena tādṛgvidhena mandena madhyamāt viśodhitena yat phalam āyātam tat sakalam madhyeṣu ṛṇam dhanam vā kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5667: [madhyamasya] sphuṭasya antarvartitvāt [sphuṭāḥ ye na, na avikṛteṣu] madhyameṣu phalasya karaṇāt madhyamāḥJ|
GS41aryabhcu:5669: ekena karmaṇā niṣpannā yena dvitīyam karmāntaram apekṣante |
GS41aryabhcu:5671: śīghroccāt āyātam phalam tena saṃskṛtāḥ sphuṭāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5675: bhṛgubudhayoḥ karma āha ã śīghroccāt ardhonam kartavyam ṛṇam dhanam svamandocce |
GS41aryabhcu:5676: sphuṭamadhyau tu bhṛgubudhau siddhāt mandāt sphuṭau bhavataḥ || 24 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5677: śīghroccāt iti prāk śīghroccaniṣpannam phalam gṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5679: tatra tat ardhonam ardham iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5681: yadi grahe ṛṇam tadā dhanam kartavyam |
GS41aryabhcu:5682: dhanasya ṛṇam kartavyam iti arthāt avasīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5687: yat eva śīghroccaphalārdhena saṃskṛtam mandoccam tat siddham iti abhidhīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5689: etat uktam bhavati ã yat eta[t siddhamandam tat madhyama]grahāt viśodhya śeṣaphalasya ca ṛṇadhanena tayoḥ bhṛgubudhayoḥ madhyau sphuṭamadhyau bhavataḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5690: “tu”-śabdāt “śīghroccāt ca sphuṭāḥ jñeyāḥ” [kālakriyāí, 23] iti etat kriyate || 24 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5694: kakṣyāyām grahavegaḥ yaḥ bhavati sa mandanīcocce || 25 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5695: tārāgrahāṇām bhuvaḥ ca yat antaram tasya ānayanopāyaḥ ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5696: bhūtārāgrahavivaram bhuvaḥ tārāgrahasya ca yat antaram tat bhūtārāgrahavivaram bhavati iti vakṣyati |
GS41aryabhcu:5701: etat uktam bhavati ã mandoccakarṇasya śīghroccakarṇasya ca yaḥ ghātaḥ saḥ svakarṇasaṃvargaḥ vyāsārdhahṛtaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5703: tāvat ucchritāyām [kakṣyāyām] grahasya yaḥ mandaśīghroccaphalajanitaḥ vegaḥ sa tasya
GS41aryabhcu:5706: apare āhuḥ ã na bhūtārāgrahavivaram bhāgahāraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5708: yasmāt etat atra trairāśikam ã yadi trijyayā svagrahābhihitavikṣepaḥ labhyate, anayā abhīṣṭagrahasvapātavivarāntarālāṃśajyayā bhujajyayā kim iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5710: yadi idam eva trairāśikam syāt, tadā nakṣatratārāgrahaśaśiyogāḥ sarvadā tasyām eva diśi tulyavikṣepavivarāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5714: yadi vyāsārdha]m eva bhāgahāraḥ syāt tadā sarve eva tulyagatayaḥ syuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5716: bhūtārāgrahavivaravaśāt vikṣepaḥ alpaḥ mahān ca nakṣatratārāgrahayogeṣu labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5717: [alpe vā] mahadvikṣepe dakṣiṇottaradigvaśāt niyatavikṣepāntaradiśaḥ yogāḥ upapadyante |
GS41aryabhcu:5720: katham? yadi vyāsārdhatulyayā pātāntarabhujajyayā yathāsvam vikṣepaḥ alpaḥ mahān ca labhyate, tadā ana[yā bhuja]jyayā pātāntarotpannayā kaḥ iti
GS41aryabhcu:5722: [ataḥ] punar api vyastatrairāśikam ã yadi ayam
GS41aryabhcu:5723: vikṣepaḥ kakṣyāmaṇḍale vyāsārdhaviṣkambhe labhyate, tadā paramārthapratimaṇḍale bhūtārāgrahavivaraviṣkambhārdhe kiyān iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5724: pūrvatrairāśike vyāsārdham bhāgahāraḥ āsīt, tat eva dvitīyatrairāśike
GS41aryabhcu:5729: evam iṣṭagrahayoḥ vikṣepāvabhinnadikkau viśiṣyate, yasmāt apakramamaṇḍalāt tau pravṛttau |
GS41aryabhcu:5730: tataḥ tadviśeṣatulyam tayoḥ antaram bhavati, tatra api tayoḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5733: yasmāt ekaḥ apakramamaṇḍalāt dakṣiṇena aparaḥ uttareṇa, tasmāt tadantaram [vikṣepayoga]pramāṇam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5735: | yadā punar antaraliptāḥ na syuḥ, alpāḥ vā [syuḥ] tadā tayoḥ anyonyāśeṣāt
GS41aryabhcu:5740: atha nakṣatratārāgrahayogeṣu natilambanaparijñānārtham idam karma kriyate
GS41aryabhcu:5741: | “śaśiṅañaṇanamāṃśakāḥ” [gītikāí, 7] iti atra śaśiyojanakarṇaḥ ṅādibhiḥ guṇitaḥ śukrādīnām bhāgahārāḥ bhavanti iti vyākhyātam |
GS41aryabhcu:5742: tena śaśiyojanakarṇaḥ pañcabhiḥ guṇitaḥ śukrasya yojanakarṇaḥ bhavati daśabhiḥ guroḥ, pañcadaśabhiḥ budhasya, viṃśatyā śaneḥ, pañcaviṃśatyā aṅgārakasya |
GS41aryabhcu:5743: yadi evam tarhi grahāṇām kakṣyābhidhānam virudhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5745: tāvat kakṣyāsthāḥ eva grahāḥ, atra punar ṅādiguṇakāraiḥ dṛṣṭiparikarma kriyate iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5746: ayam yojanakarṇaḥ bhūtārāgrahavivaraguṇitaḥ vyāsārdhahṛtaḥ sphuṭaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5747: etat api trairāśikam ã yadi vyāsārdhaliptābhiḥ etāvanti yojanāni labhyante bhūtārāgrahavivaraliptābhiḥ kiyanti iti, athavā trairāśikadvayaikīkaraṇena abhīṣṭagrahasphuṭayojanakarṇaḥ ānīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5748: katham? bhūtārāgrahavivarānayane vyāsārdham bhāgahāraḥ āsīt, iha ca bhūtārāgrahavivarasvamadhyamayojanakarṇābhyāsasya vyāsārdham eva bhāgahāraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5751: tayoḥ ayam arthaḥ sañjātaḥ ã mandaśīghra[karṇa]guṇitaḥ madhyamayojanakarṇaḥ vyāsārdhakṛtivibhaktaḥ sphuṭayojanakarṇaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5752: mandanīcocce mandasya mandoccasya ucce nīce ca ānītaḥ mandakarṇaḥ eva anena vidhinā sphuṭīkṛtaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5755: tat yathā ã savituḥ bhujāphalena ravyādibhuktayaḥ guṇitāḥ khakhaṣaḍghanena vibhajya āptakalā graheṣu bhujāphaladhanarṇavaśāt kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5756: tat vicāryate ã idam karma anupadiṣṭam katham avagamyate? na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5759: arkodayāvadheḥ gateḥ eteṣām pratipacchedau iti upadeśāt arkaḥ hi sphuṭagaṇitāvagatagateḥ eva udayaśikharamadhyāste iti sphuṭasya arkasya udayaḥ parigṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5760: sphuṭagatiḥ ca madhyamā eva svabhujāphalādiliptābhiḥ upacitāpacitā vā iti ataḥ bhujāphalaliptābhiḥ prāṇatulyābhiḥ trairāśikam kriyate ã yadi ahorātraprāṇaiḥ khakhaṣaḍghanatulyaiḥ vivasvadādisphuṭabhuktayaḥ labhyante,
GS41aryabhcu:5763: atra ucyate ã ravyudayāt eva jyotiścakrādeḥ api udayādiḥ iti vyākhyātam |
GS41aryabhcu:5764: tena pravahākṣepāt madhyamaḥ sarvadā svabhujāphalena adhikaḥ ūnaḥ vā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5765: yadā adhikaḥ tadā jyotiścakram bhujāphalaliptātulyam ravigatyā jīyate, [ūnaḥ cet bhujāphalaliptātulyam ravigatyā apacīyate] iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5766: anayā parikalpanayā jyotiścakrasambandhinyaḥ tadā bhujāphalaliptāḥ bhavanti, jyotiścakraliptāḥ prāṇāḥ ca tulyāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5767: ataḥ tāsām prā[ṇatulyabhujāphalaliptānām abhāvaḥ, ahargaṇāt āga]taḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5770: anyathā tatra api bhujāntaraphalam kriyate eva |
GS41aryabhcu:5771: arkaḥ hi sphuṭagaṇi[tāvagateḥ eva udaya]śikharamadhyāste iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5772: evam eteṣām vivasvadādīnām grahāṇām sphuṭagatayaḥ sūryodayāvadheḥ bhavanti iti ataḥ ravi[vaśāt eva upacayāpaca]yātmakam phalam kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5775: nāḍībhiḥ yathāsvam madhyamā bhuktiḥ labhyate tadā pañcadaśabhiḥ ghaṭikābhiḥ triṃśatā pañcacatvāriṃśadbhiḥ ca kim iti [phalali]ptāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5776: audayikebhyaḥ grahebhyaḥ viśodhyante, tataḥ tena ravyādayaḥ tātkālikāḥ bhavanti |
GS41aryabhcu:5781: yadā punar para[sya grahasya raveḥ iva] kalpyante tadā candroda[yajñā]nena
GS41aryabhcu:5785: tat yathā ã sphuṭaśaśinaḥ sphuṭaḥ raviḥ apanīyate, yasmāt tithiḥ śaśimāsavaśāt bhavati tena “raviśaśiyogāḥ bhavanti [śaśimāsāḥ”
GS41aryabhcu:5787: yathāsambhavam atra bhagaṇaḥ na sambhavati iti rāśyādayaḥ eva rāśyādibhyaḥ apanīyante |
GS41aryabhcu:5789: ka[lpāditaḥ ye ravighagaṇāḥ] bhuktāḥ te śaśibhagaṇebhyaḥ viśodhyante,
GS41aryabhcu:5793: tatra ye avaśiṣṭāḥ rāśyādayaḥ vartamānaśaśimāsasya avayavabhūtāḥ taiḥ liptīkṛtaiḥ trairāśi[kam ã yadi khakhaṣaḍghana]tulyena sūryācandramasoḥ viśeṣeṇa śaśimāsaḥ labhyate tadā ābhiḥ candrādityaviśeṣaliptābhiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5794: kiyacchaśimās[āḥ iti sampūrṇa]māsam na prayacchati iti divasāḥ kriyante |
GS41aryabhcu:5795: “triṃśaddivasaḥ bhavet sa māsaḥ” [kālakriyāí, 1] iti triṃśatkaḥ guṇakāraḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5800: va]rtamānaśaśimāsasya śuklapratipatpravṛttāḥ, tatra śeṣaliptāḥ vartamānatitheḥ bhuktāḥ, tadviśuddhāḥ bhāgahāraliptāḥ bhojyāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5801: ataḥ tābhiḥ bhuktabhojyaliptābhiḥ trairāśikam ã yadi tat ahaḥ sūryācandramasoḥ sphuṭabhuktyantaraliptābhiḥ ekaḥ śaśidivasaḥ labhyate tataḥ ābhiḥ bhuktabhojyaliptābhiḥ kiyān śaśidivasasya labhyate iti, tatra divaseṣu bhāgam na prayacchanti iti nāḍyaḥ kriyante |
GS41aryabhcu:5803: divasaḥ” [kālakriyāí, 1] iti ṣaṣṭyā saṅguṇayya sphuṭabhuktyantaraliptābhiḥ bhāgalabdhāḥ bhuktabhojyāḥ titheḥ nāḍyaḥ sūryodayāvadheḥ gatāḥ gantavyāḥ vā bhavanti iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5807: tat yathā ã yadi sūryācandramasoḥ taddinasphuṭabhuktyantaraliptābhiḥ sūryācandramasoḥ sphuṭabhuktiḥ yathāsvam labhyate tataḥ ābhiḥ gatagantavyatithiliptābhiḥ kiyatyaḥ sphuṭabhuktiliptāḥ iti labdhāḥ liptāḥ ravau gantavyaparvaṇi prakṣipyante, śaśini ca |
GS41aryabhcu:5808: atha gataparvaṇi tayoḥ eva yathāsvam trairāśikāyātaliptāḥ viśodhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:5809: evam gantavyagataparvaṇaḥ paryavasānakālikau samaliptau bhavataḥ iti gaṇitapāde api asmābhiḥ “bhukteḥ vilomavivare” [gaṇitaí, 31] iti asyām āryāyām
GS41aryabhcu:5810: saṃkṣepataḥ abhihitam iti kṛtvā iha tu vistareṇa pradarśitam |
GS41aryabhcu:5812: candrayuktena nakṣatreṇa vyavahāraḥ iti pratyaham candrayuktanakṣatrapratipaccheda [parijñānam] kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5813: tat yathā ã śaśiliptābhiḥ trairāśikam ã yadi maṇḍalaliptābhiḥ khakhaṣaḍghanatulyābhiḥ saptaviṃśatiḥ nakṣatrāṇi labhyante tataḥ [ābhiḥ candragataliptābhiḥ kim iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5815: saptaviṃśateḥ saptaviṃśatibhāgena ekam khakhaṣaḍghanasya api tāvatbhāgena aṣṭau [śatāni,
GS41aryabhcu:5817: nakṣatrāṇām aśvinyādīnām [yāni gatāni teṣām saṃkhyā] labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5818: śeṣe gatagantavyam kṛtvā vartamānasya nakṣatrasya gatagantavyāḥ nāḍyaḥ sādhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:5819: katham? yadi sphuṭabhuktyā ṣaṣṭiḥ nāḍyaḥ labhyante, ābhiḥ gatagantavyaliptābhiḥ kiyatyaḥ iti gatagantavyanāḍyaḥ labhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:5820: śaśibhukteḥ ahorātrakālāvadhiniṣpannatvāt, ahorātrasya ca pramāṇam ṣaṣṭiḥ nāḍyaḥ iti ṣaṣṭyā trairāśikam kriyate || 25 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5821: iti bhāskarasya kṛtau āryabhaṭatantrabhāṣye kālakriyāpādaḥ samāptaḥ ||
GS41aryabhcu:5827: kālakriyānantaram golam, “trīṇi gadati gaṇitam kālakriyām golam” iti uktatvāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5831: evam paramārthajijñāsavaḥ hi asatyapūrvakam satyam pratipadyante |
GS41aryabhcu:5832: tat yathā bhiṣajaḥ hi utpalanālādiṣu sirāvedhanādīni pratipadyante, yajñaśastravidaḥ śuṣkeṣṭyā
GS41aryabhcu:5834: evam atra api sāṃvatsarāḥ vṛttaśalākāsūtrāvalambakādibhiḥ kṣetragaṇitaviśeṣaiḥ pāramārthikam golam pratipadyante |
GS41aryabhcu:5835: tasmāt diṅmātrapradarśanam eva etat ārabhyate, aśakyatvāt aśeṣapradarśanasya |
GS41aryabhcu:5836: kaḥ hi citrayan nimeṣonmeṣādi api citrayati |
GS41aryabhcu:5837: tasmāt śrīparṇivañculakāṣṭhayoḥ anyatamam ardhavṛttacakrasvarūpam krākacikaiḥ vṛttam ekam niṣpādayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5838: tataḥ sughaṭitārdhavṛttadvayena tribhiḥ vā sughaṭitavṛttaśakalaiḥ vṛttam ekam nirmāpayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5840: tatra eteṣām anyatamena vṛttaśakalāni anyonyam ghaṭayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5841: tāmrakīlakaiḥ tatra evam niṣpannam ekam vṛttam pūrvāparam nidhāya dvitīyam dakṣiṇottaram upari adhaḥ ca janitasvastikam svastikasampāte ca maṇḍaladvayam ardhaccedena chitvā tathā saṃyojyam yathā ekam eva vṛttam lakṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5842: tau vihitārdhacchedena svastikacatuṣṭayam praveśya niścalam nidadhya tāmrakīlakaiḥ niścalīkriyate
GS41aryabhcu:5843: tataḥ tayoḥ maṇḍalayoḥ bahiḥ parikaravat dikcatuṣṭayajanitasvastikam anyam tathā eva ardhacchedena svastikacatuṣṭayam praveśya niścalam nidadhyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5844: pūrvāparamaṇḍalam ṣaṣṭyaṅkāṅkitam kārayet, yathā ekaikasmin caturbhāge
GS41aryabhcu:5847: evam pariśeṣam maṇḍaladvayam api, ekaikam ṣaṣṭiśatatrayāṅkitam [kārayet] |
GS41aryabhcu:5849: tat tulyam eva aparam maṇḍalam ṣaṣṭiśatatrayāṅkitam pūrvasvastike aparasvastike ca tiryak tribhāgacchedam kṛtvā dvau tribhāgau maṇḍalapradeśasya svastikam ghaṭayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5850: yathā vā maṇḍalatrayasampātam ekam eva lakṣyate tathā avachedaḥ kalpanīyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5851: pūrvāparadakṣiṇottaramaṇḍalayoḥ yaḥ adhaḥ svastikaḥ tasmāt uttareṇa uttaraśalākāyām caturviṃśatibhāge tathā eva ardhacchedena svastikam kārayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5852: upari api tathā eva uparisvastikāt dakṣiṇena [dakṣiṇa]śalākāyām caturviṃśatitame bhāge svastikam kārayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5856: tāvatpramāṇam eva anyat maṇḍalam sañcāri yatra candramasaḥ sampātaḥ vartate tasmin badhvā tataḥ uttareṇa parataḥ nivatitame bhāge yathā ca ardhapañcamabhāgāḥ tasya ca apakramamaṇḍalasya ca antare bhavanti tathā vidhāya pātabhāge cakrārdhāntare badhīyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5857: evam tataḥ dakṣiṇena navatitame bhāge ardhapañcamā bhāgāḥ tasya apakramamaṇḍalasya ca yathā antare bhavanti tathā nidadhyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5858: evam tat vimaṇḍalam, tat eva vikṣepamaṇḍalam iti ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5859: evam anyeṣām api svebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ pātabhāgebhyaḥ api maṇḍalāni |
GS41aryabhcu:5861: svāhorātramaṇḍalāni api sañcārīṇi ã viṣuvataḥ uttareṇa meṣāpakramakāṣṭhatulyāntare pūrvāparāyatam maṇḍalam meṣasya ahorātramaṇḍalam, vṛṣāntāpakramatulyakāṣṭhāntare vṛṣasya,
GS41aryabhcu:5867: meṣasya ahorātramaṇḍalena unmaṇḍalasya yatra sampātaḥ tatra sūtrasya ekam agram badhvā mīnasya ahorātronmaṇḍalasampāte dvitīyam agram badhnīyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5868: bhūmadhyāvabhedisūtram viṣuvatā saha badhnīyāt, tasya prathamasūtrasya ca
GS41aryabhcu:5874: | anyathā kālasamaḥ golaḥ bhramayitum na śakyate, maṇḍalabahutvāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5875: atha suślakṣṇām ṛjvīm ayaḥśalākām gopucchāyatavṛttām dakṣiṇottarasvastikāvabhedinīm nirgatobhayāgrām pañjarabhārasahām nidadhyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5876: tanmadhye bhuvam samavṛttām mṛdā anyena vā racayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5877: evam ayam ekaḥ eva pañjaraḥ sarveṣām grahāṇām |
GS41aryabhcu:5878: yasmāt bhinnakakṣyāsthāḥ api grahāḥ ekakakṣyāgatāḥ eva upalakṣyante, tasmāt ayam eva ekaḥ pañjaraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5879: athavā sarveṣām eva pṛthak pṛthak pañjarāḥ yāvat tāvat paricchinnasvakakṣyāpramāṇāḥ eva pradarśayitavyāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5880: athavā pañjarasya bahiḥ [dakṣiṇottara]svastikayoḥ ayaḥśalākāyām tryaṅgulām caturaṅgulām vā ślakṣṇām śaradaṇḍikām niścalām nidadhyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5881: tataḥ yāvattāvatpramāṇaparicchinnakhakakṣyāparikalpitam ubhayataḥ cakrārdhāntarakṛtavedham [maṇḍalam] dakṣiṇottarāvagāhi nidhāya tasya
GS41aryabhcu:5882: madhye pañjaram praveśya tām ayaḥśalākām ubhayatra pārśvavedhau
GS41aryabhcu:5883: praveśayet, yathā sā śaradaṇḍikā pañjaradvayasīmāvagāhinī bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5884: tāvatpramāṇam eva anyadvṛttam pūrvāparāvagāhi upari adhaḥ ca janitasvastikam pūrvavat nidadhyāt
GS41aryabhcu:5886: punar api tāvat eva anyat maṇḍalam parikaravat dikcatuṣṭayajanitasvastikam dakṣiṇottarasvastikasampātakṛtavedham ubhayatra lohaśalākām praveśya niścalam nidadhyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5888: evam ayam golaḥ viṣuvati samaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate |
GS41aryabhcu:5889: viṣuvataḥ uttareṇa yāvān akṣaḥ tāvatsu bhāgeṣu khagolottarasvastikāt upari vedham kārayet,
GS41aryabhcu:5890: dakṣiṇataḥ ca tāvati eva antare [adhaḥ] vedhaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5893: evam svaviṣayākṣapramāṇena avasthitaḥ golaḥ, tatra sarvam eva pradarśayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5894: atha khagolapramāṇam eva anyadvṛttam ubhayataḥ cakrārdhāntarakṛtavedham uttaraḥ nirgatāyaḥśalākāgram praveśayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5896: tatra tat niścalam nidhāya, tasya pūrvāparasvastikasampāte pūrvavat tiryagbhedena pūrvāparasvastikayoḥ niścalam tat maṇḍalam nidadhyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5899: anye punar samāyāmavanau khagolārdhapramāṇam avaṭam khātvā tatra yathā kṣitijamaṇḍalam upari bhavati tathā ardhanimagnam khagolam nidhāya darśayanti |
GS41aryabhcu:5902: evam golam badhvā sarvam eva avaśeṣam śāstre vyākhyāyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5904: atra āditaḥ eva tāvat apakramamaṇḍalam āha ã meṣādeḥ kanyāntam samam udak apamaṇḍalārdham apayātam |
GS41aryabhcu:5906: meṣādeḥ meṣasya ādiḥ meṣādiḥ, tasmāt meṣādeḥ, kanyāntam antam paryavasānam, kanyāyāḥ antam kanyāntam; meṣādeḥ ārabhya yāvat kanyāntam |
GS41aryabhcu:5912: taulyādeḥ taulinaḥ ādiḥ taulyādiḥ, tasmāt taulyādeḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:5913: mīnasya antam mīnāntam; taulyādeḥ ārabhya yāvat mīnāntam |
GS41aryabhcu:5914: śeṣārdham śeṣam ca tadardham ca śeṣārdham, athavā śeṣasya jyotiścakrasya apamaṇḍalasaṃjñitasya ardham śeṣārdham |
GS41aryabhcu:5918: athavā evam ardhamātram api paścārdhe pradarśayati, yathā uttareṇa samam apakramamaṇḍalam tiryak vyavasthitam,
GS41aryabhcu:5919: evam atra api dakṣiṇena tasya eva apakramamaṇḍalasya ardham tiryak eva avatiṣṭhate iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5920: atra vinā api “sama”śabdena ṣaḍrāśipramāṇābhidhānāt udagdakṣiṇāpakramamaṇḍalārdhasamatvam gamyate, samagrahaṇam atiricyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5921: na atiricyate ã pratideśam akṣaviśeṣāt rāśīnām udayakālāḥ viṣamāḥ upalakṣyante, tena samaśabdāt ṛte viṣamapramāṇānām rāśīnām grahaṇam syāt,
GS41aryabhcu:5922: tataḥ ca akṣaviśeṣāt meṣādīnām apakramajyāḥ pratideśam bhinnapramāṇāḥ syuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5923: “sama”śabde punar kriyamāṇe tulyapramāṇarāśigrahaṇam siddham, yasmāt sarvaḥ eva
GS41aryabhcu:5924: rāśiḥ jyotiścakradvādaśabhāgaḥ, sa ca triṃśattriṃśadbhāgapramāṇaḥ iti
GS41aryabhcu:5925: |evam apakramamaṇḍalam viṣuvataḥ uttareṇa meṣādeḥ kanyāntam tiryak
GS41aryabhcu:5927: tat eva tulyādeḥ mīnāntam dakṣiṇena viṣuvataḥ tathā eva avatiṣṭhate |
GS41aryabhcu:5928: katham idam anuktam gamyate viṣuvataḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5930: udagdakṣiṇena iti b(r)uvan ācāryaḥ siddham eva viṣuvanmaṇḍalam pradarśayati |
GS41aryabhcu:5931: anyathā hi udagdakṣiṇena iti, etat anarthakam syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:5932: udagdakṣiṇaśabdau ca digvācinau, dik vyavasthā apekṣayā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:5933: ataḥ pūrvam viṣuvanmaṇḍalam badhvā tataḥ apakramamaṇḍalam badhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5937: tasmin ca apakramamaṇḍale ke bhramanti iti āha ã tārāgrahendupātāḥ bhramanti ajasram apamaṇḍale arkaḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:5938: arkāt ca maṇḍalārdhe bhramati hi tasmin kṣiticchāyā || 2 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5939: tārāgrahāḥ bhaumabudhabṛhaspatiśukraśanaiścarāḥ, tārāgrahendupātāḥ bhramanti ajasram avyavacchedena, apamaṇḍale apakramamaṇḍale, arkaḥ ca na
GS41aryabhcu:5940: kevalam ete tārāgrahendupātāḥ apamaṇḍale bhramanti, arkaḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:5941: tatra apamaṇḍale ajasram arkaḥ ca bhramati |
GS41aryabhcu:5942: arkāt ca maṇḍalārdhe arkāt punar maṇḍalārdhe ṣaḍrāśyantare, bhramati hi tasmin tatra maṇḍalārdhe,
GS41aryabhcu:5943: | yathā stambhādīnām pradīpavaśāt chāyā bhramati, evam bhuvaḥ api
GS41aryabhcu:5947: tat kim idānīm arkāt maṇḍalārdhe bhūcchāyā bhramati iti ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5948: na ca bhūcchāyāvyatiriktaḥ pātaḥ asti candramasaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:5950: sarveṣām eva tārāgrahāṇām ye pātāḥ te apakramamaṇḍale bhramanti |
GS41aryabhcu:5951: candramasaḥ punar pātaḥ arkāt maṇḍalārdhe apakramamaṇḍale bhramati iti etat eva artham |
GS41aryabhcu:5952: “arkāt ca maṇḍalārdhe bhramati hi tasmin kṣiticchāyā” iti kathayati |
GS41aryabhcu:5953: nanu ca budhādīnām ye pātāḥ te niścalāḥ teṣām niścalānām katham apakramamaṇḍalagatiḥ ucyate ? na te niścalāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:5954: “navarāṣaha gatvā aṃśakān prathamapātāḥ” [gītikāí, 9] iti atra “gatvā”-śabdena teṣām gatyupadeśāt
GS41aryabhcu:5955: “tārāgrahendupātāḥ” iti iyam āryā kim artham ārabhyate? tārāgrahādīnām gatiḥ apakramamaṇḍale vijñāyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5957: [gītikāí, 8] iti sarve[ṣām gatimatā]m ete apakramabhāgāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5958: yadi ca gītikoktam api atra punar ucyate, tadā tarhi bahu atra abhidheyam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:5959: athavā raveḥ cakrārdhe bhūcchāyā bhramati iti etat pradarśayitavyam syāt,
GS41aryabhcu:5964: raveḥ cakrārdhe bhūcchāyā bhramati iti etat
GS41aryabhcu:5965: pradarśayati, yataḥ hi śaṅkaḥ ṛjusthitasya pradīpasya tat
GS41aryabhcu:5969: grahāṇām vikṣepamaṇḍalapradarśanāya āha ã apamaṇḍalasya candraḥ pātāt yāti uttareṇa dakṣiṇataḥ
GS41aryabhcu:5970: kujagurukoṇāḥ ca evam śīghroccena api budhaśukrau || 3 ||
GS41aryabhcu:5975: apamaṇḍalasaṃsthitaḥ vā candraḥ apamaṇḍalasya candraḥ, yathā ã kusūlasya
GS41aryabhcu:5977: athavā adhikaraṇārthā iyam ṣaṣṭhī, yataḥ hi ekaśatam
GS41aryabhcu:5978: ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ, apamaṇḍale candraḥ iti etasmin arthe |
GS41aryabhcu:5979: sa apamaṇḍalavyavasthitaḥ candraḥ pātāt yāti gacchati |
GS41aryabhcu:5981: tasya ca saṃyogasya pratikṣaṇam gatimattvāt, sā gatiḥ pātaśabdena abhidhīyate, upacārāt
GS41aryabhcu:5982: ataḥ sa gatisaṃjñitaḥ pātaḥ yasmin rāśau yāvatithe bhāge vartate tasmin rāśau tāvatithe bhāge apakramamaṇḍalapramāṇam eva anyat maṇḍalam tasmin badhvā dvitīyam ardham cakrārdhāntare tathā eva badhnīyāt yathā tat apakramamaṇḍalāt uttareṇa avatiṣṭhate tasya [prathamam ardham], yathā dvitīyam ardham vā dakṣiṇena upalakṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:5983: evam ca prathamapātāt apakramamaṇḍalasya uttareṇa vikṣepamaṇḍalam, dvitīyapātāt ca dakṣiṇena,
GS41aryabhcu:5984: ubhayatra cakracaturbhāgāntare yathā ardhapañcamāḥ bhāgāḥ tasya ca apakramamaṇḍalasya antare bhavanti tathā badhnīyāt vikṣepamaṇḍalam |
GS41aryabhcu:5986: viṣuvataḥ uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā tat apakramamaṇḍalam |
GS41aryabhcu:5987: tasmāt apakramamaṇḍalāt uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā vikṣepamaṇḍalam pradarśayet |
GS41aryabhcu:5988: candrasya ca vikṣepamaṇḍalavyavasthitasya viṣuvataḥ ca antarānayane iyam yuktiḥ ã sphuṭacandramasaḥ bhujajyayā trairāśikam ã yadi vyāsārdhatulyayā bhujajyayā caturviṃśatyapakramabhāgajyā labhyate tataḥ candrabhujajyayā kā
GS41aryabhcu:5990: tataḥ pātāt apakramamaṇḍalavyavasthitaḥ candraḥ dakṣiṇena uttareṇa vā yāti iti uktavān |
GS41aryabhcu:5991: pātāvadhi parijñānāya sphuṭacandramasaḥ pātaḥ viśodhyate, tatra viśeṣasya yā jyā tayā trairāśikam ã yadi
GS41aryabhcu:5992: vyāsārdhajyayā candravikṣepabhāgajyā labhyate anayā iṣṭajyayā kā iti,
GS41aryabhcu:5994: tayoḥ vikṣepāpakramajyayoḥ kāṣṭhīkṛtayoḥ tulyadikkayoḥ yogaḥ, yasmāt apakramamaṇḍalāt parataḥ candraḥ vartate |
GS41aryabhcu:5995: bhinnadikkayoḥ viśeṣaḥ, yasmāt ārāt apakramamaṇḍalā[t vikṣepamaṇḍalam]
GS41aryabhcu:5998: yogaviśleṣabhāgānām yā jyā tāvat antaram viṣuvataḥ candramasaḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:6001: yathā candraḥ svasmāt pātāt uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā apakramamaṇḍalasthitaḥ yāti, evam eva kujagurukoṇāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6008: [evam tarhi] etayoḥ apakramaparijñānam api śīghroccāt eva |
GS41aryabhcu:6009: kutaḥ? apakramamaṇḍalāt pātāt vikṣepam bruvatā taduccayoḥ apakramamaṇḍalasthitiḥ pradarśitā bhavati, yataḥ apakramamaṇḍalasthitaḥ vikṣepamaṇḍale pravartate |
GS41aryabhcu:6011: samyak idam avagamyate ã etayoḥ apakramam api śīghroccāt iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6012: kutaḥ vikṣepasya eva kevalasya? “śīghroccena api budhaśukrau” iti śīghroccāt pātapravṛttāt etayoḥ vikṣepaparijñānam ucyate, nāpamaparijñānam |
GS41aryabhcu:6013: ataḥ svataḥ e[va e]tayoḥ apakramānayanam śīghroccāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6014: evam api apakramamaṇḍalasthitau etau vikṣepamaṇḍale pratartate iti eta[t upapa]nnam
GS41aryabhcu:6016: etat kutaḥ vikṣepaparijñānamātram eva etayoḥ? upāyāntareṇa vikṣiptam punar svataḥ eva apamaṇḍalāt pratiyakṣeṇa upadiṣṭam, candravikṣepapradarśitam eva arthaviśeṣam sambhāvayati |
GS41aryabhcu:6017: sarveṣām eva vikṣepaḥ apakramamaṇḍalāt uttareṇa dakṣiṇena ca |
GS41aryabhcu:6019: cakracaturbhāgāntare yathā uktāḥ [vikṣe]pabhāgāḥ vikṣepāpakramamaṇḍalayoḥ antare yathā avatiṣṭhante tathā pradarśyante |
GS41aryabhcu:6020: “apamaṇḍalasya candraḥ pātāt yāti” iti etat api gītikāsu upapadiṣṭa[pātānusāreṇa ava]dheyam
GS41aryabhcu:6021: śaśī vikṣepamaṇḍalasthitapātāt prabhṛti vikṣepamaṇḍale pravartate, iti etat anuktam na gamyate
GS41aryabhcu:6023: api budhaśukrau” iti e[tat api] vaktavyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6026: grahāṇām udayāstamayaparijñānāya ādityagrahāntarabhāgān āha ã candraḥ aṃśaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ avikṣiptaḥ arkāntarasthitaḥ dṛśyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6027: navabhiḥ bhṛguḥ bhṛgoḥ taiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ yathā ślakṣṇāḥ ||4||
GS41aryabhcu:6030: tena “sāmānyacodanāḥ ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhante” iti aṃśaviśeṣeṣu avasthāpyante |
GS41aryabhcu:6036: tataḥ prāṇānām saptaśatasya viṃśatyadhikasya [720] dvādaśa bhāgāḥ, ghaṭikādvayam iti arthaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6038: athavā sūryāt paścāt prāk vā kālena antaritaḥ grahaḥ yasmāt
GS41aryabhcu:6043: arkāt antaram arkāntaram, tasmin arkāṃtare dvādaśakālāṃśa-pramāṇena avikṣiptaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6045: yadā punar asau vikṣiptaḥ ghaṭikādvayāt ūnādhike kāle dṛśyate, yasmāt arkāt uttareṇa vikṣiptaḥ candraḥ golasya uttaronnatatvāt ūne api
GS41aryabhcu:6046: ghaṭikādvaye kāle dṛśyate, dakṣiṇavikṣiptaḥ ca unnatatvāt golasya dakṣiṇena ghaṭikādvayādhikakāle dṛśyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6050: tathā eva kālabhāgaiḥ navabhiḥ arkāntarasthitaḥ avikṣiptaḥ bhṛguḥ dṛśyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6051: navabhiḥ kālabhāgaiḥ vikṣiptasya vikṣepakarma candravat eva |
GS41aryabhcu:6054: navabhiḥ bhṛguḥ taiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ iti etāvatā siddhe punar bhṛgugrahaṇam kurvan ācāryaḥ jñāpayati ã bhṛgoḥ iyam kāṣṭhabhāgāḥ nava iti, tebhyaḥ eva navabhyaḥ gurvādyantarabhāgapratipattiḥ anyathā hi ayam bhṛguḥ ataḥ nyūneṣu api triṣu caturṣu vā antaritaḥ vakrakāle udayāstamayau kurvan lakṣyate iti etat punar bhṛgugrahaṇam |
GS41aryabhcu:6055: taiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ iti vīpsāgrahaṇam ca bhāgadvayāntaragrahaṇārtham |
GS41aryabhcu:6056: anyathā hi sarveṣām eva nava eva bhāgāḥ syuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6058: ete grahāḥ ślakṣṇāḥ parihīyamānaśarīrāḥ pratipāditāḥ tathā dvyadhikaiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ arkāntarasthitāḥ avikṣiptāḥ santaḥ dṛśyante
GS41aryabhcu:6063: bhṛgoḥ bhāgaiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ bṛhaspatiḥ dṛśyate ṣaḍbhāgonaghaṭikādvayena, taiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ bṛhaspateḥ trayodaśabhiḥ ṣaḍbhāgottaraghaṭikādvayena budhaḥ, budhabhāgaiḥ dvyadhikaiḥ śanaiścaraḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6065: ṣaḍbhāgonaghaṭikātrayeṇa, etāvadbhiḥ kālabhāgaiḥ antaritāḥ dṛśyante iti uktam |
GS41aryabhcu:6066: adarśanam punar eṣām katham avagamyate? kecit tāvat āhuḥ ã etāvadbhiḥ eva bhāgaiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6069: katham etāvadbhiḥ eva bāgaiḥ dṛśyaḥ adṛśyaḥ ca? yadā arkāt niṣkrāmati grahaḥ tadā tāvadbhiḥ eva dṛśyate, yadā sa eva arkam praviśati tadā [tāvadbhi]ḥ eva antaritaḥ na dṛśyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6070: etat ca [na] ã yāvatā niṣkrāmataḥ praviśataḥ vā grahasya tulyam idam antaram, tena dṛśyena vā graheṇa bhavitavyam adṛśyena vā |
GS41aryabhcu:6071: sa tāvat iṣṭakālāṃśakaiḥ dṛśyaḥ eva upalabhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6075: eva bhāgaiḥ arkāntarasthitaḥ niṣkrāmat praviśat vā dṛśyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6076: ūnaiḥ ataḥ dṛśyate iti arthāt avagamyate, adhikaiḥ punar nitarām dṛśyate iti etat
GS41aryabhcu:6079: tat yathā ã yadi triṃśatā svadeśarāśyudayakālaḥ labhyate tadā idānīm niṣpannārkagrahāntarabhāgaiḥ kaḥ iti, kālaḥ labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6080: sa yadi abhīṣṭagrahāntarakālena tulyaḥ tadā asau grahaḥ dṛśyate, ūne astam gataḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6082: athavā svadeśarāśyudayena triṃśatā ca trairāśikam kṛtvā sarvarāśiṣu antarabhāgānayanam ã yadi rāśyudayakālena triṃśadbhāgāḥ labhyante tadā iṣṭagrahāntarābhihitakālena kiyantaḥ iti sarvarāśiṣu antarabhāgāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6084: taiḥ vā sakṛtsiddhaiḥ eva antarabhāgaiḥ iṣṭadeśe grahasya darśanam vaktavyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6086: aparodayāstamayayoḥ tatsaptamarāśyudayakālena etat parikalpanam, yasmāt udayarāśivaśāt eva astam rāśayaḥ gacchanti || 4 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6088: dharitrīgrahanakṣatratārāṇām prakāśahetupradarśanāya āha ã bhūgrahabhānām golārdhāni svacchāyayā vivarṇāni |
GS41aryabhcu:6093: bhūḥ ca grahāḥ ca bhāni ca bhūgrahabhāni, teṣām bhūgrahabhānām |
GS41aryabhcu:6096: ataḥ teṣām golānām ardhāni golākāraśarīrārdhāni iti yāvat |
GS41aryabhcu:6097: katham ete grahādayaḥ golākāraśarīrāṇi pratipadyante? bhuvam tāvat anye
GS41aryabhcu:6100: yathā golākārā bhūḥ pratipadyate tathā uttarataḥ vakṣyāmi |
GS41aryabhcu:6101: katham punar atra amī grahāḥ golākārāḥ pratipadyante? atha ca darpaṇavṛttākārau sūryācandramasau
GS41aryabhcu:6103: anyat ca ã sthityardhādiparilekhanaprakriyā ca golākāraśarīreṣu na ghaṭate |
GS41aryabhcu:6105: ete grahādayaḥ golaśarīrāḥ api santaḥ dūradeśavartitvāt darpaṇavṛttākārāḥ upalakṣyante |
GS41aryabhcu:6106: yā sthityardhādiparilekhanaprakriyā sā dṛgviṣayā, tasyāḥ dṛgviṣayatvāt yathādarśanagatāni eva bimbasaṃsthānāni aṅgīkṛtya ācāryeṇa uktam |
GS41aryabhcu:6107: athavā golākāreṣu api sthityardhādyupapattiḥ śakyate vaktum |
GS41aryabhcu:6108: yasmāt vikṣepādayaḥ bimbamadhyāt pravṛttāḥ tāvat jñātvā golakānām bimbārdham darpaṇavṛttākāraḥ iva yathā bhraman niṣpāditaḥ samudgataḥ tasyāḥ udaram darpaṇavṛttākāram eva upalakṣyate, tasmāt golākārāt api sthityardhādyupapattisiddhiḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:6110: anyathā hi candramasaḥ sitakṣayavṛddhī darpaṇavṛttākāre bimbe na saṃvadete |
GS41aryabhcu:6112: uktam ca ã sūryaḥ agnimayaḥ golaḥ candraḥ ambumayaḥ svabhāvataḥ svacchaḥ | iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6115: svā cchāyā svacchāyā, tayā svacchāyayā ardhāni
GS41aryabhcu:6116: eṣām [vivarṇāni aprakāśātmakāni kṛṣṇāni iti arthaḥ, na tataḥ anyatkārāṇa]m
GS41aryabhcu:6118: yathā ghaṭasya ātapasthasya ekam pārśvam svacchāyayā eva vivarṇam, evam atra api |
GS41aryabhcu:6121: teṣām golānām ardhāni, yāvanti avaśiṣṭāni svacchāyāvaivarṇyāni vyatiriktāni |
GS41aryabhcu:6128: yadi ardhāni grahāṇām sūryābhimukhāni cakāsanti tadā kim iti candramasaḥ ardhabimbam sarvadā na cakāsti? cakāsti eva |
GS41aryabhcu:6130: ucyate ã amāvāsyāyām candramasaḥ upari ādityaḥ tadā tasya candramasaḥ upari yat bimbārdham tat aśeṣam avabhāsayati |
GS41aryabhcu:6131: candrasya amāvāsyopalakṣitoparibimbakendrāt yathā yathā paścāt ādityaḥ avalambate tathā tathā bimbakendram api aparataḥ avalambate |
GS41aryabhcu:6132: tat kendravaśāt candramasaḥ bimbārdham yāvat eva amāvāsyopalakṣitam bimbaparidhyardhāvadheḥ avalambate tāvat candramasaḥ bimbam asmābhiḥ upalakṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6134: sūryābhimukham api savitṛkarā[t chāditam api na dṛśyate] |
GS41aryabhcu:6135: tasmāt yāvat yāvat candramasaḥ bimbam savitṛbimbāt ślakṣṇam avalambate tāvān svacchaḥ candramasaḥ śuklaḥ upalakṣyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6139: sammūrcchitāḥ naiśam dhvāntam avadhvāṃsayanti, yathā darpaṇe jale vā divasakarāḥ sammūrcchitāḥ santaḥ gṛhāntargatam tamaḥ kṣapayanti |
GS41aryabhcu:6141: anyat ca ã yaḥ yaḥ candrabimbapradeśāḥ savitṛmārge ṛjutvena vyavasthitaḥ sa eva śṛṅgonnatau upalabhyate, na itaraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6142: tathā ca tat jijñāsavaḥ karma kurvanti |
GS41aryabhcu:6143: tat yathā ã śuklapratipadādiṣu sūryārdhāstamayakālikau sūryācandramasau kṛtvā sūryonacandrotkramajyā gṛhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6144: sā yasmāt pratidivasam upacīyamānā, candramasaḥ śuklam upacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6146: tena tayā utkramajyayā trairāśikam ã yadi vyāsārdhatulyayā utkramajyayā sphuṭacandrabimbārdham upalabhyate, tadā anayā utkramajyayā kiyat iti, tat kālasitamānam labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6147: śuklāṣṭamyāḥ parataḥ yā sitavṛddhiḥ sā kramajyāvaśāt upacīyamānā lakṣyate iti kramajyā gṛhyate
GS41aryabhcu:6148: tāḥ kramajyāḥ pūrvopacitavyāsārdhajyāsu prakṣipya trairāśikam kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6149: athavā ã tābhiḥ eva kramajyābhiḥ candrabimbārdhena trairāśikam kṛtvā yat labdham candrabimbārdhe prakṣiptam sitamānam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6150: śuklapratipadādiṣu yathā candramasaḥ sitamānam vardhate tathā kṛṣṇapratipatprabhṛtibhyaḥ sitamānam utkrameṇa apacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6151: tena sūryācandramasoḥ viśeṣāt rāśiṣaṭkam apanīya tathā eva karma kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6153: darśanakālaḥ hi yāvantam kālam candraḥ dṛśyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6154: yavatā kālena udeti tat ānayanopāyaḥ ã śuklapakṣe tāvat udayarāśivaśāt eva jyotiścakragatiḥ iti ataḥ yāvantaḥ sūryāt candrarāśibhāgāḥ tāvantaḥ eva udayāvadheḥ svadeśarāśyudayaprāṇāḥ parigṛhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:6155: tat yathā ã āstamayike savitari ṣaḍrāśayaḥ parikṣipyante sa sūryāt saptamaḥ rāśiḥ bhavati
GS41aryabhcu:6156: tathā ca candramasi ṣaḍrāśayaḥ parikṣipya sūryagatarāśibhāgān triṃśatā viśodhayet śeṣam sūryasya
GS41aryabhcu:6160: sūryāgatarāśibhāgān ca ṣaḍrāśiyutasūrye prakṣipya tāvat svadeśarāśyudayaprāṇāḥ saṃkalanīyāḥ yāvat ṣaḍrāśiyutacandragatāḥ bhāgāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6161: tataḥ ṣaḍrāśiyutacandragatāḥ bhāgāḥ tat rāśyudayaprāṇaiḥ saṅguṇya triṃśatā vibhajet, labdham prāṇāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6162: tān pūrvasaṅkalitaprāṇān ca sarvān ekatra nyastaprāṇeṣu prakṣipya ṣaḍbhiḥ bhāgaḥ, labdham vighaṭikāḥ, ṣaṣṭyā ghaṭikāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6164: tāvatā kālena sūryācandramasoḥ gativiśeṣaḥ asti iti aviśeṣakarma pravartate |
GS41aryabhcu:6165: tat yathā ã yadi ṣaṣṭyā ghaṭikābhiḥ sūryabhuktiḥ candrabhuktiḥ vā labhyate tataḥ anena darśanakālena te kiyatyau tayoḥ bhuktī iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6166: sūryabhuktilabdham ṣaḍrāśiyuktasūrye prakṣipet, candrabhuktilabdham api ṣaḍrāśiyutacandramasi
GS41aryabhcu:6167: prakṣipya tāvat idam kuryāt yāvat aviśeṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6168: tatra yaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ kālaḥ sa darśanakālaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6170: yaḥ ca ṣaḍrāśiyuktaḥ candraḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ tasmāt cakrārdham apanayet tāvān candraḥ darśanakālaparisamāptau astam eti |
GS41aryabhcu:6171: atha kaścit yadi kiyatā kālena a[na]stamite savitari candrodayaḥ bhaviṣyati iti etat jijñāsuḥ, idam karma kuryāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6172: tat yathā ã avikṛtāstamayakālādityabhāgebhyaḥ prabhṛti tāvat prāṇāḥ saṃkalanīyāḥ yāvat avikṛtaśītāṃśoḥ gatabhāgaprāṇāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6178: tat yathā ã āsām nāḍīnām yaḥ yaḥ bhogaḥ tena adhikau sūryācandramasau iti ataḥ tābhyām apanīya apanīya aviśeṣaḥ kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6179: aviśeṣitaḥ darśanakālaḥ tāvatā kālena divasaśeṣaḥ eva candrodayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6180: yaḥ asau aviśiṣṭaḥ candraḥ tāvān tatra divasaśeṣodayakāle candraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6181: athavā prathamānītadivasaśeṣacandrodayakālena candramasaḥ bhuktim saṅguṇayya ṣaṣṭyā vibhajet
GS41aryabhcu:6185: tat udayalagnam tena divasaśeṣoditacandreṇa tulyam yadā, tadā divasaśeṣam candrodayakālaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6186: atha yadi tasmāt lagnāt ūnaḥ candraḥ tadā prathamataram uditaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6188: teṣām ca prāṇānām yāvatī candrabhuktiḥ trairāśikena labhyate tāvatī prathamadivasaśeṣoditakālacandrāt viśodhyate tāvān candraḥ
