GS41aryabhcu:6190: candraḥ ca yadā adhikaḥ tadā pūrvavat tadantaraprāṇān divasaśeṣakāle prakṣipet tāvatām prāṇānām candrabhogam candramasi prakṣipet, tāvat karma yāvat aviśeṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6191: athavā prathamāstamayikacandrāt eva antarotpannadivasaśeṣakālabhogaḥ candramasaḥ viśodhya tat kālalagnakrameṇa aviśeṣakarma kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6192: atha yadi udayalagnāt candraḥ adhikaḥ tadā [kiyan]nāḍyā abhyudeti candraḥ iti tadantaraprāṇān prathamānītadivasaśeṣe prakṣipet |
GS41aryabhcu:6193: tat bhuktim candramasi prakṣipet tāvat yāvat aviśeṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6194: evam udayalagnam candraḥ ca kṛtaḥ bhavati, divasaśeṣacandrodayakālaḥ ca |
GS41aryabhcu:6196: paurṇamāsyām punar tāvat eva antaraghaṭikāḥ yadi dinapramāṇaghaṭikābhyaḥ ūnāḥ bhaveyuḥ tadā anastamite āditye candrodayaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6198: ubhayatra api antarakālapramāṇena aviśeṣakarma anantarakarmavat eva |
GS41aryabhcu:6200: śeṣa[ghaṭikā]bhiḥ bhukiḥ trairāśikena sūryācandramasau sañcārya punar tayoḥ antaraghaṭikābhyaḥ dinapramāṇaghaṭikāḥ viśodhayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6201: śeṣaghaṭikābhiḥ candrādityau tadantarālaghaṭikāḥ iti ādyaviśeṣāntam karma kriyate, tatra aviśiṣṭena kālena [sūryāstamayāt paścāt candrodayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6202: evam eva aviśiṣṭena kālena] sūryodayāt prāk candrodayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6203: atha anastamite savitari kiyatā kālena candraḥ astam yāsyati iti etat jijñāsuḥ idam karma kuryāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6204: tat yathā ã sūryodayakālotpannam candramasam kṛtvā tatra rāśiṣaṭkam prakṣipet |
GS41aryabhcu:6206: atha audayikāt ādityāt ṣaḍrāśiyuktaniśākarāvadheḥ svadeśarāśyudayavidhānena yāvatyaḥ ghaṭikāḥ tāḥ aviśeṣyante |
GS41aryabhcu:6208: tāsām trairāśikena yāvat candramasaḥ bhuktiḥ tām candramasi prakṣipet iti ataḥ punar api tasmāt ādityāt ṣaḍrāśiyuktacandrāvadheḥ pūrvavat ghaṭikāḥ tāvat yāvat aviśeṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6209: tatra yāḥ aviśeṣitāḥ ghaṭikāḥ tāvatībhiḥ divase vyatītābhiḥ candraḥ astam eti |
GS41aryabhcu:6211: atra yaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ candraḥ sa tasmin kāle tāvān, yaḥ ca ṣaḍrāśiyuktaḥ candraḥ sa tasmin kāle udayalagnam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6213: atha kaścit kiyatā kālena śuklāṣṭamyā parataḥ candraḥ gaganamadhyam avagāhate, kiyān vā tatra candraḥ iti jijñāsuḥ, idam karma kuryāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6214: atha tatkālāt parataḥ svadhiyā āsannau madhyalagnaniśākarau abhyūhya, tatra yadi madhyalagnaniśākarau tulyau syātām tadā tāvān candraḥ tāvatā eva kālena gaganamadhyam ārokṣyati |
GS41aryabhcu:6215: atha yadi adhikaḥ candraḥ tadā na adya api prāpnoti gaganamadhyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6216: tatra madhyalagnacandrāntarakālam svadhiyā abhyūhitakāle prakṣipya madhyalagnacandrau kuryāt yāvat tulyau iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6217: atha madhyalagnāt ūnaḥ candraḥ tadā tadantarālakālam svadhiyā abhyūhita[kālāt viśodhya]
GS41aryabhcu:6218: madhyalagnacandrau tāvat kuryāt yāvat madhyalagnacandrau tulyau syātām |
GS41aryabhcu:6223: sa ca antarālataḥ sūryāgrayā saha ekadikkam viśeṣyate, yataḥ arkāt eva uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā candraḥ sādhyate, na viṣuvataḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6226: evam pariniṣṭhitapramāṇam bhujā sūryāt yāmya uttarāyatā prasāryate |
GS41aryabhcu:6228: sa yadi sūryāt uttareṇa candraḥ tadā bhujottarāgrataḥ pūrvāparāyatā prasāryate |
GS41aryabhcu:6229: yadā dakṣiṇena candraḥ sūryāt tadā tasyāḥ bhujāyāḥ dakṣiṇāgrataḥ pūrvāparāyatā
GS41aryabhcu:6230: | evam bhujakoṭī yathāgatapramāṇena vinyasya bhujākoṭimastakāvagāhī karṇaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6231: dūranirgatāgraḥ prasārya koṭyagrakarṇasampāte kendram viracya candrabimbam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:6232: tasya candrabimbaparidheḥ aparataḥ karṇānusāreṇa sitamānam nītvā bindum kuryāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6233: candrabimbakendrapūrvāpare karṇaḥ, tat matsyavidhānāt dakṣiṇottare sādhye |
GS41aryabhcu:6235: tataḥ tābhyām pūrvavihitabindunā ca tathā chedyakavidhānena tat bindutrayaśiraḥspṛgvṛttam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:6236: tasya vṛttasya candrabimbaparidheḥ ca yat antaram tat candramasaḥ śuklaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6239: | candrodayalagnāntaraprāṇotpannaḥ śaṅkuḥ, koṭiḥ aparābhimukhī tathā eva prasāryate |
GS41aryabhcu:6240: tatra yathāgatam sitamānam candrabimbapramāṇāt viśodhyam śeṣam asitam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6241: tatkarṇānusāreṇa candraparidhipūrvabhāgāt bimbāntare asitamānam nītvā bindum kuryāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6242: tena dakṣiṇottarabindubhyām ca pūrvavat bindutrayaśiraḥspṛgvṛttam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:6243: tasya candrabimbaparidheḥ ca yat antaram tat asitam |
GS41aryabhcu:6244: kṛṣṇapratipadādiṣu ca aparābhimukhaprasāritakoṭikarṇāgralikhitacandraparidhyaparabhāgāt karṇānusāreṇa asitam antaḥ pūrvavat vṛttam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:6245: iṣṭakāle tu yathā pratyāsannāstodayalagnajyām arkāgrām parikalpya tatkālacandraśaṅkvagram āpādya iṣṭalagnacandrāntaraprāṇotpannaśaṅkukoṭyā candraḥ parilekhanīyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6246: evam sarvatra kṣitijāt upari vyavasthitasya candrasya parilekhanaprakriyā
GS41aryabhcu:6249: tat yathā ã samyak prasiddhagṛhodare pūrvāpararekhātaḥ uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā parikalpitāṅgulapramāṇam arkāgrāsūtram pūrvavat prasārya bindum kuryāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6251: pūrvāpararekhāyāḥ eva dakṣiṇottarataḥ candrāgrataḥ śaṅkvagrayoḥ yogaviśeṣajyāṅgulatulyam sūtram yathā āgatadiśam prasārya bindum kuryāt
GS41aryabhcu:6256: tatra śaṅkvagrāyatadaṇḍaśirasi yathālikhitam tat chedyakasitaśṛṅgonnatim arkabindunyastadṛṣṭiḥ karṇānusāreṇa utkṣiptāvalambakāṅgulapramāṇamastakāsaktam śaśalakṣmāṇam paśyati |
GS41aryabhcu:6257: evam eva grahāḥ api gṛhodaravyavasthitaiḥ darśanīyāḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6259: kṣitijamaṇḍalākrāntārdhabimbasya candramasaḥ koṭeḥ abhāvāt na parilikhyate
GS41aryabhcu:6261: tat yathā ã yadi candrāgrā dakṣiṇena udayajyā uttareṇa tadā candramasaḥ uttaraśṛṅgam prāk pradṛśyate, yataḥ bhavṛttacandraḥ dakṣiṇena vyavasthitaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6262: bhavṛttacandrānusāreṇa ca sūryamarīcayaḥ candrabimbam karṇagatyā avagāhante |
GS41aryabhcu:6263: yadā punar candrāgrā uttareṇa udayajyā dakṣiṇena tadā candramasaḥ dakṣiṇaśṛṅgam prāk pradṛśyate
GS41aryabhcu:6266: dakṣiṇena tulyadikkayoḥ viśeṣaḥ, candrāgrā yadā atiricyate tadā candramasaḥ uttaraśṛṅgam prāk pradṛśyate, anyathā dakṣiṇam |
GS41aryabhcu:6267: uttareṇa yadā candrāgrā atiricyate tadā dakṣiṇaśṛṅgam prāk pradṛśyate, anyathā uttaram |
GS41aryabhcu:6268: yadā punar viśeṣeṇa na kiñcit antaram tadā yugapat ubhayaśṛṅgadarśanam |
GS41aryabhcu:6269: yadā ca udayajyā candrāgre na bhavataḥ tadā ca astamaye candramasaḥ astalagnajyayā candrāgrayā ca śṛṅgasya prāk paścāt vā astamayam parikalpanīyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6272: evam ca nirukte paṭhyate ã tasya ekau raśmiḥ candramasam prati dīpyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6277: iti api ca nigamaḥ bhavati iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6278: tasmāt etena eva liṅgena candramārgāt upari sūryamārgaḥ iti, anyathā anupapatyā |
GS41aryabhcu:6279: pariśiṣṭāḥ ca tārāgrahāḥ sūryamārgāt upari dūreṇa vyavasthitāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6280: tena teṣām ārātsthitāni golārdhāni sarvadā sakalāni eva cakāsate |
GS41aryabhcu:6281: ūrdhvamukhāḥ sūryamarīcayaḥ sadā ārādbhāgam prakāśayanti iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6282: budhaśukrayoḥ ca pratyāsannavartitvāt sarvataḥ bimbam avagāhante arkamarīcayaḥ pradīpapratyāsannagolavat tena tayoḥ api asakalabimbatābhāvaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6283: yadi evam astamite savitari katham ete grahādayaḥ cakāsate savitṛkarābhāvāt ?
GS41aryabhcu:6286: tena uparimukhānām sūryamarīcīnām na vyavadhānāya bhūḥ vartate |
GS41aryabhcu:6287: yathā ghaṭasya upari adhaḥ dūreṇa avasthitasya pradīpasya ghaṭaḥ na vyavadhānakāraṇam |
GS41aryabhcu:6288: kṛṣṇapakṣapratipadādiṣu candramasaḥ bimbapūrvabhāgaḥ pratyāsannaḥ savituḥ iti tena tat śuklam upalabhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6289: ratnānām ca ādityakarāḥ eva dīptikāraṇatvam prapadyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6290: tena tāni api rātrau na prakāśātmakāni |
GS41aryabhcu:6291: uktam ca ratnaparīkṣāyām ã bhānoḥ ca bhāsām anuvedhayogam āsādya raśmiprakareṇa dūram |
GS41aryabhcu:6292: pārśvāṇi sarvāṇi anurañjayanti guṇaiḥ upetāḥ sphaṭik[ādayaḥ hi] ||
GS41aryabhcu:6293: [yat] upākhyānādiṣu ratnāni eva dhvāntam dhvaṃsayanti iti śrūyate tat upākhyāna[m arthavādamātra]m eva |
GS41aryabhcu:6294: anye punar anyathā manyante ã svacchāyayā arkasāmīpyāt vikalendusamīkṣaṇam | iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6296: svacchāyayā candraḥ śuklaḥ upalabhyate, tasya śuklasya candramasaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6298: kutaḥ etat? yadi svabhāvataḥ śuklasya candramasaḥ sūryasannikarṣāt vaivarṇyam syāt tadā
GS41aryabhcu:6299: śuklapratipadādiṣu candrasya aparabhāgaḥ vivarṇaḥ syāt sūryasannikarṣāt,
GS41aryabhcu:6302: tasmāt mithyājñānam eva etat yat saugataiḥ ucyate || 5 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6304: bhādikakṣyābhūsaṃsthānapradarśanāya āha ã vṛttabhapañjaramadhye kakṣyāpariveṣṭitaḥ khamadhyagataḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6309: [bhāni] samantataḥ viyati pañjarasthāni iva lakṣyante tataḥ anena darśanena etat uktam |
GS41aryabhcu:6310: vṛttaḥ ca asau bhapañjaraḥ ca vṛttabhapañjaraḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6314: khamadhyagataḥ, kham ākāśam, tasya madhyam khamadhyam, khamadhyaṃgataḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6316: katham ākāśamadhye nirālambanā bhūḥ avatiṣṭhate? [ucyate ã svabhāva]prādhānyāt; yathā salilāgnivāyavaḥ kledadahanapreraṇātmakāḥ, na teṣām anyaḥ asti kaścit kledadahanapreraṇaprayojakaḥ, evam iyam api bhūḥ dhāraṇātmikā, na ca dhāryamāṇātmikā |
GS41aryabhcu:6317: athavā patantī bhūḥ, “patatu adhaḥ” iti āha |
GS41aryabhcu:6319: yathā asmadīyānām pṛthivī adhaḥ, evam pṛthivyāḥ kim
GS41aryabhcu:6322: yathā yatra vivasvān udeti sā prācī,
GS41aryabhcu:6323: yatra astam eti sā parā, yasyām adṛśyaḥ gacchati sā uttarā, śeṣā dakṣiṇā |
GS41aryabhcu:6325: evam upari adhaḥ ca pṛthivī apekṣayā bhavataḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6326: tena tasyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ na kiñcit upari, na adhaḥ, tasmāt patanābhāvaḥ bhuvaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6327: evam ca pṛthivyāḥ ardham pariveṣṭyā avasthitaḥ samudraḥ na patiti |
GS41aryabhcu:6328: patantyām ca bhuvi loṣṭaśilīmukhādayaḥ viyati kṣiptā na bhuvam āsādayeyuḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6329: bhūḥ mandam patati iti cet, sādhyate ca etat māyāvidbhiḥ ca, viyati khātakīlakaḥ anāśrayaḥ bhavet |
GS41aryabhcu:6330: atha anye manyante ã śeṣeṇa anyena [vā] bhūḥ dhriyate iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6332: śeṣādīnām api avaśyam ādhāraviśeṣaḥ kaścit kalpanīyaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6333: [taya anyaḥ ā]dhāraḥ syā[t tasya api anyaḥ] iti anavasthā |
GS41aryabhcu:6334: atha te svaśaktyā eva avatiṣṭhante iti cet, bhuvaḥ eva kasmāt sā śaktiḥ na
GS41aryabhcu:6336: tasmāt jagataḥ dharmādharmāpekṣayā sarvabhūtadhātrī bhūḥ niścalā ākāśe tiṣṭhati |
GS41aryabhcu:6340: mṛdādinā kāṣṭhādinā vā ayaḥśalākāyām madhye samavṛttavat avagantavyaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6343: bhūgolapradarśanāya āha ã yadvat kadambapuṣpagranthiḥ pracitaḥ samantataḥ kusumaiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6344: tadvat hi sarvasattvaiḥ jalajaiḥ sthalajaiḥ ca bhūgolaḥ || 7 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6345: yadvat kadambapuṣpagranthiḥ [samantāt kesaraiḥ] pracitaḥ, vyāptaḥ iti arthaḥ, tathā ayam bhūgolaḥ samantāt jalajaiḥ sthalajaiḥ ca prāṇibhiḥ āvṛttaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6346: atha ye bhuvi vyavasthitāḥ prāṇinaḥ parvatādayaḥ teṣām katham avasthānam tat ucyate ã yatra yatra prāṇinaḥ gacchanti tatra tatra teṣām bhūḥ eva adhaḥ, viyat upari pratibhāti yathā asmākam || 7 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6348: bhūvṛddhyapacayajñānāya āha ã brahmadivasena bhūmerupariṣṭāt yojanam bhavati vṛddhiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6351: ataḥ eva gṛhapādapataḍāgādikhāteṣu ghaṭapiṭakādi upari upari avayavāḥ labhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:6354: mṛdā upacitā mṛdupacitā, tasyāḥ mṛdupacitāyāḥ hāniḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6355: kena punar kāraṇena yat upacitam buvaḥ tat parikṣīyate? brahmadivasāvasāne kila saṃvartakābhidhānaiḥ jaladharaiḥ vicchinnadhārābhimuktena payasā yat upacitam bhuvaḥ tat parikṣīyate || 8 ||

GS41aryabhcu:6377: paśyanti; adhovyavasthitām bhuvam niścalām bhramantīm iva paśyanti |
GS41aryabhcu:6378: pratyakṣe api nakṣatrāṇi prāguditāni aparām diśam āsādayanti || 9 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6380: bhramaṇakāraṇam āha ã udayāstamayanimittam nityam pravaheṇa vāyunā kṣiptaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6383: tayoḥ ] udayāstamayayoḥ nimittam nityam pravaheṇa pravahasaṃjñitena vāyunā kṣiptaḥ bhapañjaraḥ, bhapañjaraḥ api nityagatiḥ eva, laṅkāyām samapaścimaḥ yaḥ dikpradeśaḥ sa laṅkāsamapaścimaḥ, tam gacchati iti laṅkāsamapaścimagaḥ, saha grahaiḥ vartate iti sagrahaḥ, bhramati kṣaṇam api na avatiṣṭhate |
GS41aryabhcu:6384: yadi api grahāḥ prāṅmukham vrajanti tathā api bhapañjarāpekṣayā aparadiksaṅkramaṇam kurvanti, mahatā bhapañjaragatyā nīyamānāḥ lakṣyante,
GS41aryabhcu:6387: merupramāṇam āha ã meruḥ yojanamātraḥ prabhākaraḥ himavatā parikṣiptaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6389: yojanam mātrā yasya sa yojanamātraḥ, pramāṇe mātranpratyayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6393: [nandanavanasya madhye], nandanam vanam [devānām apsarogaṇaparivṛtānām] krīḍāsthānam, tasya madhye |
GS41aryabhcu:6399: atha paurāṇikaiḥ lakṣayojanapramāṇaḥ meruḥ paṭhyate tat yuktirahitam |
GS41aryabhcu:6400: [laṅkātaḥ yāvat merumadhyam tāvat yojanasahasram api na asti, kutaḥ tat ekadeśe bhaviṣyati
GS41aryabhcu:6401: atha bhūḥ eva mahāpramāṇā parikalpyate, tat ayuktam |] yat sapañcāśatsahasram yojanānām bhūvyāsāmanam akṣonnatiprasādhitam tat
GS41aryabhcu:6404: kim ca purāṇeṣu puṣkaradvīpasya uparigataḥ vivasvān madhyāhnam karoti iti paṭhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6408: tatra yadi madhyāhnaḥ vivasvataḥ syāt asmākam uttaragolabhūtatvāt śaṅkoḥ chāyānāśaḥ [na] syāt
GS41aryabhcu:6410: tasmāt viṣuvati laṅkāmadhye savitā gacchati iti siddham |
GS41aryabhcu:6412: laṅkāmadhye na savitā gacchati iti taiḥ eva uktam |
GS41aryabhcu:6414: yadi pataṅgavat utplutya gacchati tataḥ yujyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6418: tatra mahāpramāṇasya meroḥ avasthānam eva na asti |
GS41aryabhcu:6419: [yadi kathañcit mahāpramāṇaḥ eva meruḥ avatiṣṭhate tadā sa kim asmābhiḥ na dṛśyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6420: ] dūratvāt meruḥ asmābhiḥ na dṛśyate, athavā niṣprabhatvāt tat
GS41aryabhcu:6422: kim ca yadi mahāpramāṇaḥ meruḥ syāt meruśikharāntaritatvāt bhāvāt uttareṇa tārakāḥ na dṛśyeran
GS41aryabhcu:6423: tasmāt tasya kanakagireḥ upariśikharapradeśe eva sarvaratnamayaḥ meruśabdena ucyate ||
GS41aryabhcu:6425: kva bhūpradeśe meruḥ, kva vā baḍavāmukham iti āha ã
GS41aryabhcu:6426: svaḥ merū sthalamadhye narakaḥ baḍavāmukham ca jalamadhye |
GS41aryabhcu:6430: amaramarāḥ amarāḥ devāḥ, marāḥ narakasthāḥ, te parasparam adhaḥsthāḥ manyante |
GS41aryabhcu:6431: yataḥ sarveṣām bhūḥ adhaḥ, ataḥ anyonyam adhaḥsthitāḥ manyante |
GS41aryabhcu:6432: yatra uttareṇa ayaḥśalākā bhuvam bhitvā nirgatā tatra pradeśe svargaḥ meruḥ, yatra dakṣiṇena nirgatā tatra narakaḥ baḍavāmukham ca || 12 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6434: prakṛṣṭadeśāntaravyavasthitān deśān āha ã udayaḥ yaḥ laṅkāyām saḥ astamayaḥ savituḥ eva siddhapure
GS41aryabhcu:6436: laṅkānivāsinām yaḥ udayaḥ sa eva siddhapuranivāsinām astamayaḥ, [yataḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6438: madhyāhnaḥ yamakoṭyām, yaḥ eva laṅkāpuranivāsinām udayaḥ sa eva yamakoṭinivāsinām madhyāhnaḥ, yataḥ laṅkāpradeśāt pūrvasyām bhūparidhicaturbhāge yamakoṭiḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6439: yaḥ laṅkānivāsinām udayaḥ sa romakanivāsinām ardharātraḥ, yataḥ laṅkātaḥ aparabhāge bhūparidhicaturbhāge romakam |
GS41aryabhcu:6441: sthalajalasandhivartinaḥ deśāḥ parasparam ahorātracaturbhāgakāladeśāntarapramāṇāḥ pradarśayitavyāḥ [ samarekhāsthanagaryau ]

GS41aryabhcu:6455: pūrvabhāgavyavasthitāḥ prathamataram eva ravim paśyanti, ataḥ deśāntaraphalam apanīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6458: svadeśākṣasamarekhākṣavivarabhāgaiḥ trairāśikam ã yadi cakrāṃśakaiḥ bhūparidhiyojanāni labhyante
GS41aryabhcu:6459: tadā akṣāṃśāvivarabhāgaiḥ kim iti, samadakṣiṇottararekhāntarālayojanāni bhavanti koṭyātmakāni
GS41aryabhcu:6463: tataḥ yadi vyāsārdhatulyāvalaṃbake[na bhūparidhiḥ tadā iṣṭāvalaṃbakena kā iti,
GS41aryabhcu:6466: deśāntarayojanaiḥ kā bhuktiḥ iti deśāntarphalam labhyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6469: bhagoladṛśyādṛśyajñāpanāya āha ã bhūvyāsārdhena ūnam dṛśyam deśāt samāt bhagolārdham |
GS41aryabhcu:6471: bhuvaḥ vyāsaḥ bhūvyāsaḥ tasya ardham bhūvyāsārdham, 525 |
GS41aryabhcu:6476: ardham bhūmicchannam na dṛśyate bhūvyāsārdhena adhikam adṛśyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6477: etat jijñāsuḥ bhūgolapṛṣṭhāvagāhi sūtram prasārya pūrvakṣitije aparakṣitije [ca] badhnīyāt
GS41aryabhcu:6479: tatra [pūrva]pradeśe jyotīṃṣi ardhoditāni paśyati, paścāt ardhāstamitāni [paścati] |
GS41aryabhcu:6481: yat etat adṛśyam golārdham golasūtrāntarālam tat bhūvyāsārdhādhikam |
GS41aryabhcu:6483: yaḥ punar draṣṭā tuṃgaśailamastake bhavati tat śailapramāṇādhikam tasya adṛśyam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6484: vidyādharādayaḥ viyati dūre sthitāḥ prabhūtam jyotiścakram paśyanti, [yasmāt] upari dūrasthitasya nirvirodhaprasāraṇā dṛṣṭiḥ bhavati |

GS41aryabhcu:6487: tadartham] trairāśikam ã yadi ravikakṣyāyām ṣaṣṭiḥ nāḍyaḥ labhyante tadā bhūvyāsārdhayojanaiḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6489: labdhena dviguṇena sarvadā hīnaḥ divasaḥ adhikā rātriḥ || 15 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6491: merubaḍavāmukhanivāsinām darśanārtham āha ã devāḥ paśyanti bhagolārdham udaṅ merusaṃsthitāḥ savyam |

GS41aryabhcu:6503: | [na tathā merubaḍavāmukhasthānām api, paritaḥ sarvatra raveḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6506: kaścit puruṣaḥ uttareṇa gataḥ deśāntaram eti tathātve dhruvam upari ārohitam paśyati,
GS41aryabhcu:6507: krameṇa merum prāptasya upari dhruvaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6509: etat uttarāyaḥśalākāgrasvastikam upari nidhāya dakṣiṇāyaḥśalākāgrasvastikam ca adhomukham nidhāya darśayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6510: tathā laṅkāsthasya yaḥ viṣuvat mārgapradeśaḥ pūrvāparaḥ pratibhāsate sa merusthānām kṣitijāsaktaḥ evam baḍavāmukhasthānām api cakravat bhāskaraḥ pratibhāsate || 16 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6512: merubaḍavāmukhasthāḥ kiyantam kālam ravim paśyanti iti āha ã ravivarṣārdham devāḥ paśyanti uditam ravim tathā pretāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6513: śaśimāsārdham pitaraḥ śaśigāḥ, kudinārdham iha manujāḥ || 17 ||

GS41aryabhcu:6515: kṣitijāsaktam krameṇa caturviṃśatikrāntibhāgān yāvat parityaktakṣitijam paśyanti |

GS41aryabhcu:6517: śaśimāsārdham pitaraḥ śaśigāḥ, śaśinam gacchanti iti śaśigāḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6518: candralokanivāsinaḥ pitaraḥ śaśinaḥ māsārdham pañcadaśatithayaḥ etāvantam kālam paśyanti |
GS41aryabhcu:6521: tataḥ yathā yathā savitā pratipadādiṣu parataḥ avalambate tathā tathā pitṝṇām madhyāhnottarabhāgaḥ, rāśitrayāntaritaḥ astam eti,
GS41aryabhcu:6528: sarvam yathāvat sthitam gole pradarśayet iti || 17 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6530: khagole kṣitijamaṇḍalapradarśanāya āha ã pūrvāparam adhaūrdhvam maṇḍalam atha dakṣiṇottaram ca eva |
GS41aryabhcu:6535: dakṣiṇottarāvagāhi yāmya uttaramaṇḍalam upari adhaḥ ca janitasvastikam |
GS41aryabhcu:6536: kṣitijam samapārśvastham tathā anyat maṇḍalam tāvat eva |
GS41aryabhcu:6537: samapārśvāvagāhi parikaravat dikcatuṣṭayajanitasvastikam kṣitija iti ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6543: unmaṇḍalapradarśanāya āha ã pūrvāparadiglagnam kṣitijāt akṣāgrayoḥ ca lagnam yat |
GS41aryabhcu:6544: unmaṇḍalam bhavet tat kṣayavṛddhī yatra divasaniśoḥ || 19 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6545: dakṣiṇottarakṣitijasvastikāt yāmya uttaramaṇḍale svadeśākṣabhāgatulye antare vedhe kṛtvā lohaśalākāgre praveśya golam nidadhyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6549: dakṣiṇottarakṣitijasvastikayoḥ upari adhaḥ svadeśākṣabhāgatulye antare lagnam kārayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6552: yatra maṇḍale divasasya rātreḥ ca kṣayavṛddhī lakṣyete |
GS41aryabhcu:6553: viṣuvati unmaṇḍalakṣitijayoḥ ekatvāt divasaniśoḥ kṣayavṛddhī na staḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6554: viṣuvataḥ uttareṇa unmaṇḍalam upari kṣitijam adhaḥ avatiṣṭhate |
GS41aryabhcu:6555: tasmāt uttaragole aprāpte eva unmaṇḍalam [savitā] caradalaghaṭikāpramāṇena udeti |
GS41aryabhcu:6562: tadartham trairāśikam ã yadi ṣaṣṭyā grahabhuktiḥ labhyate, tadā caradalaghaṭikābhiḥ kiyatī iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6565: evam uttaradiśi vyavasthitānām krameṇa divasaniśoḥ mahatyau kṣayavṛddhī bhavataḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6566: yatra deśe raviḥ mithunāntasthaḥ na astam eti, ṣaṣṭiḥ nāḍyaḥ divasaḥ, tatra triṃśadghaṭikāḥ caram, pañcadaśaghaṭikāḥ carārdham |
GS41aryabhcu:6568: tayā viparītakarmaṇā kṣitijyā ānīyate ã yadi vyāsārdhasya iyam [vyāsārdhatulyā]
GS41aryabhcu:6569: carajyā tadā mithunāntasvāhorātrārdhasya kā iti mithunāntasvāhorātrārdhatulyā kṣitijyā labhyate
GS41aryabhcu:6570: tasyāḥ kṣitijyāyāḥ mithunāntāpakramajyāyāḥ ca vargayuteḥ mūlam arkāgrā trijyātulyā |
GS41aryabhcu:6571: tena tatra deśe yāmya uttare kṣitijāt upari krameṇa [sama]maṇḍalam avagāhya khamadhyāt dakṣiṇena dvicatvāriṃśadbhāge [yāmya uttaram atikramya] tataḥ prathamodaye punar kṣitijam āpnoti ca eva |
GS41aryabhcu:6575: ã arkāgrayā iṣṭatulyayā kṣitijyā labhyate vyāsārdhena kim iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6576: guṇakabhājakayoḥ tulyatvāt naṣṭayoḥ kṣitijyāpramāṇā akṣajyā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6580: uttareṇa tasmāt iyam vyavasthā na asti iti || 19 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6582: prācyādivyavasthāpratipādanāya āha ã pūrvāparadigrekhā adhaḥ ca ūrdhvā dakṣiṇottarasthā ca
GS41aryabhcu:6583: etāsām sampātaḥ draṣṭā yasmin bhavet deśe || 20 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6584: pūrvāpararekhā, adhaḥ ca ūrdhvā ca yā rekhā, dakṣiṇottarasthā ca |
GS41aryabhcu:6586: etāsām rekhāṇām sampātaḥ ekatra yogaḥ, yasmin deśe draṣṭā tatra tatra tāsām sampātaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6588: yatra draṣṭā ravim udgacchan paśyati sā
GS41aryabhcu:6589: prācī, yatra [raviḥ] madhyāhnam karoti sā dakṣiṇā, yatra astam eti sā
GS41aryabhcu:6590: parā, yatra ardharātram karoti sā uttarā |
GS41aryabhcu:6592: laṅkānivāsinām yadā madhyāhne raviḥ bhavati romakanivāsinām udeti |
GS41aryabhcu:6595: yadā romake madhyāhnaḥ tadā siddhapuranivāsinām udayaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6599: bhūmau yāvattāvatpramāṇam vṛttam ālikhya pūrvāhṇe [aparāhṇe ca] chāyām lakṣayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6600: yatra pradeśe śaṅkucchāyā vṛttam praviśati sā paścimā |
GS41aryabhcu:6608: ūrdhvam adhastāt draṣṭuḥ jñeyam dṛṅmaṇḍalam grahābhimukham |
GS41aryabhcu:6611: yatra draṣṭā bhavati tatra asya madhyam, yatra grahaḥ tatra asya paridhiḥ, yāvān dṛggrahayoḥ antaram tāvatā viṣkambhārdhena dṛṅmaṇḍalam pradṛśyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6612: tat eva madhyāhnasthite grahe dṛkkṣepamaṇḍalam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6614: samamaṇḍalamadhyāt dakṣiṇena uttareṇa vā yatra grahābhimukham dṛṣṭeḥ kṣepaḥ tatra yaḥ mahāpramāṇakakṣyaḥ grahaḥ sa stokataram kṣipyate,
GS41aryabhcu:6617: asya ānayanopāyaḥ ã prāglagnam syāt trirāśyūnam |
GS41aryabhcu:6620: śeṣebhyaḥ yāvat laṅkodayaprāṇāḥ śudhyanti tāvat śodhyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6623: vibhajet, labdham bhāgādi pūrvaviśodhitaiḥ eva śodhayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6625: aparāhṇe adhikatvāt raveḥ yāvantaḥ laṅkodayāḥ viśudhyanti tāvantaḥ prakṣipya lagnam kriyate
GS41aryabhcu:6626: ācāryeṇa sthūlaprakṛtyā iṣṭaghaṭikābhiḥ pūrvalagnam lagnavidhinā kṛtvā trirāśyūnam kriyate, madhyalagnam bhavati iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6627: rāśayaḥ laṅkodayaiḥ madhyam avagāhante iti laṅkodayaiḥ yat madhyalagnam tat sūkṣmam iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6628: tasya apakramakāṣṭham svadeśākṣabhāgayutam samadiśoḥ bhinnadiśoḥ viśuddham khamadhyaravikakṣyāntarālam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6631: yataḥ vimaṇḍale candraḥ tataḥ akṣabhāgayutaviyutasya jyā candramadhyajyā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6634: svayaṃvahagolayantrapratipādanāya āha ã kāṣṭhamayam samavṛttam samantataḥ samagurum laghum golam |
GS41aryabhcu:6635: pāratatailajalaiḥ tam bhramayet svadhiyā ca kālasamam || 22 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6641: yadi atimātraguruḥ bhavati pāṣāṇavat niścalaḥ syāt, [mahatā
GS41aryabhcu:6642: kālena bhramati iti ataḥ] samavṛttam samagurum |
GS41aryabhcu:6646: svadhiyā ca svakīyaprajñayā ca tam bhramayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6648: kālasamam ahorātrasamam yathā bhramati tathā bhramayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6649: tat yathā ã ṣaṣṭighaṭikāṅkitasvāhorātramaṇḍale kanyātulāsandhipradeśe kīlakam īṣat unnatam ekam kārayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6651: pātram ca samam vattam dīrgham [tala]madhyanihitasūkṣmacchidram ghaṭikāṣaṣṭyā jalapūrṇam yathā riktam bhavati tathā svadhiyā prasādhya tataḥ karma kriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6652: yāvat pātrāt udakam sravati tāvat gurutvāt alābuḥ jalavaśāt adhogacchan golam ākarṣati |
GS41aryabhcu:6653: evam sakṛt yuktaḥ golaḥ paramārthabhagolavat ahorātre bhramati |
GS41aryabhcu:6654: prathamam tāmrakīlake pāśakasūtrasya ekam agram badhvā golayantram adhastāt prabhṛti pariveṣṭya tatra eva pradeśe sūtram prāpayet iti kramaḥ || 22 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6656: viṣuvat jyāpradeśapratipādanāya āha ã dṛggolārdhakapāle jyārdhena vikalpayet bhagolārdham
GS41aryabhcu:6663: bhūmau vṛttam ālikhya pūrvāparadakṣiṇottaradikcihnitam kṛtvā ekaikasmin caturthabhāge rāśitrayam aṅkayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6670: | samamaṇḍalasya viṣuvataḥ uttareṇa akṣatulyāntare avasthitatvāt akṣaḥ iti ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6671: tasya akṣakāṣṭhasya bhujā, akṣajyā viṣuvajjyā iti paryāyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6676: samamaṇḍalamadhyāt dakṣiṇena ākṣajyātulye antare sūtrasya ekam agram badhvā graham prāpayet
GS41aryabhcu:6679: evam anyatra api dṛggolārdhe kalpitajyārdheṣu bhujākoṭikarṇavyavasthā kalpanīyā || 23 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6681: apakramādibhiḥ bhujādikalpanām āha ã iṣṭāpakramavargam vyāsārdhakṛteḥ viśodhya yat mūlam |
GS41aryabhcu:6683: sūryasya iṣṭāpakramajyāyāḥ candrasya iṣṭāpakramajyāyāḥ ca yaḥ vargaḥ sa iṣṭāpakramavargaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6684: tam vyāsārdhakṛteḥ viśodhya [śeṣasya] yat mūlam tat
GS41aryabhcu:6685: viṣuvataḥ uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā ahorātrasya viṣkambhaḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6692: laṅkodayaprāṇānayanam āha ã iṣṭajyāguṇitam ahorātravyāsārdham eva kāṣṭhāntyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6695: etābhiḥ guṇitam ahorātravyāsārdham svāhorātrārdhaviṣkambhaḥ iti arthaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6696: kāṣṭhasya antaḥ kāṣṭhāntaḥ, tatra bhavam kāṣṭhāntyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6697: navatiḥ bhāgāḥ yasmin [kāṣṭhe tasya ante bhavam] yat svahorātrārdham tat eva [iṣṭa]jyābhiḥ guṇitam svahorātrārdhahṛtam svakīyasvakīyāhorātrārdhahṛtam phalam iṣṭalaṅkodayaprāgjyāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6698: ajāt meṣāt prabhṛti kāṣṭham bhavati iti kāṣṭhīkriyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6707: dinaniśoḥ kṣayavṛddhipratipādanāya āha ã iṣṭāpakramaguṇitām akṣajyām lambakena hṛtvā yā |
GS41aryabhcu:6710: [iṣṭāpakramaguṇitām] akṣajyām lambakena hṛtvā phalam svāhorātramaṇḍale kṣitijyā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6711: tatra iṣṭāpakramajyā koṭiḥ, kṣitijyā bhujā, tadvargayutimūlam karṇaḥ arkāgrā
GS41aryabhcu:6713: pūrvāparasvastikayoḥ arkāgrayoḥ sūtram badhvā bhujakoṭivāsanā pradarśyā |
GS41aryabhcu:6719: rāśyudayakālapratipādanāya āha ã udayati hi cakrapādaḥ caradalahīnena divasapādena |
GS41aryabhcu:6720: prathamaḥ antyaḥ ca atha anyau tatsahitena kramotkramaśaḥ || 27 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6721: udayati darśanam yāti, ardham upari cakrapādaḥ, trayaḥ rāśayaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6722: caradalahīnena divasapādena iti anena laṅkodayāḥ trayaḥ parigṛhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:6723: yataḥ tribhiḥ meṣādilaṅkodayaiḥ pañcadaśaghaṭikāḥ tāḥ svāhorātracaturthaḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6724: aṃśaḥ, tataḥ krameṇa vyavasthitalaṅkodayaprāṇebhyaḥ meṣādicaradalaprāṇān svadeśākṣotpannān svakīyān viśodhayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6729: atra api divasapādagrahaṇena karkaṭasiṃhakanyāyāḥ utkrameṇa laṅkodayāḥ gṛhyante |
GS41aryabhcu:6730: tena karkaṭasiṃhakanyāyāḥ caraprāṇaiḥ utkrameṇa sahitāḥ udayanti |
GS41aryabhcu:6737: tena meṣaḥ śīghram udeti ataḥ caradalāsubhiḥ apacīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6744: kṣitijyā vyāsārdhaguṇā svāhorātrārdhahṛtā carajyā, tatkāṣṭham caradalaprāṇāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6746: svadeśarāśyudayaiḥ iṣṭakālalagnārtham sūryodayāt prabhṛti ghaṭikāḥ prāṇīkṛtya sūryabhogyarāśyudayaprāṇāḥ tebhyaḥ viśodhayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6748: punar yāvantaḥ rāśyudayāḥ śuddhyanti tāvantaḥ viśodhya sūrye rāśayaḥ kṣipyante |
GS41aryabhcu:6749: śeṣam triṃśatā guṇitam asuddhodayabhaktam bhāgādi vardhitaravau kṣipet |
GS41aryabhcu:6751: evam rātrau api rātrigataghaṭikāḥ dinamānaghaṭikāsu prakṣipya lagnam anena vidhinā kartavyam
GS41aryabhcu:6752: rātriśeṣaghaṭikābhiḥ viparītakarmaṇā raveḥ gatabhāgādinā tadutkrameṇa yāvantaḥ udayaprāṇāḥ viśuddheyuḥ tāvantaḥ śodhanīyāḥ ] śeṣam triṃśatā guṇitam vartamānodayabhaktam bhāgādi śodhitam
GS41aryabhcu:6755: raveḥ abhuktabhāgaiḥ abhyudayam saṃguṇya triṃśatā bhajet |
GS41aryabhcu:6757: evam lagnabhuktabhāgaiḥ tadudayam saṃguṇya triṃśatā vibhajet |
GS41aryabhcu:6771: [ataḥ trairāśikam] ã yadi vyāsārdhamaṇḍale iyam jyā bhavati svāhorātrārdhamaṇḍale kiyatī iti kṣitijamaṇḍalāvadheḥ svāhorātreṣṭajyā abhidhīyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6772: tām iṣṭajyām avalambakāhṛtām kṛtvā viṣkambhārdhena vyāsārdhena vibhajet |
GS41aryabhcu:6773: divasasya pūrvāhṇe gatasya, aparāhṇe śeṣasya śaṅkuḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6776: tatra pūrvakapāle candramasaḥ iṣṭakālaghaṭikāḥ, aparakapāle tu candrāstalagnāntarālaghaṭikāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6778: candrasvāhorātrārdham kṣitijyām caradalajyām ca ānīya caradalaviparyayaniṣpannaprāṇaiḥ sūryavat karma kartavyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6779: atha svāhorātreṣṭajyā dvādaśaguṇā viṣuvatkarṇena bhaktā iṣṭaśaṅkuḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6783: athavā tām dvādaśaguṇasvāhorātreṇa saṃguṇya viṣuvatkarṇaguṇavyāsārdhena bhajet |
GS41aryabhcu:6785: divasagataghaṭikānayane ca śaṅkunā guṇitam vyāsārdham śaṅkucchāyāvargayutimūlena bhaktam bṛhacchaṅkuḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6790: labdhasya kāṣṭham uttaragole caradalayutam dakṣiṇe hīnam dinagataśeṣaprāṇāḥ [ bhavanti |
GS41aryabhcu:6793: śaṅkvagrapradarśanāya āha ã viṣuvajjīvāguṇitaḥ sveṣṭaḥ śaṅkuḥ svalambakena hṛtaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6796: lambakena bhaktaḥ astodayasūtrāt dakṣiṇataḥ sūryaśaṅkvagram bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6797: śaṅkoḥ agram antarālam śaṅkumūlāt samottarāvagāhisūtram yāvat
GS41aryabhcu:6799: kṣitijamaṇḍale prāksvastikāt dakṣiṇam uttaram vā arkāgrākāṣṭhatulyāntare sūtrasya ekam agram badhvā, dvitīyam agram tāvat [arkāgrākāṣṭhatulyāntare]
GS41aryabhcu:6804: bhūmadhyāt upari śaṅkumastakaprāpi yat sūtram karṇaḥ vyāsārdham iti || 29 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6806: arkāgrānayanāya āha ã paramāpakramajīvām iṣṭajyārdhāhatām tataḥ vibhajet |
GS41aryabhcu:6809: tām iṣṭasya raveḥ bhujajyayā guṇitām [kṛtvā] lambakena vibhajet , [labdhā jyā] arkāgrā bhavati
GS41aryabhcu:6810: iyati adhvani viṣuvataḥ uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā raviḥ udeti, pūrvāpare ca kṣitijamaṇḍalapradeśe [ samaśaṅkuḥ ]
GS41aryabhcu:6811: samamaṇḍalaśaṅkvānayanāya āha ã sā viṣuvajjyonā cet viṣuvadudaglambakena saṅguṇitā |
GS41aryabhcu:6815: [yadā] bhavati, tadā madhyāhne eva savitā samamaṇḍalam viśati |
GS41aryabhcu:6818: [krāntikāṣṭhajyā yadā] viṣuvajjyayā ūnā tadā samamaṇḍalam viśati |
GS41aryabhcu:6820: lambakena guṇitā viṣuvajjyayā bhaktā samamaṇḍalaśaṅkuḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6821: pūrvasamamaṇḍalena aparasamamaṇḍalena [ca] kṣitije arkāgrāntare astamayodayasūtram badhvā arkākrāntarāśibhāgapradeśaḥ samapūrvāparamaṇḍale yatra lagnam prāgbindutaḥ tat samamaṇḍalacāpam tathā gole bhramayet yathā kṣitijādhobhāge samamaṇḍale tāvati antare lagnam bhavet |
GS41aryabhcu:6822: tayoḥ samamaṇḍalabindvoḥ antare sūtram badhvā tadardham śaṅkuḥ pūrvavat eva pūrvāpararekhāspṛk bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6823: śaṅkoḥ uttareṇa astamayodayasūtram yāvat antaram śaṅkvagram arkāgrātulyam |
GS41aryabhcu:6824: samamaṇḍalaśaṅkuḥ akṣajyayā guṇitaḥ paramakrāntijyābhaktaḥ sūryabhujajyā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6826: ṣaḍrāśiviśuddham, tulādige ṣaḍrāśiyutam, makarādige cakraviśuddham raviḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6828: chedyake api ã samāyām bhūmau vṛttam ālikhya dikcihnitam kṛtvā sūryabimbodaye aste ca pūrvāparayoḥ bindū kṛtvā pūrvāpararekhāyāḥ dakṣiṇe [madhyāhnanatajyātulye antare] tṛtīyam bindum prakalpya bindutrayāvagāhi matsyadvayena vṛttam ālikhet |
GS41aryabhcu:6830: arkāgrāgre savitā uditaḥ tadvṛttānusāreṇa samamaṇḍalam avagāhya dakṣiṇena natajyātulye antare madhyāhnam kṛtvā krameṇa aparabhāge samamaṇḍalāt niṣkrāntaḥ aparāgrāgre astam eti |
GS41aryabhcu:6831: arkabhramavṛttasya prāgapararekhāyāḥ yatra sampātaḥ tatra samamaṇḍale praveśaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6832: samamaṇḍale tu madhyam yāvat antaram samamaṇḍalaśaṅkucchāyā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6836: madhyāhnaśaṅkucchāyayoḥ ānayanāya āha ã kṣitijāt unnatabhāgānām yā jyā sā paraḥ bhavet śaṅkuḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6837: madhyāt natabhāgajyā chāyā śaṅkoḥ tu tasya eva || 32 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6838: kṣitijāt iti samadakṣiṇottarasvastikapradeśāt ye unnatabhāgāḥ golamadhyasthite ravau lakṣitāḥ teṣām yā jyā sā paramaḥ śaṅkuḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6839: yā madhyāt natabhāgajyā sā paramaśaṅkoḥ chāyā syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6840: iṣṭamadhyāhne raveḥ apakramabhāgāḥ akṣabhāgeṣu dakṣiṇagole prayojayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6849: athavā taddinasvāhorātrārdham kṣitijyayā svayā udagyāmye viyutayutaṃ[vyāsārdhaguṇam svāhorātrārdhabhaktam] dvādaśaguṇam viṣuvatkarṇahṛtam mahāśaṅkuḥ tadunnatajyā bhavati || 32 ||
GS41aryabhcu:6851: dṛkkṣepapratipādanāya āha ã madhyajyodayajīvāsaṃvarge vyāsadalahṛte yat syāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6854: tayoḥ saṃvargaḥ parasparaguṇanam vyāsadalahṛtam yat bhavati tasya madhyajyāyāḥ ca kṛtyoḥ viśeṣamūlam svakīyaḥ dṛkkṣepaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6857: dṛggatijyānayanāya āha ã dṛgdṛkkṣepakṛtiviśeṣitasya mūlam svadṛggatiḥ kuvaśāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6859: dṛgjyādṛkkṣepakṛtyoḥ vivarasya mūlam svakīyā dṛggatiḥ bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6861: madhyajyodayajīvayoḥ saṃvarge vyāsadalahṛte yat tat madhyajyākṛtyoḥ viśeṣāt mūlam dṛkkṣepaḥ hi bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6862: evam bhūvaśāt utpannatrijyāśaṅkuvargaviśeṣāt mūlam dṛgjyā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6863: ataḥ bhūvaśāt utpanna[dṛgjyā]dṛkkṣepaniṣpannatvāt kuvaśāt iti ucyate |
GS41aryabhcu:6865: dṛkchāyā” iti atra tu “svā” iti anena svakīyadṛkkṣepadṛggatī abhidhīyete |
GS41aryabhcu:6867: | kṣitijamaṇḍale svā dṛkchāyā kasmāt utpannā? nabhomadhyāt |
GS41aryabhcu:6869: tat yataḥ kudṛṣṭivaśāt samamaṇḍalamadhyāt pūrvāparayoḥ diśoḥ dṛggatiḥ [lambanam] ṛṇam dhanam vā iti, tathā eva bhagolamadhyāt dakṣiṇottaradiśoḥ dṛkkṣepasya grahaṇena natiḥ vā syāt jyānām viśeṣotpattim darśayati |
GS41aryabhcu:6871: bhūvyāsārdha[tulya]m antaram kṣitije sūryakakṣyāyām candrakakṣāyām ca [bhavati] |
GS41aryabhcu:6872: sūryakakṣyotpannamadhyajyām sūryakakṣyodayajyayā saṃguṇya trijyayā bhāgalabdhasya vargam madhyajyāvargāt viśodhya mūlam ravikakṣyāyām dṛkkṣepaḥ, tathā candrakakṣyotpannamadhyajyām svodayajyayā
GS41aryabhcu:6873: saṃguṇya trijyayā bhāgalabdhasya vargam svamadhyajyāvargāt viśodhya mūlam candrakakṣyāyām
GS41aryabhcu:6874: | sūryasvāhorātrādibhiḥ sādhitadṛgjyāvargāt sūryadṛkkṣepavargam viśodhya mūlam sūryakakṣyāyām dṛggatijyā |
GS41aryabhcu:6875: candrasvāhorātrādibhiḥ sādhitadṛgjyāvargāt candradṛkkṣepavargam viśodhya mūlam candrakakṣyāyām dṛggatijyā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6876: evam anyeṣām api grahāṇām samamaṇḍalamadhyāt dṛggateḥ bhāvaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6877: udaye [sūrya]grahaṇe candrasya tāvadadhaḥsthitatvāt candrakakṣyāyām sūryabimbakendrasūtrāt pūrveṇa candrabimbam natam lakṣyate
GS41aryabhcu:6879: samabhūpradeśe sthitasya draṣṭuḥ vyāsārdhatulyayā dṛggatijyayā bhūvyāsārdhatulyam dṛggatyantaram [= lambanam] |
GS41aryabhcu:6882: ã yadi vyāsārdhatulyayā dṛggatijyayā bhūvyāsārdhayojanatulyam dṛggatyantaram [=lambanam] tadā iṣṭakālotpannadṛggatijyayā kiyat iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6883: [punar ca trairāśikam ã yadi] sphuṭayojanakarṇena trijyātulyāḥ kalāḥ
GS41aryabhcu:6884: labhyante, tadā dṛggati[= lambana]yojanaiḥ kiyatyaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6885: atra prathame trairāśike trijyā bhāgahāraḥ dvitīye guṇakāraḥ tulyatvāt [nāśe kṛte] ravicandrayoḥ dṛggateḥ bhūvyāsārdham guṇakāraḥ sphuṭayojanakarṇaḥ bhāgahāraḥ, phalam liptāḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6886: sūryaliptāḥ candraliptābhyaḥ viśodhya trairāśikam ã yadi [dinasphuṭa]bhuktyantareṇa
GS41aryabhcu:6887: ṣaṣṭiḥ nāḍyaḥ [labhyante, tadā] ābhiḥ liptābhiḥ kiyatyaḥ iti |
GS41aryabhcu:6891: aparakapāle parataḥ natatvāt lambanaghaṭikātulyakālena yogaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ataḥ prakṣipyante
GS41aryabhcu:6892: evam etat karma tāvat kriyate yāvat aviśeṣaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6894: yadi ravicandrayoḥ madhya[jye] samadiksthe bhavataḥ tadā [ravicandrayoḥ]
GS41aryabhcu:6897: tataḥ madhyagrahaṇacandrāt pātam viśodhya śeṣasya dakṣiṇottarabhujajyā ardhapañcamena guṇitā trijyābhaktā vikṣepaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6900: tayā ca avanatyā sthityardham ānīya madhyatitheḥ viśodhya śeṣaḥ sparśakālaḥ |
GS41aryabhcu:6903: tat punar madhyakālāt viśodhya asakṛt sthityardham utpādayet yāvat sthiram bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6906: tat punar madhyatithau prakṣipya pūrvavat lambanaghaṭikāḥ utpādya tanmadhyalambanāntareṇa sthityardham upacitam kṛtvā tat eva karma punar kriyate yāvat sthiram bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6907: evam sthirīkṛtasthityardhasambandhinam sūryendugatikalābhogam madhyagrahaṇasūryendoḥ sparśe viśodhayet mokṣe kṣipet |
GS41aryabhcu:6909: atha prāgaparakapāladvaye api lambanayoḥ tayoḥ yogena yutam sthityardham sphuṭam bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6911: kṛtvā maṇḍalapūrvabhāge prāgapararekhāyāḥ uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā udayajyākāṣṭhatulye antare bindū kṛtvā bindudvayaśiraspṛksūtram prasārya rekhā kuryāt udayajyā bhavati |
GS41aryabhcu:6915: trijyāmaṇḍalaparidhibindudvayāt sūtradvayam madhyakendram ānīya rekhādvayam kuryāt
GS41aryabhcu:6916: | tat antarajyārdham madhyajyāmaṇḍale tathā eva pūrvāparataḥ uttareṇa dakṣiṇena vā vyavasthāpyate
GS41aryabhcu:6918: [trijyāmaṇḍale pūrvāparayoḥ udayajyākāṣṭhatulye antare] bindū kṛtvā [vṛttakendrāt madhyāhna]natajyātulye antare dṛkkṣepabinduḥ dakṣiṇena
GS41aryabhcu:6919: [prakalpya] bindutrayeṇa matsyam utpādya tanmukhapucchaspṛksūtrasampātāt bindutrayaspṛgvṛttam bhramayet |
GS41aryabhcu:6921: tatra kṣitijāt ūrdhvam yatra pradeśe raviḥ tanmadhyakendrāntarālasūtram dṛgjyā karṇaḥ,
GS41aryabhcu:6922: sthānīyā dṛkkṣepajyā koṭiḥ, tadagrāt ārabhya dṛgjyāgram yāvat ravicihnopalakṣitam tadantarālam

GS41aryabhcu:7256: sā madhyamabhukteḥ yadā ūnā syāt tadā kakṣyāmaṇḍalāt upari grahaḥ, adhikā cet tadā adhaḥ vartate |
GS41aryabhcu:7258: tadvaśāt paramālpatām paramādhikatām ca bhukteḥ lakṣayet iti bhagaṇabhogam yāvat |
GS41aryabhcu:7260: evam mandaphalasya paramādhikatām lakṣayitvā paramamandakarṇavyāsārdhāntaram paramaphalam māndam bhavati || 48 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7262: bhagaṇādīnām pramāṇāni katham jñātāni ācāryeṇa tatpratipādanāya āha ã sadasajjñānasamudrāt samuddhṛtam brahmaṇaḥ prasādena |
GS41aryabhcu:7267: sajjñānottamaratnam sat jñānam tat eva uttamaratnam, utkṛṣṭam ratnam,
GS41aryabhcu:7271: svamatiḥ eva nauḥ tayā svamatināvā sadasajjñānasamudrāt samuddhṛtam iti ||
GS41aryabhcu:7273: śapathapratipādanāya āha ã āryabhaṭīyam nāmnā pūrvam svāyambhuvam sadā nityam |
GS41aryabhcu:7274: sukṛtāyuṣoḥ praṇāśam kurute pratikañcukam yaḥ asya || 50 ||
GS41aryabhcu:7276: kim tat? yadā eva atyantavipralīnasampradāyam brahmaṇaḥ prasādena vā svanāmadheyam |
GS41aryabhcu:7277: yaḥ pūrvam svāyambhuvam āsīt idānīm āryabhaṭena prakāśitatvāt āryabhaṭīyam |
GS41aryabhcu:7279: svayaṃbhuvā praṇītam artham gṛhītvā ācāryāḥ śāstrāṇi racayanti |
GS41aryabhcu:7280: sampradāyāvicchedāt tu saḥ arthaḥ jñātaḥ eva
GS41aryabhcu:7281: | anyathā atīndriyārthānām katham mānuṣamātraiḥ iyam yuktiḥ kartum śakyate |
GS41aryabhcu:7282: asya pratikañcukam pratibimbam yaḥ karoti tasya sukṛtasya āyuṣaḥ ca praṇāśam bhavati || 50
GS41aryabhcu:7284: spaṣṭārthapratipādakam mṛdudhiyām sūktam prabodhapradam tarkavyākaraṇādiśuddhamatinā someśvareṇa adhunā |
GS41aryabhcu:7285: ācāryāryabhaṭoktasūtravivṛtiḥ yā bhāskarotpāditā tasyāḥ sārataram vikṛṣya racitam bhāṣyam prakṛṣṭam laghu ||
GS41aryabhcu:7289: teṣām aśakyaḥ arthaśatāṃśakaḥ api vaktum kutaḥ asmatsadṛśaiḥ aśeṣam ||
GS41aryabhcu:7290: iti bhāskarasya kṛtau āryabhaṭatantrabhāṣye golapādaḥ samāptaḥ |
